The lag time between the main zone speakers and the auxiliary zone which uses Bluetooth is immediately noticeable.  This device is not suitable for this application.  I gave it two stars because while the sound quality is good the latency is unacceptable.

Tried out receiver status with old amplifier and Bose wave system. Works fine. But, I happened to be in my office with my elderly IMac, circa 2011, computer. I use a wireless keyboard. Keyboard lost "pairing". Would pair fine with track pad and mouse. Called Apple and they helped fix the issue, but I had to purchase a keyboard with PS-2 connection in order to be able to trouble shoot and fix the issue(i.e. go into system preferences and remove the pairing with the receiver).  I tried turning the Taotronics receiver off and  removed it from the room, but my good old iMac would not relinqish its pairing to the TaoTronic receiver!  Not sure if this is unique to my situation, but just FYI.

I have a pair of bluetooth headphones and I was really looking forward to using this to connect to my t.v., sadly after many, many, many trials that never happened. I can’t believe I just wasted $30.00 for nothing.  I will remember the name “Tao tonics” but mot for the right reasons.

This is really great. I rarely write product reviews but this little gadget has made some things easier for my device connections. I decided to save $ and buy an amazon tablet instead of an ipad then found out there's no bluetooth for my headphones. I just plug this in to the fire tablet, and my bluetooth headphones connect instantly. That's in transmit mode. Or just switch to receive mode and I can plug it into my stereo system, and have my phone connect bluetooth to it and play music through the old fashioned stereo. Holds charge for a long time. Great product!

I purchased this adapter for my record player so I could connect to my television's sound bar. It was adequate, but volume and clarity were a bit lacking. My original review was 3 stars and I wrote "it it what it is". I wasn't upset, just not impressed.The seller reached out to me to upgrade my adapter for free! Wow! They even care about the guy that wasn't angry, just middle of the road. They sent me a free adapter that was an upgrade from my purchase. The volume and clarity through my soundbar are amazing.

Spent almost an hour trying to connect two sets of Bose headphones. It’s garbage, got the first set to connect, then finally got the second set to connect but now it absolutely won’t connect to the first set no matter what I do. This garbage product belongs in the dumpster.

Wow! I have bought two other devices that were suppose to do what this is capable of and by far this is the beat device to allow any non Bluetooth capable device, capable , easy to use has not had any issues with connection especially being in using it for a sound bar to connect to my projector.Get it if your in the market for a receiver/ transmitter. Won’t be disappoint.

This is a great bluetooth transmitter/receiver. We purchased this to add Bluetooth to our TV. This was so easy to plug-in and setup with our headphones and speakers. I like that we can keep it plugged in all the time behind our TV so there is nothing we need to do whenever we want to use it. We just turn on our bluetooth headphones and they automatically connect and we are good to go!

I was attempting to find a bluetooth device that would pair with my iPhone compatible bluetooth ReSound 761 hearing aids.  Unfortunately, I was unable to get this accomplished with this device.  It pairs fine with RX on my iPhone but will not hook to the hearing aids.  I'll use it with the bluetooth headphones instead.

This is my second purchase of a TAOtronics Bluetooth product.  Excellent quality.I bought this unit to send the TV output to BT earbuds for my 97 year old mother.  Has completely changed her TV viewing experience.  She can now hear every word whereas prior she missed a lot of the dialogue - even with high listening volumes.

Took a while to get it to work through a receiver, but that was mostly due to my inexperience with wireless. Sound is great for music. There was a bit of a lag lag on TV dialogue, but it appears that was due to me trying to connect to a device that it was not compatible with. If you're smarter than me you'll have less problems!
Excellent product, great companymine stopped working after only a few uses, must have been a glitch.
Once we figured out how to make it work - it has been great to have our non-Bluetooth TV turned into Bluetooth capable.

It has performed beautifully. Got it along with a set of Bluetooth speakers to DJ our own reception. It connected easily with both my phone and record player with perfect sound quality. After that we attached it to the TV and use it to deliver better sound through those same speakers at home for our entertainment center or whenever we just want to jam out at the house.

First, it is extremely difficult to make sure your headphones are connected and usually doesn't work. Second, on the rare chance it actually does work, the volume is very low.  I have to turn up the volume to the max to hear at a normal volume. Don’t use with Airpos because there is no manual volume button to increase the volume. Update: CompNy refunded my purchase.

Ok, I was pretty excited (cautiously) about this device. I wasn’t sure if my LG smart tv would work with it. Sure enough, the RCA out did not work :/ after doing many a google search with no results, it finally dawned on me to connect it to my cable receiver. Boom! It worked! Sound is great!!

I purchased this for Nintendo Switch/Switch-lite to use with AirPods Pro - after 4, different attempts with other products out there - this one is a KEEPER. Works excellent, no latency (that I’ve noticed), easy to connect (mine does it automatically); and, the charging while using is excellent. It also LOOKS well-made. It reminds me of a mini-ipod.

I have a TCL television and its biggest negative to me is that it isn't able to connect to any other bluetooth device except the specific TCL soundbar. So I did some research and found this transmitter and ordered it immediately. The transmitter was relatively easy to set up and connect to after reading the manual. I had just plugged it into the 3.5mm audio jack on the back on my television and was able to connect it via bluetooth to a different 3rd party soundbar that I had. Another great feature that I enjoy is that it will reconnect to the same device if you happen to turn off the speaker or television. It is a great product and I am so happy that I ordered this instead of shelling out $100+ on a specific soundbar for my television.

Using this along with a low-latency headphone for wireless sound in my music studio sound system. Playing a guitar live through this system produces no noticeable delay; it would be impossible to play if it did. Simple to use and pair with your headphones, keep it powered on and charging 24/7 on a usb micro cord. Total no-brainer. No complaints on the sound quality either.

I love this Bluetooth transmitter.  I use it to listen to podcasts and music on my phone as I commute.  It always syncs quickly and never lags.  Crystal clear sound with no static.  Awesome customer service staff.  Quick and responsive.  I would buy this product again and would certainly buy from the vendor again.  Awesome!!!

I originally purchased one to use while I fly so I can plug it into the headphone jack and connect to my bluetooth headphones and not have any cords hanging in front of me. It works perfectly for that. Now I use it almost daily in the car as I have an older car with an auxiliary input so I can connect my phone and listen to podcasts or music. I can't use it for phone calls however. I have used it to watch tv when I need to be quiet - again connecting through my bluetooth headset.I showed it to my dad and he bough one. I bought the second one for my wife's car.

Do yourself favor and buy separate transmitter and receiver BT adaptors which cost about less than half. I have older version (BT 4.01) and even though it says it can connect 2 devices what does it mean is it has memory to store 2 devices but it can only play once device. So 2 people will not be able to watch movie or play video game headphone at the same time.

The one I got was very skippy. My old review reflected that. TaoTronics got hold of me immediately after I posted the review and sent me a replacement, which seemed to have worked much better than the original one.I recommend this product both out of sheer sincerity that you will be taken care of and that your product will be guaranteed to work or your money back.

Received this to use as a transmitter for a set of bluetooth headphones.  I plugged it into my A/V system headphone jack, plugged the charger into the front USB port for power, and hit pair.  20 seconds later, it paired up with my headphones, and I can walk to any room in the house without any drop-outs.  For such a small, unobtrusive device, it works perfectly, and the sound quality it excellent.

I'm hard of hearing so I normally can't watch movies at night without keeping my family up. I use this as a transmitter from my TV to a bluetooth headset. I can watch movies without making a sound. Super easy to set up. It seems to always be in pairing mode.

Easy to set up on a non-bluetooth TV, and connected to my Aftershoks just fine, but after about 6 weeks it's stopped connecting without a lot of hassle between uses. I don't recommend this, unless you need something to hold you over for a month until you get something better.

This has worked perfectly in enabling us to stream music from a non-wireless lower level stereo to bluetooth speakers in other rooms (although we're still trying with our finicky soundbar).  Just what we wanted to get more use out of our CD collection!I'm not an audiophile, but excellent sound quality without any skipping or lags.

I plugged this into the back of my TV and paired some Bluetooth headphones to it; and I get better signal and sound than I do with my other TV that has a bulky dedicated Sony headphones transmitter (https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07J4TYZ72/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_search_asin_title?ie=UTF8&psc=1), and it powers off the USB port in the TV, so it's completely hidden from view.

Got this because I have an ipad pro (no phone jack). Well this works well. Sound quality is not affected and connection is good. I can listen down stairs while ipad is upstairs. Really happy with this. Battery life is about 4 or 5 hours.Update: Battery life is better than 7 hours.

I have small ears so I can't wear any in ear headphones unless they are molded specifically for me. I wear the bone conducting headphones over my ears when I go running. I don't always like taking my phone and prefer to use my iPod shuffle but it doesn't have bluetooth capabilities. I was able to make my iPod shuffle transmit bluetooth via the taotronics transmitter. It works beautifully and has been so nice to have.

It is very compact. It will be great to take with our portable TaoTonics head set. It paired with the head set easily. I like the red/blue light that tells you it is pairing and is paired. The included USB cable plugged into the TV to keep the transmitter charged. I used a longer audio cable so it could plug into the audio plug on the back of the TV and keep the small transmitter setting in front so we can easily unplug it to take it with us.

When this transmitter works it works fantastic, but sometimes the transmitter seems to get out of sync when paired with two speakers and occasionally one just drops off and looses connection all together.Update: the seller reached out and sent me a new product. This one has worked perfectly with no sync issues and not dropped connections!!!!

This little device packs a punch!We needed to send our Amazon Music from an older tablet to multiple Bluetooth speakers in our community center. This worked perfectly AND there is no latency between the two speakers! Setup was easy as plugging it in, hitting the power buttone twice to pair the two speakers and click play!

As other reviewers pointed out, this works great for audio.  If you want to use your earbuds on the treadmill or make an old non-bluetooth device play wirelessly.  But for video, specifically using on an airplane, there is too much of a lag between the video and audio.  It's enough to be really annoying and takes away from the enjoyment of what you are watching.

i have several ipod classics and an old sony stereo, none of which have any bluetooth capability. so when i came across these i was really hopeful that id be able to connect them together using one as a transmitter and one as a receiver. im glad i took the chance because it worked out extremely well in this case. my only issue is that i couldnt get my skullcandy earbuds to connect to it no matter what i tried which leads me to believe that they are too new for this type of transmitter. regardless of that though, its a great product for my regular listening times with my stereo.

The unit is small and perfect for use on plane. Most airline entertainments unit only have wired headphone jack. Wired headphones are clumsy. I owned couple active noise headphones which can only operate only with Bluetooth connection. Hence, this transmitter/Receiver unit is perfect for this application. The unit is easy to set up and connect to my headphones quickly. No experience on any disconnection during my many 6 hours flights whatsoever. I once used it on an international flight with 15 hours of fight time and it worked perfectly. Although I have to connect the power input with my battery charger in order to stay longer than 5-6 hours flight. The fact that the unit operates well  while being charged makes this unit a pleasure to own.

So, I bought these for my husband for his BDay, along with V-MODA Forza Metallo Wireless in-Ear Headphones, so he was able to push his audio wireless while he streamed. Every time he uses them, after about 1 and a half hours of use, he gets a high pitch squeal down his ear and he has to turn his Bluetooth headphones off and go back to wired headphones. He's tried the Wireless In-Ear Headphones with his cell phone and direct to a blue tooth audio transmitter on another machine and no issues. we feel this Bluetooth device causes the issues. I tried reaching out to the company via a link from another post to try to rectify the issue (prior to putting a review on here), but as of yet, I've had not reply, all I have had is a 'survey email' not long after the purchase.  I'll try again to reach them, but if they don't come back to me, I'll be returning them within the Amazon's return window.

Bluetooth technology is miraculous and TaoTronics 5.0 Transmitter and Receiver, 2-in-1 Wireless 3.5mm Adapter handles it perfect.  My Bose radio/cd-player sits near a neighbor's wall and had been causing her some sound pollution.  I jacked TaoTronics wireless device into the radio's auxiliary output and now mostly listen to radio and cds over either TaoTronics Soundsurge 60 headphones or over a Big Blue speaker I can position as far from the common wall as I like.  The sound quality may not be as good as Bose, but it's decent enough and especially with the headphones, I get background noise-cancelling as well.  I've already recommended the device to friends.

Yo compré transmisor  TaoTronics y me sorprendió lo fácil y rápido que es conectarlo,Yo lo utilizo con iPhone X y con los audífonos  del iPhone 8 o con otros audífonos que no tienen Bluetooth. Y estoy muy satisfecho con el resultado.

I got it around 3:45 paired to my bone conductive head phones (almost completely deaf) and it paired almost instantly and sound is great, can mute my tv and it isn’t affected, moved it and plugged it into a 2nd tv and it worked great. So now my husband doesn’t have to complain about the tv being up and if I want to watch something that isn’t closed captioned I finally can, could not be happier

I'm 81 years old and have been married to the same women for 61 years. This is important we don't fight over the TV being too loud. I want to keep her for another 61 years because I don't want to train another. I have 7 TV'S and I have a Taotronics transmitter on five of them. The most important thing that is a must is that there is no delay in the words that you hear over the speaker. I have hearing aids but like the transmitters better when watching TV. Headphones are too hot and heaver when you are watching a game. So easy to install. Service is the greatness. Enjoy I do

Its not so easy to pair with the earphones. I have taotronic ear phones and it takes 3 or 4 times to turno on and off both devices to get it paired.After 1 year of my review I received a mail from customer service and give me a refund because of my problems. Not fast but good customer service. Actually I never made a complaint. It’s just because of my review. Thats 1 more star for customer service.

I was planning to run wires across my living room until I ran across the TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter and Receiver. I have TaoTronics ear buds and love them and the transmitter/receiver worked like a dream and took about 5 minutes to unbox, set up and play.

This is a very effective device, both as a transmitter and receiver. Pairing and connecting is very easy, and the battery lasts for long enough for several movies. I haven't noticed any latency at all, in movies or video games. I definitely recommend this little tool!

Great customer service, I reported the device I ordered wasn’t quite what I was looking for and returned it.. This vendor contacted me and inquired about the type of device I needed and sent it to me cost free.. I can not say enough about a vendor who goes above and beyond to ensure their customers are totally satisfied with their products.. it’s a win win here!

I like this particularly since it includes the AUX cable and correct RCA adapter for this to work with a TV. This is not the best priced product on the Amazon market but it's a real convenience to have all the parts together in one order as is the case here.I got this as a Father's Day gift. It turned out to be perfect. He can now watch TV late without turning the volume excruciatingly low with captions and potentially disturbing my mom's sleep. All he needs is his new Bluetooth headset coming tomorrow!

Before writing a review I wanted to test these out on an airplane viewing inflight movies, as that was the primary reason for purchase.  I was mostly looking for any noticeable voice sync issues with the video with my Powerbeats Pro.  Happy to say that they worked very much to my satisfaction when plugged into the Delta seat-back video entertainment 3.5mm plug and I was able to also use them plugged into the USB port for power on long flight on the headrest built in video display. The sync was easy, it remembered my Powerbeats once I connected it automatically reconnected on power up.  Volume is good and  I did not notice any voice sync issues.  I would recommend.

Just had a chance to use this paired with my Bose in ear headphones, the QC30s or 35s.It worked great, with no delay on the Air bus entertainment system I used. Turned Bluetooth off on my phone and had the headphones on. Turned on the transmitter and everything connected and worked great.

I bought this to use on my Goldwing motorcycle. It has an aux cord but my phone doesn't have a headphone jack. So I bought this so I could bluetooth my phone to my motorcycle and listen to my streaming music app through my motorcycle. It works great. It's compact size is a plus. I like that it can receive or transmit a Bluetooth signal.

I have an 2010 Cadillac cts that does not have a blue tooth radio but has usb ports its very easy to hook up all you do is plug in the usb port push the power button on the device and find it on you phone and your done. I have to say that I don't hear any difference in sound quality between that and using the radio.

I'm having a problem with choppy sound once I pair to a second blue tooth device.I have a Rockville speaker and a pair of AOMAIS speakers that I want to pair to.  I don't have a problem pairing to the Rockville speaker but once I try to pair to the AOMAIS speaker(s) the volume drops and the sound comes out very choppy and I get a lot of interference.  When I pair independently to the AOMAIS speaker(s) using the bluetooth on the phone or other devices they work without any problems.  *Updated as issue seems to not occur with other products other than the AOMIS speakers. It may be a problem with the AOMIS speakers instead.
Within a few months after purchase the battery failed and the manufacturer has refused a replacement. Save your money and buy elsewhere.

I bought this because I use wireless earbuds at the gym, and also on the plane, as I travel a lot. This works perfectly for both the aerobic machines at the gym and the audio for movies on the plane!!

They have great products... you should also consider ordering their headphones and earbuds, i think they are great and if your not happy they have a great return policy. I am a actual pleased....  user of many of their products, i first started with them necause my smart tv in my bedroom dont have bluetooth(2014model) and then i went from there. I dont hurt to give them a try!!!

An easy way to add bluetooth to audio output without bluetooth. Just plug it in to the audio out, pair and good to go. I plugged this in to an outdoor AV projector that does have speakers, but poor sound quality. So I had this pair with Harmon Kardon Studio speakers. Problem solved

This is a great product really works out great as my girlfriend always goes to sleep before I do and I can still enjoy my television programming,only problem is it was a little tricky getting it to connect but once you're connected works as good as any bluetooth out there, I give this product 4 stars,

I must admit, I haven’t tried this device out for the primary purpose I bought it, to use with the in-flight entertainment systems on aircraft. But I’ve tried it out with various devices (iPad iPhone computer, etc.) And it works great! I hope it works as well on the airplane. I’ll know tomorrow!

Hooked this up to our TV, paired our airbuds with no issues, and now either of us can watch TV without disturbing the rest of the household. Apparently we can attach 2 headphones, so we're looking forward to that, as well.I was nervous about pairing headphones, without having a screen, but it was a snap. The house is much more peaceful now that Fox news isn't blaring through the house! Woo Hooooo!

I had no idea this product existed until I looked for a solution to my problem.  I use this product through a Peavey PA system with my iPad or iPhone to play music and play along with guitar and amp.  Distance and quality let me be 30ft away with iPhone select songs.  I also use this in the car with my phone to play iHeartRadio, Pandora, etc....

Bought this so that I could hook up my FM radio to by Bluetooth headphones (bose qc35ii). It has worked great for that. Hard to judge sound quality since I am only using it with a radio, but everything comes across clear and it sounds great. The reason I am writing this review though is because after receiving the product I received an email from TaoTronics explaining how to use the product in more detail which I think is good customer service. Overall I have been very happy with the product thus far. Will update if I have any issues with durability.
You realize the output if this device is very low?  It should say low latency and low volume!Same thing I read in the comments.  And that low latency doesn't apply to RX mode, grrr

As a follow review to my previous review below, the company realized a glitch in the product and offered me a replacement at no cost, and sent a new one. They communicated with me to ensure the product worked correctly.  Although I have one final issue to deal with (perhaps it is my tv), the customer service follow up deserves a five star.  I appreciate your due diligence.When the device worked, I loved it!  Although, it only lasted for one day.  Very frustrating.  I do not recommend purchasing.

I’ve given it a 3 stars overall and sound quality because of the latency issues when using it with Bluetooth headphones to watch video (tv or dvd). Tried it with 2 different headphones, but there is a very noticeable lag causing the audio and video to go out of sync, which is just too annoying to deal with. Works great if you only want it for audio (such as using it to transmit my iPhone music to my car speakers).

My wife goes to sleep earlier than I do and always complains about the TV being too loud. Well now, I connect my Bluetooth headphones to the transmitter that is plug into the back of my tv and BAM I can hear the TV and the wife can’t. Happy wife, happy life.UPDATE: 1 month and 1 week into loving this product and it craps out. Battery isn’t holding a charge. Not even when plugged in. Comes on for a few seconds, flashes and cuts off. Not sure if there is a warranty or not. Bummer

I tried paring this to two Bluetooth devices and it did not work. It would pair to one device which is why I did not give it one star that doesn’t achieve the end goal. I tried the other way and connected the device to my phone and tried to plug two headphones in using a splitter, but sound only went to one set of ear phones.***Update

I've bought TaoTronics products before and have been pleased with their performance.  This little transmitter hangs in the back of my TV and pairs perfectly with my Bluetooth speaker and headphones.  It even allows me to be about 25 ft. away in another room, no line of sight, to listen to the TV.  Wish I had thought of this sooner.  It will also receive, but I haven't needed to use that function yet.

It literally worked once and we didn’t try it for another week or so (because we didn’t need it until then) and it stopped working. It will not hold a charge. And it was too late to send it back once it stopped working!!! IM SO MAD THAT I WASTED OVER $30 ON THIS P.O.S!!! DO.NOT. WASTE. YOUR. MONEY. ON. THIS. PRODUCT!!!

Ok a caviat. My headset is Bluetooth 4.0 and this is a 5.0 transmitter. However, in the Q&A on this item it says it is backwards compatible, which makes sense. Most new standards are.It appears the TaoTronics transmitter is not. To make sure I ran some tests. I could pair my headset with my phone fine. To confirm that it is the problem I also purchased a $18.99 TX9 transmitter. It paired in 2 seconds. Very disappointing.

I bought this because I wanted to be able to use my wireless headphones with my switch lite. I am impressed with the sound quality. I haven’t tried it out yet with my air pods but with my bluedio headset it works great! Also I like how compact it is for traveling.

These work very well.  However the buttons are not very intuitive for setting up and the instructions are tiny.  The instructions do walk you through clearly, unlike some that seem to come from ikea, but I seriously had to use a magnifying glass to read the print.

Once you have paired earbuds to it, just turning them on triggers it to connect.  I use earbuds before bed when the misses has already gone to bed.  I flip tv volume off in the tv menus, and connect buds.  Very simple and works right everytime.unit needs usb power, but most every tv has a built in USB jack so it's easy to connect there.

Sound quality is great when I use headphones to watch TV at night quietly. The previous transmitters would either sound like a AM radio from 100 miles away or cut out every 15 minutes. The range is well over 30 feet walking around my house with no interference. The one gripe is having to keep it plugged in because I don’t know when battery will die kid program

The transmitter/receiver worked quite well; honestly, better than I expected for the price.  Originally bought it to connect two bluetooth headsets to one transmitter.  The initial test worked well.  Our second time setting it up, we must have done the steps in the wrong order, because we couldn't get it to work properly.We put the headsets and the transmitter/receiver to the side for about 15 minutes, meticulously followed the steps for connecting two bluetooth headsets again, and it then worked as expected.

This product is great I connected to the headphone jack in the back of the tv and paired it to my bluethooth headsets and now I can watch tv in bed without disturbing my hubby while he sleeps...love it...one thing I need to mention is whenever you're no longer using your headset will need to unplug the transmitter in order to hear the sound....other wise its a great product

often take long plane trip and want to watch movies on my ipad.  wanted to bluetooth 2 headsets to the ipad and hoped this would do the trick. I even spoke to someone at the company and was told if i used their ear buds and TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter, it would work.  Received my first TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter and every 5 minute connect to one fo the ear buds dropped.  following TaoTronics i paired each earbud directly to a device, which worked fine.  this indicated it was the Transmitter.  TaoTronics sent me a new Transmitter, however, i still have the same problem.

I do not like the procedure you have to go through to pair two devices.  In other words it's a bit cumbersome to turn off the first device you paired while pairing the second device so both my wife and I can use it to watch tv.  It does work well once you get both paired.

It was easy to pair with my headphones But for me I had a hard time trying to figure out how to hook it with my TV . All the YouTube videos showed it plugged into a audio jack on the back of the TV, unfortunately my TV didn't have a headphones jack. My son to the rescue and had it on and working in less than a minute using the other plug enclosed in the box. Excellent sound though my headphones! I'm very pleased!

This works great in my 2012 Honda Odyssey.  The Honda handlink has a terrible delay when playing video on devices.  This transmitter/receiver doesn't have the delay.  If you plan to put it on a projector, as a transmitter, it will not work seamlessly.
Updated: Fab 2019:I had difficulty connecting, but TeoTronics reached out to me directly to fix my issue.  Great customer service!!!!  5 Stars!

Just like other reviews, I’m super impressed with the build quality, performance and ease of use of these little transmitters. Bought two - one for my projector and one for my old school tube amp - and am able to send audio seamlessly from across the room. Highly recommend.EDIT: one of my transmitters stopped working. When plugged in there’s only a red light and no amount of pushing and holding the button gets it to reset. When I pull it off power it just shuts off. Not even a year yet.

So I wanted to be able to use my Bluetooth earbuds with my television so I needed something that would send out a signal since my TV wasn’t set up for this - this item worked perfect and was economical so I didn’t have to spend a fortune on a new TV.
EDIT: Amending from 2-stars to 4 as customer service reached out to me and offered a full refund. Can’t fault that!Here’s the my original, still valid review:

While the product worked great, it was intended for my father to listen to the TV with his AirPods. Being a Baby Boomer generation and an immigrant, getting him to understand all this Bluetooth technology was a bit too much for him. Had to return however product worked really well for those that understand how to use someoneBluetooth technology.

When listening with earbuds at low volumes, you can hear an audible hiss distracting you from the music and making the music quality poor. Other cases like car/stereo/non blue tooth speakers are fine and have no problems.

Terrible does not work.  Tried to connect to a TCL tv so I could hear better at my camper with air conditioning running so I did not have to turn up tv volume.  All I get is a faint sound.  REVIEW UPDATE:  they reached out to me;  sent me an updated version that worked fantastic.  Again the company has reached out Customer Service does all they can to make it right!!

If only Bluetooth worked right out of the gate. That's where this thing goes wrong. Sometimes it works, and sometimes you're spending an hour turning it off and on again just trying to get it to connect to your headphones or whatever.Seriously, until Bluetooth just f-ing works without troubleshooting, I won't be a full supporter. This device is like Bluetooth 1.0, kinda cool, but high maintenance.

Its only been a few weeks and it’s stuck turned on. Nothing is actually connected to it and it wont turn off. Its been on with a solid blue light for 36 hours and I'm just waiting for the battery to die to see if it will work again.

My Amazon Echo Dot was very flaky with my Bose Sound Dock 10 Bluetooth.  Audio constantly dropped out making it almost unusable.  Since the SD10 was a little older I suspected the Bluetooth might be out of date.  Bought the TaoTronics based on the reviews to "replace" the Bose Bluetooth receiver..problem solved.  I use the analog output of the TaoTronics to input to the Bose Sound Dock and it's all good.  Was simple to set up the the dot.

I’m using this adapter to transmit music from an Apple iPad Classic to a SoundLink Revolve+ Bluetooth® speaker. This  device paired to the speaker on the first try. The audio quality is very good. The device transmit range is excellent. It works at 50 ft with mostly open air between it and the speaker. The device is small, very light, and it came with everything you need to get going using it. Extremely happy with this device.

This is our first transmitter/receiver and it works great! It was very easy to set up and remains very easy to use. It holds its battery charge well. We use it to pair portable speakers with the projector and older computers. It's effortless. The small size is a bonus too!

UPDATE ON MY EARLIER COMMENTThis company keeps writing to me requesting for a feedback. I have taken my time because I wanted to be sure of my experience.  This item is a good concept in theory but its tough to get it paired with certain wireless devices . We are using it for wireless headphones paired with our TV and it works sometimes only - you have to fuss with it a million times before it connects etc.  Not sure if the particular item that we received was defective or this is the way it is.

Appeared to have been used as there were signs of wear by a button. Went through the instructions and could not get it to pair with anything but my phone.  Tried it on 2 TV's, 2 Roku Ultra remotes, and nothing.  The manual is almost worthless, the web site was of no help what so ever.  Had it for all of 3 hours and returned it.

Addendum to the previous post. Tatronics read my post and credited my account for the full price I paid. The was over and beyond what I expected. So I’m giving another star for their generous support.This works and sounds great. One drawback though, there’s a lag in the sound. Kind of like watching an old Godzilla vs Mothra movie.

Attention : before anybody buys this there is a one second delay in sound so when you watch movies or maybe use it to play your piano with your  headphones there is a one second delay.... other than that it’s great for the priceUpdate: customer service reached out to me to correct the problem thank you !

Pairing was easy. I did encountered some pairing issue but it was resolved after several attempts and not sure what the issue was. Device is small enough to fit into the pouch of Bose QC20 with the headphone. Satisfied with the purchase overall. Customer service was excellent and followed up with recommendations. It made the an excellent overall experience. Tks Tara and team.

It's a little difficult to do the initial pairing if there are several Bluetooth devices nearby, but once you're past that it's great. I use it with my Bluetooth earphones and he audio out on my TV. Now I can actually hear my movies over the other conversation that seems to make it's way into my TV room.

If you have a hard time hearing the TV or listening to music and everyone else can hear it just fine, this is what you need!! I connect this with my Bluetooth headphones and watch tv, listen to music and it works great! We have two now, and I take them when we travel!

Great little gadget for home and work. Sucks that the battery life is 6-8 hours but it is a bluetooth, charges quick and is very effective over range. I plug this little thing into my mp3 player and put my headset on and go all day at work listening to tunes

I bought this product almost 2 years ago here on Amazon. I contacted support after these 2 years to help me solve a connection problem with a headphone. Got same day response on how to reset the device to pair it again. And, again, it works flawlessly! My wife can watch TV while I sleep next to her. Terrific product! If I’m ever in need of another blueetooth device I’ll certainly buy another Taotronics. Knowing that I’ll get support even 2 years after buying the product is invaluable!

I have this one and also tried the smaller unit.  I bought for travel.  Both have such low volume when paired to my powerbeats 3 on airplanes that i literally can't hear the movies, etc after takeoff.  e.g as a type, on Delta with their newer touch screen displays.  There is also a slight lag; but that is the least of my problems.I don't know if i'm doing something wrong, issue with beats, etc.

Works well, no apparent latency when connected to 65 inch 4K HDTV. Connected two sets of headphones (simultaneously) with no problems or noticeable loss of sound quality. Really like that this can be used while charging. I'm happy with it.

I love this product. I purchased it for use on airlines and let me tell you, it works perfect. The people sitting next to me on flights are in awe of me plugging into the In Flight Entertainment without the use of cords. Works perfectly, Sync's every time no matter where it is used.Love It!

Used this to transmit audio from a record player aux out to a Beoplay P6. Turned off all my other Bluetooth devices to prevent something from automatically connecting to the speaker, then put both devices in pairing mode and brought them close together and they instantly paired.

Using this device to transmit from my processor to wireless headphones. Simple to use, just plug it into the headphone jack, pair it with your headphones and that’s it. I didn’t know what to expect for sound quality but it actually sounds pretty good.

Works well when watching on Roku, but Roku already has some Bluetooth connectivity through my phone. It's still nice that I don't have to use my phone though, cause sometimes that cuts out, but hasn't with this device so far.However, I bought this mainly for when I'm using Chromecast for apps not on Roku, and when I'm using the Chromecast it has a really bad static. I've changed the AUX cord with shorter ones and very long ones, disconnected/re-paired my Bluetooth headphones and it's still bad.

With this Bluetooth transmitter I am now able to connect wireless headphones to my Desktop. The transmitter works like a "champ." The setup instructions are easy to follow. Also, the internal battery provides many hours of listening without having to recharge. Outstanding sound quality with both 4.0 and 5.0 headphones.

I wanted to pair this with my PowerBeats 3 wireless headphones so that I could use them on long flights.  I followed the instructions for pairing exactly as written.  The LED indicators indicated that it was paired, but it would not broadcast music to the headphones.  I tried at least 5 times, each times the same result.  I finally decided to return them to Amazon rather than spend more hours trying to diagnose the problem.

Honestly I can't give a true device quality review, because I can't get it to work. It won't sync. But I don't believe it's the taotronic devices fault. I bought it to try and sync my son's Nintendo Switch to a wireless headset so he could use audio & voice chat, but the way the Nintendo Switch was made, I don't think it is compatible to do that OR I just don't know what I'm doing. I will more than likely be returning it, due to it not being what I need, not because of the devices quality or anything.
This works well. I can use my wireless bluetooth headphones to watch tv without disturbing my roommate!

Pairing with the Bluetooth headset was very very difficult and took a long time, also this type of unit really does need to have some type of volume control build in because that was needed for my purpose, Because the AirPods do not have a volume control in them and I needed it to boost the TV signal

Works awesome! Once unboxed, I let it charge for 2 hrs as instructed. Operated like it says. I connected it with my old Sansa Clip and paired it with my new 3M worktunes with bluetooth capability. The sound quality is excellent and clear. The device is pretty much the same size of my Sansa Clip :) No issues so far.

My wife is a night nurse and sleeps during the day.  This transmitter works amazingly for me.  I can watch television in our living room next to our master bedroom at full volume because I'm able to wear wireless headphones with the transmitter.  10/10!

I used this transmitter on airline flight and I find it extremely convenient when I have to get up, because I can continue to follow my movie, as far as to the airplane bathroom. I would buy it again and actually have bought one for my wife.
manual was online - easy to setup and useI have their wireless in-earphones
Bought this in 2017, worked great in truck  (2013) for a few months.Stopped using it for a couple years, decided to charge it up and start using again.

Purchased this product twice.  I use it in Tx mode in airplanes to use their entertainment system with my Bluetooth headphones rather than carry a 2nd wired or bulkier combination headphone.I used the same device in Rx mode my older non Bluetooth stereo system to stream music from my phone but then I ended up purchasing another one dedicated to that.

Great product. My last unit was not perfect and the seller "Sunvalley Brands" replaced it with a good working one.I am very happy with this product. There are cheaper versions of it on the market but none of them work as well as this one.

This gadget is perfect. I use it for my outside spa on the tv I have out there. I plug into that tv to broadcast its sound via Bluetooth to my wireless Bluetooth headphones. I use these gadgets because when the spa jets are full blast, I can’t hear the TV’s built in speakers. The quality of transmission is perfect, the battery life is great, and it easily and quickly recharges. My only regret is I wish I had found this transmitter sooner.

This small device packs a powerful punch. I use it to wirelessly play music on my Roku TV from my iPhone or iPad. I thought I would have to learn how to use it, but it pairs easily with all of my devices and the sound quality is awesome. By awesome sound, I mean, clarity, bass and vocals are crisp and clear. I'm very happy with this device and highly recommend it. If you're considering it - look no further. You've found a gem!

Not sure if I received a model that was defective but sometimes I’m getting sound delay at night and no delay during the day. Base on the reviews, I’m going to assume I have a defective device BUT that did not stop me from purchasing a new unit. I’ve gone through several hours without charging. Battery life is excellent. Device is super small and light. Overall, good product for the price!

I love the sound and also the quality. The only thing I didin't like was that when the device is connected to a usb port from the smart tv thre is loud sound coming with the audio channel, don't know why. I just connected to an electrical outlet with an usb charger and works perfectly.

Was fast n easy to connect on my computer via 3.5mm jack. 20 seconds total. But am disappointed with latency in videos.....seems like maybe 0.5 seconds latency vs video. If for audio only, sound seems very good.Pricewise - do some homework. I paid $27.19 but the same model (TTBA07) is available from the same vendor for $10.99.

I am trying to figure how to connect the transmitter to my visio sound bar so I may use bluetooth headphones while the audio is still playing for other listeners in the room. I am disappointed that  plugging the  transmitter directly to my tv won't allow external audio for others.

Works pretty well with my Television and was very pleased how quick it paired I tried using it with my dj equipment i plug it into my mixer but the more I turned it up it started to sound differentbut i was pushing around 8000 watts

I always loved the way my cheap wired Sony Headphones sounded. I attached the unit to my headphones and they became wireless. Haven’t tested it on my Nintendo Switch yet but it will be nice to pair it with my other Sony WH-1000XM3! I highly recommend this product!!!

It works well.  I use this device with an older Apple IPOD so now I am able to use my Bluetooth earbuds instead of a wired headset. Both devices use the open headphone port.  I am amble to use it with  a portable radio along with my Bluetooth earbuds,

My wife says that the tv is to loud all the time, so I thought I would find something where I could use my headset and she could have the remote. This is the best investment I have made. Works great! I bought another one for the bedroom.

Works as expected so far, but could not register the product on Taotronics site - it's saying all the time that order does not exist, which is frustrating.Update: Even though I was not expecting any contact from customer service and did not consider a registration to be a huge issue, they still contacted me and proposed several options to manage my frustration. I highly appreciate such proactive behavior, so make a change to 5 stars.

Never got these to work. Pairs with my headphones from tv, then no sound from headphones. Called amazon 3-4 times, they could not help. Never could reach anyone from company. I give up. Tv has Bluetooth connection since has stream, smart tv. So no idea why won’t work. Headphones work so that’s not it. Very disappointed.

Just buy anything but this.  It worked for about 2 months until I couldn't return it and stopped working.  I couldn't get it to work, and there's not tech support so as any EE (Electrical Engineer) I took it apart.  WOW!!!  I couldn't even fix the connections and I work for a defense contractor.  Don't waste your money.

When I saw the description of low latency I decided to try this for an in-ear monitor in a sound system at church. While the product works there was an uncomfortable latency in the vocal microphones that made this product unusable for what I wanted. Unfortunately that is the nature of Bluetooth headphones, so I don't blame the product because it looks to be very well made.

So good I bought three of them. Good sound are use them for Hiking with my iPhone X XS max. Only one issue doesn’t work for talking on the phone. But I don’t really care about that when I’m hikingI gave them a five star rating for high-quality sound

This device works as advertised. We use it in our RV. Our TV does not have a speaker system and due to an A/C located between the TV and where we set it is hard to control the volume. We hooked this transmitter up to a Bluetooth speaker between the seats where we set and problem solved. Easy to set up if u follow the instruction. Good quality and sound. Great price. You can’t go wrong.

I bought two very expensive TVs. They claim to have Bluetooth. But none of my Bluetooth headphones were compatible.  I bought a TaoTronics transmitter, plugged it into the earphone jack and ALL my headphones work great with it.  Lot of other things I can do with this nifty transmitter too!

This product was compact enough to be easily portable and the ability to use it as both a Bluetooth transmitter and receiver was just what I needed for only needing one device to handle each situation. The battery life is also impressive.

This is a great solution for the old TV my wife and I have that doesn't have Bluetooth. We are getting older and having the ability to connect a headset to the TV wireless is awesome. Setup was simple and it works great with every Bluetooth headset we have tried to use with it. Everything needed to connect this was with it. Highly recommend!

It was a little work to figure out how to connect it to my wife's Apple Ear Pods, but we did finally figure it out. Now she is able to watch to tv through them and is very happy. This is what we wanted it for and it works so all is good.

I ordered this because I wanted to Bluetooth my mic to my Nintendo switch. Unfortunately with this having a send and receive switch, it can only either play the sound or let me use my mic, not both.This isn't the products fault though so I'm still giving it 5 stars because for connecting with Bluetooth headphones it does work. Just be aware it's not good for gaming.

The problem is layency / delay. There is a solid 1-2 second delay even when only 1 foot away from the earbuds. The earbuds support the low latency required and no latency when direct connected without this device. I needed this for non blue tooth devices but the delay is terrible.

Using to connect a game system to a large blue tooth speaker. It was a little tricky to get sinked up but once you get past that it does the job well. It is super small to, so you could slip it away anywhere without it being an eyesore.

Works fine but I like to leave my bluetooth adapters on (and on a 5v wall wart) for remote use but this unit shuts off automatically after some (several minutes) of dormancy .... so you have to press the mate button to wake it up each time you use it.  Not great for my application as it is in a remote location in my application.

Just got this device today, been using it for the past couple hours. A tip that may be common sense, but took a minute for me to figure out. If you have digital or satellite television, connect the device to the cable box A/V ports and “not” your televisions A/V ports. Besides that, setup was simple once I got through the instructions.Only con is the volume, there is no volume control on the device, so you control volume with your headphones in my case. It’s not loud enough for me (may be my headphones), but I’ll try another pair and see what the results.

It works well. I use it to hook up my blue tooth ear phones to the bedroom TV. ( my husband says thanks! He does not watch late night tv). I reduced one star because it was difficult to get everything working. Our daughter helped, but it even took her a little bit.
It works just fine with one caveat.  The latency is way too much to use as a wireless musical instrument cable, otherwise it’s good.

Worked great! I hooked it up directly to old Peavey amp running 4 Cerwin Vega speakers to play songs from my cell phone. Sounds awesome totally rocking the neighborhood. Awesome little gadget works great! Purchased 2nd one to gift to a friend help build her stereo also!GREAT PRODUCT HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!

It does what it says it does. It’s super small. Finally I can hear the TV in the patio while I go out for a cigarette. I’m not missing the movie or shows I like. It performs as it is advertised. It is not a Pro solution, but it does the trick.

I had to pay a $6 restocking fee to return this item, which didn’t work. It was complete garbage. I bought it, because it was recommended from a reviewer on YouTube (maybe he was sponsored). Look at the reviews, only 69% of the reviews is 5 stars.

I really like this device. It has worked perfectly with every device I've used it with (both TX and RX). This is the second TaoTronics unit I've bought (sadly my first one was stolen from my vehicle), and both units worked just as well. The fit and finish one the device is excellent - wow! So small! The range is excellent and the sound is exactly what I expected. The battery seems to last forever.I would most certainly purchase this TaoTronics Bluetooth TX/RX again.

Works and connects to my Beats solo3 Bluetooth headphones. My hearing is poor. I bought this to replace old Sony over the ear wireless headphones. I did not realize my Panasonic Plasma TV only has optical audio out. I plugged the sound wire to audio out on the cable box. OK but no sound with the Roku stick.  Should have bought the optical compatible model. Also I had no USB ports to charge. Used old iPhone charger  plug for USB.  I don’t use the ROKU on this TV so I will keep this.
I like it

Amazing product, i leave it in my car and it works great, i have also used it to connect to bluetooth devices which i think is the best part. Easy to connect to and it has a long battery life, charge it like once every 2 weeks if its in my car, less time deppending how often you use it, great for using wired head phones for iphone users so now you have “wireless head phones”

This bluetooth transmitter/receiver works great! I wanted it to plug into my headphone jack in my stereo receiver so I could use my bluetooth headphones and get rid of the wired ones. Wow, it worked!! Others said they did and didn't. Highly recommended. I don't use it for volume control.

I bought this so I can connect my Beats to my tv so I can watch tv at night or play games without disturbing anyone in the house. This thing works great, connects pretty quick to my headphones and as easy instructions for pairing your devices. Would definitely recommend.

Like this so much that I bought another soon after! I'll probably get more too. I use one in transmit mode to send TV audio to bluetooth headphones. I use the other in receive mode to make wired headphones wireless while I charge my iPhone ... and I also take it in the car in receive mode and hook up to the aux of my head unit to make it bluetooth capable.

Be very sure as to what codecs your headphones support, aptx is not the same as aptx low latency. I purchased this product to use Bluetooth headphones with my tv, but he resulting latency was way too distracting and I returned it. Does the job well enough for music though.

I am a fitness instructor so I travel between stereo for classes. This a a well mage small Bluetooth adapter. My phone knows it so it’s always a quick sync. It’s great having phone close by for volume adjustments because not all somgs are at the same volume

Connected via Bluetooth easily the first few times with no issues. Now it sounds scratchy (as if it had been abused by a child yanking on it...no yanking, no child) and has issues with transmitting to the headphones. Not worth it. Opt for a better product from another company.

This thing is awesome. I bought a little MINI just for commuting to work. It's a 2013 and while it has bluetooth, MINI did not see fit to allow music over the connection. Gah!  TaoTronics to the rescue. Cheap enough that I don't even remember what I paid for it, it just sits in the center console cubby, I press the button for five seconds, my phone connects, and Pandora is with me for the 2 1/2 - 3 hours of daily commute time. Sweet. Not the commute time. The music.I can't speak to using it as a Bluetooth transmitter. No need for that functionality.

I used it on an airplane to watch a movie with my bluetooth headphones-worked well. However, at my gym where we have TV's on some equipment, it seems to "time out" which I think is due to the older TV setups, rather than the product, since it worked uninterrupted on the plane.

Easy to connect. Range was very good. I was able to leave the room and I was still connected. I’m using wireless  Bluetooth earphones from another company I purchased from Amazon. I used this product as soon as I received it from Amazon. No complaint from wife for loud tv.

It worked for about twice- but then could not get it to pair w/my BoseQCII headphones. I went through every possible variable to have the headphones connect to the Tao and work with the Bose app on my phone. Had to disconnect, re-pair, clear device list, turn Bluetooth on/off and could not get it to connect the audio of my Visio TV to my headphones again. At this point the aggravation factor makes this product not worth th cost.

I use this to transmit iPhone Music to my stereo and to listen to TV audio on my headphones. Easy set up, solid connection, no drop outs, even when I'm in the next room. Good battery life. The fact that it transmits and receives is very cool. Highly recommended.

I Use this transmitter/reciever with an old pair of Sony headphones (plus a 1/4" to 1/8" adapter) to connect to my mac pro. (Using bootcamped windows 7 on my mac.) Works great, paired right up and my games sound just perfect. No noticeable lag in sound and no difference in quality between wired connection and bluetooth. Now I can game in peace without bothering the rest of the family. Also no more cords to get tangled in.

In my case, charging it every now and then is not a big deal, since I bought it in case that I needed to use a little TV I have in my office to watch training material (training sites, YouTube, and etc). I have been getting TaoTronics products for a few years now, and I am very pleased with them.

This works great both as a receiver and a transmitter. I use this connected to my home theater. When I want to stream music from my phone it acts as a receiver and when I want to watch TV without disturbing anyone I use this as a transmitter for my bluetooth headphones.

I fly a lot and this goes well with the Bose QC35 II while traveling on a plane. Easy to pair and last for 10 hours on a full charge. Charge time is 2 hours so that will last most flights. I have seen this also used for portable game players and bluetooth headphone. It is also small enough to easily carry in most headphone cases.

This device works well with new and old receivers. I plug this into an audio input and now I can stream my digital content. I have not tried this device yet in the transmit mode. The charge lasts about 12 hrs. It pairs up well with apple products.
Cant pair this. Device is not recognized by my galaxy s10 plus. My phone has no problem recognizing other bluetooth peripherals....**Update**

Due to the layout of our home, I had to connect our surround system for our theater room, wirelessly. This transmitter does a really good job. Although I know this my system, is not true surround sound since it's connected through BT,I still find the audio quality great. Most of my family couldnt tell the differen. It has some very slight latency, but doesn't ruin the experience at all. It is small and sleak. Would definetly recommend this

I really liked this product. It synced easily and the sound quality was very good.  The latency was not noticeable when I tried it with music or videos. I wanted to use this to connect my Bluetooth headphones to the output on my guitar amp so I could practice and not bother the family. The latency from my amp through blue tooth was a full second so it would not work for my intended purpose. If I needed it to watch video or listen to music it would have been great.

This worked pretty well for awhile and then just crapped out.I was past Amazons 30 day return policy, so I contacted the seller. They were very good about arranging for a relacement, which arrived within a few days

I use this to connect with my projector and transmit sound to my new Bluetooth soundbar.  This device did auto connect with the soundbar without any issue and no sound delay.  However, there is no way to control which receiver should receive the sound.  IT JUST BROADCAST SOUND TO EVERY BLUETOOTH RECEIVERS!!

I am hard of hearing and use a Bluetooth headset when watching TV the satellite receiver we used had Bluetooth built in but we switched to cable and they did not have it built into their box or offer it so I had to do something else checked Amazon found this ordered it on Saturday received it on Monday, easy hookup and works perfectly now I’m thinking about getting one for my shop so I can listen to the radio while working

I bought this to listen to my scanner via headphones. In transmit mode it causes interference to the point that it makes the audio hard to understand.  If a longer cable was used it might reduce the amount of interference.

Excellent Bluetooth transmitter. I use a turntable connected to my computer to digitize older music and just enjoy vinyl but wanted to be able to listen on the larger bluetooth-enabled speaker in another room. This took all of 2 minutes to connect and start listening. I’m very happy with it and am listening to my 1978 Grease soundtrack!

This is just what we needed.  My wife and I wanted to each have a Bluetooth headset listening to the tv in our bedroom at the same time so the tv sound doesn't wake our baby.This Bluetooth receiver is smaller than I had expected as well.  I can power it up with the USB on the TV and it also has an internal battery.  It's fairly easy to link both Bluetooth headsets, and comes with simple to follow instructions.

When we attached this device to our tv, and got it linked to our speaker, it would work for maybe 3 min's top, then it would shut off. We turned it on again, linked to our speaker, and again turned off in 3 min's or under. We tried several times of turning it on and every time after a couple of min's it would just shut off.  This device is not worth the time nor the money. We just ended up wasting $30.00.

I like the product; especially with the ability to sync with 2 devices simultaneously.  It was a bit slow to sync with my Apple AirPods but it finally linked up. I do not see any way to control the volume with this device when you are connected to the audio output on rear of TV and going into my AirPods.

Came In early and used it to connect to a projector in my backyard.. it is small and did the the job wonderfully connecti g the projector to Bluetooth speakers!!  Gets Powers via USB, turn on, double tap the power button after turned on and it will sync.. done!!

Works great, I have an older laptop with bluetooth 1.0 adapter and can't use a USB bluetooth adapter, this works fantastic to just plug in the headphone jack and transmit the signal to speakers or headphones.You can use 2 devices but lag increases, if you are watching a movie in videolan, you can correct audio delay.

Small, light, and easy to use. Puts out great quality sound with no noticeable latency when watching TV, and you know how bad it is when the lips don't line up with the audio. Works with my AT Pro metal detector, as well as my old ipod classic. It's really great to be wireless with both of them.

The transmitter - receiver is easy to setup and pair, provides good sound with no sync issues when using it to watch TV. Battery life is good and it's small and light weight. All that at a price that won't break the bank.

The TaoTronics Bluetooth Transmitter and Receiver is exactly what I needed in my life! I am required to fly A LOT for my job and I always want to watch movies on the entertainment system on the back of the seat but I only have bluetooth headphones. Now, I simply plug in the bluetooth transmitter and I can get the audio from the movies directly to my bluetooth headphones. This is a MUST HAVE for people who travel a lot!

Overall it's a helpful product, it can act as either a receiver or a transmitter, carrying sound signal in between two devices.However, when I pair it up with my headset, I experienced a noticeable delay in between the sound from source and the headset.

This product has been nothing but trouble for me regarding connectivity. I spent more time resetting it then it actually worked. I trusted the great reviews but it has not worked consistently since I purchased it. Though the company’s customer service tried to help they have been unsuccessful. So for me this product was a real lemon. I will purchase a replacement from a more reliable company.Update 8/25  the company contacted me and sent me a new and improved model. Very impressive service and this new model worked perfectly! So I have added stars.

Until now we used some full-size “over the ear” headphones to watch a second TV when this would conflict with others in the room or nearby. This unit is very small in size and plugs into the sound outlet of the TV. The pairing is likewise simple - double click the “home” button. Like many small size devices of this type, the battery life is limited which requires the unit be recharged after watching for one evening. This device must be removed from the TV’s sound outlet to hear in normal operation.Works great!
Perfect for what I needed it for! Except the cord is quite finnicky and cuts out easily :( I'll have to replace the AUX cable with one of my own. This is unfortunate as I preferred the shorter cable

Works just  as promised. I was hesitate to try this brand out. It was so easy to sync my PS4 and Air Pod Pros together. I literally just had to plug it into my controller hit the pair button and boom I can now play and chat using my Air Pod pros. Only thing I wish was different was having some sort of volume control. I have the volume maxed out via settings in PS4 and it’s fine just wish it could get a little louder. Other than that I’m very happy with my purchase.

A simple little device I use in my car to play music off my phone since my fancy smartphone doesn't have a headphone port and the USB C port is wallowed out. Sounds almost as loud as the CD player, which is much louder than using an AUX cable by itself (probably because the thing is also plugged into the power supply). Haven't used it the other way around (as a Bluetooth transmitter to a device like a speaker as opposed to a Bluetooth receiver like I'm using it in my car) but I assume it works just as well. Very happy with this

Good for the price. Kinda easy to pair, definitely read the instructions first. Once it’s paired it work seamlessly. When the battery is low, the range of the Bluetooth suffers. Did what it said it would. I would buy it again.

The company sent me a replacement which works perfectly. Good customer service.What a disappointment, the product worked great for two months, then it would not keep a charge anymore. I realize that Amazon doesn't warrant anything it sells after 30-days, so it was a poor investment.

Wanted to connect my bluetooth headset to tv which i was not able before. Looked into reviews i ordered it. Now during night I don’t have to play my tv loud and connect my bluetooth headset which won’t disturb anybody now.Easy pairing to bluetooth speaker/ headset no need to worry

This device stops transmitting if sound does not go over a certain threshold, so if you are listening to a song or movie that is using low sounds to set a mood, it will NOT transmit that. Watching movies or TV shows was impossible for me because it was dead silent in almost everything except dialogue and action scenes.

Got this because I was hoping to be able to use my Bluetooth headphones to chat on my ps4. This does NOT work as the ps4 doesn't recognize the microphone. The volume through the speakers is very low.The first unit was DOA, but the second works as intended.

I like the small size of this, but I need a to "rent a kid" to help me install this to my TV!  The instructions aren't clear enough for this non-techie to understand how to hook it up.  Once I get it installed properly, I'll re-evaluate the product.
I bought this so I could use my bluetooth headphones with my switch and PS4. Works awesome with no audio delay.

What an awesome product! I can't believe how inexpensive it was for what I recieved.  It's small,  easy to use,  and the sound quality is excellent.  No crackling or breaking up. I bought one of these on Oct 3rd, and liked it so much that I bought another one 3 weeks later to put in my husband's vehicle!

Updating due to customer service who contacted me when they saw thie review.  They were really great although there is nothing that can be done about the lack of pairing.Do not buy for your Bose Soundlink Mini 2.  It will not work.
This a great Bluetooth transmitter/receiver.Works great with my Sony TV and my Jabra Elite 75T Bluetooth earbuds.

Works great as a transmitter (where bluetooth was present before) to bluetooth headphones\speakers. Also doubles as receiver from bluetooth enabled devices. I connect in transmit mode to my TV and the steam the audio to my bluetooth headphones. I connect in receiver mode to my old stereo and stream music from my smartphone

I use this on my Skull Candy Crusher large headphones when I go running. I live in Texas and have used them extensively on super hot days this summer. I use them for hour long runs in direct sunlight and this things are a beast. The range is very good and strong. I have gone to separate rooms and it still stays connected. Battery life is excellent and long lasting. I would recommend this to anyone looking to get into the Bluetooth game, lol.

I used to have a 12 foot cable from the TV to my treadmill and, of course, the dangling cord to my earphones.  This transmitter works great and the power on/power and Bluetooth connected/disconnected light signals are very understandable.  Switching between my treadmill and the elliptical has become a piece of cake!!

Love this product. It’s lightweight. Just as light as an ipod shuffle. It connects extremely fast with my Bluetooth headphonesz i bought a gold plated 3.5mm to connect for my ipod shuffle and the music was clear and loud as using a plugin jack. Totally worth it. The only thing I had project was not being able to use the controls on my ijoy Bluetooth headphones, but other than that no prob.

This arrived and I eagerly connected to a speaker and paired it only to lose the connection in a few seconds.  This went on with each device I tried it with.  It does not matter if it was my phone, laptop or stereo, none would hold a connection.  This is going back and i'll try from another vendor and manufacture.

I am trying to connect multiple machines to one set of speakers. One of those is a laptop with only a headphone out. So instead of having to buy a headphone amp, I bought this, put it in target mode, connected to the laptop, plugged the other end into the speaker switch. Voila! No wires from the laptop's headphone port. Taotronics is 2 for 2 in my book - I just got a headset from them and it is also a five start item.

After some research, ordered this item. It arrived on time and its quality exceeded my expectation for its price. I really liked both the TX TR together also its size which is very tiny and convenient to carry along with my headphones. It pairs well with other headsets. Comfortable for watching TV.

Blue tooth pairing was a PITA for both AirPods Pro and Beats Pro.  Bought these to watch TV late at night without pissing off GF.  It does transmit but only in mono.  Does transmit in stereo if plugged into iPhone

I wish I could rate this but I can’t get anything to pair with it. Might be me, might be the transmitter. Hoping that my son can figure it out because I need sleep and my husband watches the tv until 5 and 6 in the morning.

It does it's job.  There are at least two newer versions, but on a budget and within 30 feet, you'll get decent sound.  It's no nonsense, no volume control or other extras.I only use it to transmit, but it can be used to receive Bluetooth signal too.

This is an amazing little product to turn my stereo system into a Bluetooth system.  I can listen to my movies at good volumes (LOUD to my non-hard of hearing family) and enjoy.  So much better than the cord I had used previously.

I bought a pair of these low latency aptX model receivers/transmitters (TT-BA07).  I connected the audio out of my projector with one in Transmitter mode and the second in Receiver mode to my stereo receiver.  Paired both with each other without issue.The audio and video are significantly out of sync. Around 100-200ms of latency and very noticeable when people are speaking.  A wired RCA connection from the projector to the receiver has no noticeable audio latency.

I used it for my long distant flight and it was always out of battery before my Bose headphone did. Kind of annoying if the plane doesn’t have charging outlet. Easy to use but I might need to buy a shorter cable to hide the unit out of the way.

Purchased this as a gift for bluetooth transmitter for a non-bluetooth Samsung smart TV. I tested it and it to work fine. It connected right away. But since this was a gift I was not able to test it any further.

Item works but has a weird static sound.  I was contacted and and was given an upgraded model that works great.  Also recommend their earbuds that work very nice as well.Was the best customer support I have ever had.

*update - device doesn’t even power anymoreThis product worked great for about a month and a half but now it’s useless.  Volume is extremely low and whenever it’s plugged in to a power supply (usb) I get super high volume screeching and then low volume music in the background.  Would appreciate a refund or I’ll just have to go with another company from now on

It's a very cool device that allows me to connect it to the TV and watch a movie with headphones without disturbing anybody. I didn't notice any latency and the special wires to connect to the TV are included. I highly recommend buying it.

It used to work and now it’s doesn’t. At all. I can’t get it to connect to anything. No Bluetooth. I’ve watched How To videos. Read the whole How To papers that came with it. Absolutely CANNOT get it to hook up. Worked for maybe a month. I can’t get ahold of any customer service for troubleshooting.

USB cable is short - Cannot plug-in to the USB wall port for charging. Somehow i used an extension cord. But i was not able to pair my MPOW Blue tooth headset. Tried another headset but couldn't pair that also.

I still use old USB MP3 players for long trips so that I don't drain the battery on my phone.  Just bought Trekz Air by AfterShokz bone induction headphones (which ONLY uses bluetooth).  Now, with the TaoTronics Transmitter, I don't have to give up using my old devices.  Great Product - worth the money!  The pairing is a little clunky so practice BEFORE using.  (i.e. driving)  Also, because this can be used to pair speakers with a tv for private listening, remember to switch (sending/receiving) when using with different types of devices.

The "Wireless 2-in-1 Adapter" now allows me increased capacity using receivers and players without Bluetooth capacity.Pairing the Bluetooth transmission between different devices is elementary, and only took a few minutes to work out. I'm noticing no sound distortion compared to previous connections.
Love that it can transmit or receive, I keep it in my kit as I move from office to office.  Using right now on the headphone output on my stereo so I can watch Netflix without disturbing my roommate.

I bought this to use at college so when I watched movies and TV I could listen through my headphones and not disturb my roommates. It plugs right into the headphone jack on my Insignia TV that’s probably 9 years old. It is a little difficult to connect to the first time, I use Altec-Lansing headphones (couldn’t get my AirPods to connect), but after the first time it works flawlessly. Charges fast and the battery lasts for a long time too! If you are looking for something cheap and easy to connect headphones to your TV, I recommend this.

I have used this for transmission only, not receiving a bluetooth signal. On my TV with an 3.5 mm jack, it works flawlessly with my bluetooth earbuds, and I don't notice any latency. With my AV receiver, where I had to purchase an adapter with a 3.5 mm jack, I do need to occasionally unpair and then re-pair those same earbuds, but I don't know if that's the transmitter or the adapter that's causing the issue, and there is an ever-so-slight latency noted if you really pay attention. Overall, this is a great purchase to listen to audio without disturbing others.

The product is amazing with no static and clear sounds. I mainly purchased to turn my iPod shuffle into Bluetooth which was easy to pair, I also used it to pair my headphones with my smart tv. Great product, highly recommended.

Open the box, open directions to pair device page,  connect wire to unit then to TV, pair unit to earbuds, listen. Took 2 minutes. Good sound too.Listened from Samsung tv to airpods pro and jabra 65t successfully.

Bought this for my brother. He is using it mostly for transmission to a bluetooth headset.works perfectly. Its not been tried as a receiver as yet.but its bluetooth and once it is connected and transmission is good receiving. Will also be good.Very easy to set up.

Sound quality is not very good. Havent noticed any latency which is good. Overall it is an ok device. Nice to have for wathcing tv at late nights with a bluetooth headphone.Update: amazing customer service. They have sent a replacement and the sound quality is much better.

I purchased this to use my bluetooth headphones while watching TV at night. What I like about it is not only does it serve that purpose, but I can use my headphones on anything with a jack! Also, it can also receive a signal should I need to reverse the signal. I feel like I bought the key to the bluetooth universe. Dig it!
Followed directions to the letter.Used 2 different Blue Tooth speakers to connect to this devise.

Just what I was looking for in setting up my pool side TV to connect with some LG PK5 Bluetooth speaker.  We can move the speaker around the pool to suite our needs. Have not been successful in pairing two speakers with it at the same time but that may just be the LG speakers or my lack of understanding how to do it. Only reason I took off one star. This little device is pretty cool!

I use this with a modded ipod classic 5.5 and a pair of true wireless iems, works like a charm. It is attached using small velcro pads and a tiny cable I took off a portable headphone amp I had lying around, the included cable is a tad long for this purpose.

This combination transmitter/Receiver works perfectly for my needs.  I use it on my cable box to transmit to a pair of TT Bluetooth headphones for watching TV late at night without disturbing anyone,  No perceivable delays.  I also use it in various places as a BT receiver, older car, garage stereo, etc.  Great coverage and very compact size.  Very happy with this purchase.

I have ordered 6 of these over the past 2 years.  They work perfect.  Mostly I have set up 2 speakers for hard to hear elderly.  They love the fact that each person gets to control their own volume or take one in the kitchen while they are working. I’m a big fan of TaoTronics and have purchase several electronic items from them. They all work great.  From a led light to noise canceling headphones.  All items look great and work great.

Volume can not go very high regardless of how high it is set at. The lag time is noticable but not that big of a deal since it's only a few seconds if that. Connecting it to your Bluetooth speaker or headphones can be a pain at first but after the first time it's easy. The charge life for it definitely needs improvement. You get maybe 4 hours before having to charge it again but a plus is it can be used while charging. All in all it does what I bought it for and the price was not that bad especially since some of the other ones on the market have the same issues but you pay double for them.
