I needed this for my turn table to transmit out, so sound quality was very important.Getting connected to a single speaker wasn't super hard but adding a second was a little bit more difficult and I still haven't gotten both to work simultaneously. Overall I am happy and do recommend.
Worked ok but connecting to devices was difficult and 2 weeks would not power on

Bought this in 2016 it’s 2020. Only used it 6-8 times. It was part of my backyard movie setup For my kids. Will not sync with anything anymore. I got what I paid for. Might buy a bigger one for front yard movies so the neighborhood kids.

Bought this after having really good experience with TaoTronics' bluetooth headphones and soundbar for my TV. I bought this transmitter to use while riding my stationary bike and not having to worry about running a cord from my TV to bike and it's worked great (albeit I really need to use it more). So far I've been very impressed with TaoTronics' products and this is no exception.

Purchased this product hoping it would allow me to practice the guitar with wireless headphones. Unfortunately there is a several millisecond delay rendering this device useless for any live application or where playback is synced. Sound quality seemed fine but I couldn't stand playing with the delay for more than about 3 minutes so I have no idea how the battery life is. It was easy to get the headphones connected.UPDATE based on this review the seller contacted me to issue a refund. The delay i experienced is typical of any Bluetooth product.  They said with low latency compatible headphones the delay might be as short as 7 to 10 ms.  The device has found a home converting one of my old stereos to be now Bluetooth capable. I appreciate the awesome customer service.

This is my second blue tooth device from them and they've always performed flawlessly. Battery life is excellent. I also have a TaoTronics humidifier which is great!Highly recommend ToaTronics products!

I bought this transmitter so that I could listen to my TV through my bluetooth headphones (Beats). It works phenomenally. Each night I am able to turn it on, pair within 10 seconds, and enjoy watching shows while my wife sleeps. The volume control is more than adequate for this use.

Make sure when trying to pair to M90-RT hearing aid that you don't already have hearing aid paired to 2 devices. They worked once initially but then stopped pairing. I had to remove them from my Apple TV and iPad and reset the transmitter by switching to receive mode and turning power on to erase stored info and redo transmit mode pairings. Have worked great since.

I purchased this to transmit a signal to wireless ear buds on a metal detector instead of wired headphones. My biggest concern was lag which would have been a deal killer. They seem to be almost instant. Much better than using hot, wired headphones. I like it.

Using this for connectivity to a stereo head unit as a receiver only where multiple different people have access.  So far 7 varieties of Android and IOS devices of assorted models.  No one has experience any difficulty connecting through it.
Great Little unit.  Got for the aux input on boat stereo to avoid having phone tethered out on the dash.  Worked great for this purpose.Easy pairing. Good audio quality.

Charged the unit out of the box. Paired my phone via Rx and my Samsung sound bar via Tx. One time. It never paired again, nor would it be recognizable through Rx. Charged, reset my sound bar, refreshed my Bluetooth on my phone, etc. Returned the item. Crazy how the very limited number of negative reviews are more accurate than the overwhelming number of positives.

Overall good product, I guess. Perhaps it was the headphone that made the sound quality not the greatest. I had to turn up more than I thought. Still, the main reason for purchase was accomplished... 12 yr, NON-Bluetooth installed  into Bluetooth ready.

When this worked it worked perfectly. The sound is great.  But I kept having troubles almost every time I used it. It would take several tries to connect with my headphones. And it would want to pair each time.

I cannot rate the battery life or durability yet but I read the reviews on the this product and it was highly rated.  I have been using another brand of transmitter but was very dissatisfied.  If this item proves to  be more satisfactory, I will definitely order again.

I've wanted a device like this for a Digital Studio but I was afraid that there would be a lag between the input and the sound. When I first started looking for devices like this a couple of years ago many of the reviews talked about this problem.  This transmitter works perfectly.  I've successfully transmitted and received with this unit. This is about the 5th Tao product I've purchased and they are all still operational.

I didn't think the Bluetooth adapter was going to be that good because how cheap it is. I use it on my tv at night with Bluetooth headset so not to keep the wife awake. it works great. I have it plugged into the headphones out jack and the usb to keep it powered and works perfectly

This works flawlessly for both of my phones. I can do podcasts, audiobooks, GPS programs, everything. No issues. It MIGHT be user error on my end as I cannot get either phone to actually work as a phone through this device. So buyer beware as if there is a workaround for this I have not found it yet.

So essentially I was looking for a device I could plug into the output of my record player, so I could connect that signal to some bluetooth speakers that I wanted to place elsewhere in a room. This worked perfectly.High sound quality and no latency (that I can notice), I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS.

I bought this transmitter because I was looking for one that gave more than 8 hours or more of listening. It works perfect. It was easy to pair to my headphones. It can be used in 2 modes as a transmitter or receiver. I also liked the heavy duty adapter that comes with unlike some of the other, which are flimsy and disrupts me from listening. Cost a little more than some of the others, but worth it.

There is nothing not to like, except maybe non-intuitive pairing: I have to search for documentation in the internet(s) every time I want to pair a new device (it only has one button, so, how do I do it again? :) ). Other than that, I just love it!

Due to work from home, I wanted a splitter that can be connected to a bluetooth headset for my wife to be able to watch TV without interrupting office and this was an excellent solution to provide an isolation without impacting what we want to do.

I have been searching for a device that can help me bring the latest technology to my old iPod Classic 64GB. This was the solution! It took a little while to pair with my Bluetooth device but after that it was a breeze. I cannot complain! Now I can listen to all my great music through Bluetooth connectivity.I highly recommend it!
Absolutely NOT . Printed return shipping lable 3 minutes after trying it out,.EDIT:

Bought 2 of these BT units  which came with all of  the necessary connection cables. Set up as a transmitter from the tv and receiver to the wireless headphone charging stand next to my bed. They connect quickly every time and the sound is excellent.

I use this clever Blue-Tooth wireless transmitter to feed TV "audio out" sound to a small Bose speaker located across the room or even on an outside patio.  It worked perfectly right out of the box!  The unit is well built, artistic to the eye, small, with a very understandable User Manual.  Also, arrived in 4 days.  5 stars all the way!

I bought these to use as a headphone transmitter with a musical instrument, but the latency is so high as to make them useless in this situation.  They would also be out of sync with a video broadcast, so I would recommend against them in that case too.  They would be fine for streaming music from an audio-only source where the high latency wouldn't matter.

BT pairing was very simple after referencing directions. If audio source is TV Audio OUT 3.5mm jack, ensure receiving device has QUALCOMM codec or you will experience an audio delay with respect to the pic displayed on TV.  Output from stereo receiver thru BT adapter was flawless.

I am not a tech savvy person (I am 72 years old.) and could not figure out how to sync it with a non-blue tooth TV. Tara at Taetronics walked me through it beautifully and even followed up to make sure I was fully satisfied. It works perfectly. I have never seen a more responsive and truly helpful tech support. Wonderful.

Worked fine a few times and then broke.  Won't pair.  Customer service is a joke.  They said they would send me a new one and haven't heard from them since. Have sent 2 follow up emails asking for updates but there has been no return communication.  Save your money.

I use this on my projector in my media room. I have no way of running an HDMI cord through the ceiling. I just set my receiver on bluetooth and turn this on. I really can't tell a difference. The is NO LAG at all. The only thing is I have to reach up and turn it on everytime. It doesn't power on with the projector that power it. Other than that, I love this product. Highly recommend.

There's no real way of knowing it connects to your headphones unless its playing sound and a flashing blue light. But honestly after its startup sequence and if the Bluetooth headphones aren't connected to anything it'll automatically connect to the transmitter seamlessly, like 1 or 3 secs. Also, it works just as well as a receiver! ill try to update after 3 months of use to see if it is still great!!!!!

I received the product. It worked great for one week, and then stopped working. I initially gave one star. However, customer service was terrific. They sent me a new one, no questions asked. It works, and has been working perfectly for months. the company followed up with me to make sure that I was taken care of. i would buy this product again from these people. Very pleased, even though there was some initial difficulty.

I never had trouble with the Bluetooth connection, but under a certain volume the sound cuts out entirely, which makes for a very jumpy and uncomfortable experience of you’re listening to anything that has any quiet moments. The sound of the wind, any whispers, and quiet music all fall under the dB limit, so any movie, tv show, or video game sounds terrible. DO NOT BUY if you’re getting this just to watch quiet movies while loved ones are asleep.

I live over the garage at my sister's house.  She has small children and I watch not-small-child-appropriate movies in my room.  I bought this transmitter to go with my TaoTronics bluetooth headphones and they work perfectly together!  No noise for the kids to overhear, I can watch what I want, and I'm free to move around the room as I do it!  This works perfectly for what I want it for!  I do need to pair the headphones each time I turn the transmitter on, but there has been no issue with connecting.

I really like this item it does work really well but recently I tried to use it connected to my TV receiving sound on my Apple AirPods and I cannot adjust the volume. For this reason I might have to buy another dongle of some sort that has an option to adjust the volume

Excellent device. Just plug and play, connection is excellent no signal dropping, it increased the sound quality from the tv, it never loses set memory of the device you have connected to the transmitter. I have NO complaints about this little transmitter, will buy an extra one for my other tv.

This is the third TaoTronics T/R I have purchased. The sound quality has been good and there have not been drop-outs.  I use one to send the audio from my TV to my Bluetooth headset.  I use another in the receiver mode so my non-Bluetooth headset can be used with my cell phone that lacks a phone jack.  The third device I gave as a gift. I would definitely recommend the device.

Tends to cut out when connected with my TV and broadcasting to Bluetooth headphones. The headphones don’t have connectivity issues when used with other devices so I have to deduce that this transmitter is the issue. Haven’t figured a way to fix it. Maybe a newer model would help.

In all reviews and literature it says how easy it is to connect to the phone but never specifies if they are referring to TX or RX mode.  It can only connect to Bluetooth speakers in TX mode.  If you are trying to listen to movies quietly, transmitting your TV to your IPhone ear buds, this product is not for you.  This product will only receive signal from a smart phone.  This should have been more clear, but I guess they wouldn’t sell as many.  This in fact a limited transmitter receiver.  I am very disappointed.

I purchased this item and it didn't work for my TV.  I contacted Taotronics by email and they were super quick to respond.  They ended up determining that it didn't work with my television because it didn't have the correct output for audio but they sent me a different version that did work with my TV and had me send this one back to them.  They were in constant email contact.  They also walked me through the steps to get the new one to work and it works great now.  Highly recommend Taotronics.  Their customer support is above and beyond.
Sound quality linked to Bose Soundlink Mini is terrible.  I would have returned it, but I used the micro USB charging cord for another application.  Worthy of zero stars

Works as expected and meets my needs. My only issue was pairing. The instructions say to plug it in to your transmitting device and start pairing process. Did this time after time and would not pair. Finally got it pair as a stand alone without the power and aux cord connected. Would have given 5 stars if the instructions were correct. Would buy again.

My brother bought this for me for Christmas and it worked great until 6 months in when it stopped connecting altogether. I contacted the company (the device was under a 1 year warranty) and they promptly replied and replaced it!

Got the transmitter to Bluetooth our TV audio to a remote speaker. First one we got failed after one use. Emailed back and forth with the vendor several times looking for a solution, and they finally just shipped me a new one. The new one has worked flawlessly for a month. Does exactly what we wanted, at a good price. I appreciate the support most of all.

The 5.0 Bluetooth transmitter/receiver by TaoTronics neatly solves Bluetooth incompatible connectivity by providing consistent signal allowing me to use my wireless earbuds to watch (and listen) to the TV when cross-noise or volume are an issue normally. Clean, crisp sound, no static/interference/drops to date!Customer service is excellent with a follow-up email directly from the Seller, Sunvalley Group, regarding their recommended usage as well as providing helpful notes regarding their warranty, etc.

Plugged it in my old ihome speaker that doesn't have connection app available anymore. After a quick 5 minute setup we had music playing. Worked great. Luckily the speaker had a usb outlet that the Bluetooth could charge off of. Otherwise it would have to be plugged into an outlet. Only downside is the length of cord. Too short for us because we need to access the Bluetooth receiver if it turns off and it's not easily accessible since cord is so short and it sits behind speaker on a shelf. Other than that great product. Would buy again.

this device can be used as a transmitter or receiver of bluetooth. it can turn your headphones into bluetooth headphones. it will let you use your TV set with your bluetooth headphones. i returned the first unit I bought, and the company sent me aa replacement, free of charge.

Everything was as advertised except the delay.  I’m not sure why there is a noticeable delay in the sound - on the order of a half second or more.  I wanted to use it with a guitar amp and Bluetooth headphone.  They did not sync up.  Just for a test, I watched a video from an iPad.  Big lip sync problem.  Ok for just music.
Tiny wonder, I used it to connect to my Apple Nano,  So I can listen to my favorite Radio station with my Bluetooth earbud. Works really good, Fit well in my ID badge. Highly recommended.

This Bluetooth transmitter allows me to listen my old TV through my wireless headphones. It's replacing the old Sennheiser system that allowed me to do the same, which was loosing the signal and lost charge as well. This simple small device is excellent. Highly recommended.
product works flawlessly.  Love it
The first one didn't work but was quickly replaced.  The new one works like a charm.  I can clearly listen to music or the TV on my headphones while my hubby talks and talks away. And easy to set up.

Exactly what I was looking for my toddlers first flight. I was easily able to connect them both to my phone using this so that they could watch their little videos. They stayed quiet the entire flight.

I have a new noisy neighbor below me, that coupled with the loud A/C/heating unit I wanted to be able to hear my TV without blasting the volume. So I ordered this and a digital converter that sends my tv sound to my Bluetooth headphones. There is no lag in the sound, the audio is clear. I am loving my new method of watching tv!
I just couldn't deal with the delays in audio.  From my ipad, the audio and video were maybe 3 seconds off, which is huge if you're trying to listen to music and watch the video.  Had to return it.

Using this devise  in the transmit moedI can use my old analogue audio system with my bluetooth headphones or remoet speaker.  In the receiveing mode I can use my old speakers to play music off my iPhone or iPod.  The best yet because this is bluetooth I don't need wires.
Very portable and easy to use bluetooth transmitter and receiver. I have not actually used it as a receiver yet but the transmitter works perfectly with two separate Bluetooth wireless earbuds!

So I bought this to get wireless headphones working for the Nordictrack bike recently purchased ; had no problem pairing the headphones but the sound is so low I could barley hear the workout video . But then I tried same adapter to my PC and it works great !!!!! Also using a different pair of wireless headphones , so not sure if some headphones work better with this than others ???  Either way this adapter does what its supposed to do ; maybe just need to try another pair of wireless headphones with the bike ??? Anybody else have issues with this adapter for a Nordictrack bike ???
Easy to use. Plugged it in to AC power, connected to TV 3.5 mm audio out. Switch to TX, turned on bt headphones, press the pair button on tx and headset. Perfect and great sound! Works with PC too!

Not much more to add.  The product arrived quickly and was simple to set up.  So far so good!I’ve used the product for several months right now.  I have it linked to a TV and use multiple headsets.  Fantastic!  Works just as I hoped it would.
Wish the battery lasted a little longer. Would be willing to sacrifice the size a little bit for a longer lasting battery. I usually get about 10 to 12 hours playing time. But sound quality is great

Stopped connecting to any Bluetooth device after a day of use. Fully charged, still turns on, but doesn't connect to anything. My Bluetooth devices connect to other items like my laptop and phone, so they're not the problem.

Funciona perfectamente con un delay casi imperceptible. Lo uso para ver TV y funciona perfectamente. Lo malo es que la pila dura muy poco pero se puede usar conectado a la fuente de poder mientras se carga. Lo recomiendo 100%

My wife and I needed to connect two different bluetooth headphones to an android box so we didn't wake up the baby who likes to sleep on the bed with us. This little gizmo did the trick. Press the button, pair one then pair the next. Enjoy the movie until the baby wakes up in five minutes. Works great.

There's a noticeable hum during silences if I try to use it while it's charging, but other than that it works fine. Better for portable use than fixed; I replaced it with the Anker one with SPDIF for my projector setup.

My flat screen TV is annoying when watching programs where peple talk softly.  Bought this to use with some inexpensive headphones.  I paired it with  a Tao Tronics BT xmiter and sound great.  Use them all the time and get at least 8 hours of TV viewing before I have to recharge.  Good value for the cost.

It take a little time to connect some bluetooth devices however some of them connect very quick. It also have some sound delay and the reach is no more then 10ft. For me the reach distance doesnt matter because I use it at work when I am behind my pc but when I look some video or so it has a little sound delay. Sound quality is not bad for me.

Originally one I received simply didn't work. Customer service reached out to me. With their pride in their product, they sent me another unit. Great job on follow up on customer review. They were right. It was rary happens defect. When I tried new one, in no time up and connected. Thank you Tai tropics. I purchased their products and this experience made me even more liking them ! Awesome products and customer service !
Works like a champ. Easy initial setup and locks in easily after that.  I use it in an RV .  The unit is inside the RV and I have no problem controlling it from outside.

This product is actually fantastic. After purchasing digital converters and all kind of different things to make my bose cinematic's work with my new Samsung Q27 television. I finally decided to use this Bluetooth adapter for fantastic. Anyone who has a bose Cinemax consider Bluetooth adapter so they don't have to go out and purchase a new surround sound. The newer TVs don't have a 3.5 adapter they only come with Bluetooth, optical or HDMI. You need this product for that your older technology will be updated to newer connectivity. Thanks for making this product and it was so simple to connect.

The first device I got had issues, customer service contacted me and sent me out a new device I am now happy with the deal and the hardware. Love that you can have two sets of bluetooth headphones or speakers connected at one time.

Used this product for my covered deck projection TV.  I have outdoor klipsch speakers for my projection TV, but needed wireless capability when my wife and I watch movies later in the evening so we do not disturb the neighbors. Love the ability to wirelessly connect two devices simultaneously. This feature works great!

It just works ok. It tends to drop out completely if there isn’t dialogue or something like that playing prominently. It does this weird thing where it skips sometimes and you have reconnect it multiple times until it starts to relay normally again. If I could go back, I’d pick a better one.
Works great so far and you can charge with USB while using it.  I bought it for airplane trips.  i hated

We are using this in our bedroom as our tv sits against the wall to another bedroom but 20 feet from our bed.Now we can listen to our shows transmitted to our Bluetooth speaker while muting the tv so we are the the ones listening, not our child on the other side of the wall.

I wanted to use this for an electronic drum kit, however there is a slight delay. For other less time sensitive applications this device works perfectly. It even pairs with my AirPods. Their customer service is superb. I also use their Bluetooth earbuds and over the ear headphones and they are quality gear.
We had to buy a digital to Analog converter to make this work with our TV.  Once everything was hooked up, it works fine.  The sound is delayed just a bit, but really have to watch to notice.

While this product is well made and includes several useful cables, the delay that is introduced in the audio path makes it effectively unusable for any audio+video uses. This should not reflect negatively on Sunvalley Brands or TaoTronics in anyway. Their Customer Service department reached out to me and offered to send a replacement of TT-BA09 Transmitter (ASIN: B06WD8Z21S) with optical cable. My set-up does not support optical, so they refunded my order. I was very impressed with Sunvalley Brands the TaoTronics Customer Care team and will look for their products in the future. I am a 100% satisfied customer now.

This product is easy to pair to a bluetooth device and use.  I paired this with airpods and use to listen to the tv while on my treadmill.  I can get around 4-6 hours of use over the course of a week before needing to recharge.  Have recommended it to friends.

I did have trouble with the unit losing connection.  I looked in the ratings section on Amazon and someone else had the same issue and your techs has answered how to fix the problem.  You might want to add his help to the manual.  Now the unit works perfectly.
I wish I had gotten  this instead of the other one, if you have BOSE wireless headset, highly recommend, I applaudthe makers, great job, awesome product!!!

Product works but with a delay in the sound. This makes it unusable watching movies on an airplane with my Airpod Pros (which is why I purchased this). I wold return then but I threw the box away unfortunately.  Don’t believe the other reviews that say there isn't a delay in the sound.

Nice and small unit. Bluetooth connection is simple and no issues there. While playing audio, bluetooth could be very  shaky and if it's outdoors, just a slight wind distorts the audio. Also, the range between this unit and the source cannot be more than ~8 feet. So, it's really not as useful as I thought. Not sure if this is just my unit or is the same experience for all.

I bought this to use at the gym to watch things while using the elliptical machine.  It works great.  I think it would also be great for the car.  It's also very useful that it can transmit and receive.

This is my 3rd unit like this ... makes any audio device (TV, old cassette player, CD player, wired headphones) a bluetooth equipped device. I use this for everything - TV, audio, podcasts, etc. - and their support is fantastic. I especially love the play/pause feature on the power button. Very handy.  And,  If you register your product online, they will extend the warranty to 18 mos.! Great product - Great company!
This is amazing!! Very handy, easy to use, it totally serves its purpose.  Does not change quality of the audio even in distance..

While using this device to connect my Taotronics wireless earphones to my television audio, I received considerable delay in the spoken audio. Also, I could not control the volume on my earphones. It was very low.

My husband and I wanted to use this product to watch TV with our wireless headsets at the same time so the baby in our room wouldn't wake up from the noise. However, after the first use the Bluetooth on the headsets wouldn't connect to the product. We got a replacement and the same thing happened again. We were disappointed because we really were excited about this product. However, when it did work the sound was great and able to be easily adjusted.

Its a really good product, I'm not going to lie. I do recommend to everyone! Super easy to connect and paired, with any device: Tv, cell phone, any thing in regarding to listen  with out disturbing anyone. It is a great product. BUY IT! by the way, I don't work for the company, and my review is truly honest.

I am impressed with this product.It is incredibly thin, but doesn’t let that fool you. The quality of the sound using Bluetooth 5.0 is noticeably better and you really do get 10 hours of battery life. Also, TaoTronics stands behind their products. I had a problem with an earlier version of this product and they replaced it. I highly recommend this product.

Sound fidelity is quite good considering the $31 price.  In my case, a very nifty and useful device to breathe new life into your older hi-fi gear that still is quite serviceable but doesn't support bluetooth headphones.

perfect. transmits and receives. decent battery life. easy to use. what more could you ask for?i bought this to add wireless capabilities to my home theater receiver, so i could do housework and listen to favorite movies.

It may be a good product but it will not connect with my 2016 Harley Radio. Tech support was great and really work hard to help me but in the end they agreed that it is not compatible . I am only giving it 3 stars because it did not work for me but tech support was great they get 5 stars.

My goal in purchasing this product was to connect my iPad pro to a sound mixer to mix sound with my digital piano while using various piano teaching software. But it turned to be unusable in this setup as the instructions from my iPad were around half a second delayed comparing to when the software expected me to play this or that note on the piano. A bit cumbersome explanation, but unfortunately it didn't work for me. Not something I would recommend when none to minimum lag is expected. I ended up purchasing USB-C to 3.5 adapter to connect my iPad by wire.On the other hand - speed of connecting and sound quality are good, so go ahead and purchase it if a relatively small lag is not an issue to you.

Patience is a requirement for pairing Beats headphones to this transmitter.  Make sure all other wireless devices are very far away or completely powered down.  Make sure both the headphones and the transmitter are fully charged.  Turn on the Beats headphones, they should automatically blink to pair.  Turn on the transmitter in TX mode.  The headphones may go through a power down if paring does not occur on the first attempt.  Should that happen, power down the transmitter and toggle to RX mode.  Repeat a pairing attempt for a whole headphone pairing cycle in RX mode, until power down.  Turn off the transmitter and toggle back to TX mode.  Repeat the pairing of headphones to transmitter again.  They should pair up.  If not, run through the total reset instructions for the transmitter and headphones and try this process again.

I found this device to be very fussy about what it will connect to. Anything with a screen (e.g., phone or iPad) were fine. Things without a screen (specifically Bluetooth speakers) are hit-and-miss. But when it works, the sound quality is good and no sound lag.

Can tell right away this product will work for me well. Using it to listen to my workplace computer while I'm working in other offices and at my own desk. Transmit range is about 50ft through walls on my Sony WH1000MX2s. Sound quality is good up until this range. Only complaint I have is that when the device is charging there is a very high pitch tone that can be heard (not loud). It's easily covered by whatever is playing but it's there between tracks and in the quiet moments. Who knows, you probably won't even be able to hear it if you're over 30 years old. I'll be using it for awhile!
Works good only complaint have to reset daily

Very happy with it. Mainly use as a transmitter to link with wireless earbuds on flights and on treadmills at the gym. A little tricky to link the first time and I notice a slight delay with movies but otherwise a keeper. Small and very light.

Just got it connected through my receiver on zone two and it allows for 2 connected devices headphones and remote stand alone speaker. Perfect for hearing impaired ...no more unnecessary tv volume.  Thanks Taotronics. Oh yes lets not forget fast delivery 2 days !!!

Good item, good battery life, connects easily. Seems like there may be some compression going on though in the sound, but I haven’t verified that in any way other than “it just sounds like it might be”.

Very good product so far. Have not used it in receive mode yet, only transmit. The 3" aux cord it came with was not good. Buy or use your own 3.5mm aux cord. fine product, unfortunately it does not pair with my brand new Ipod Touch. Ipod cannot even find this device

I cannot speak to any other iPhone or iOS version, but my iPhone Xs Max, iOS 13.5.1, cannot even detect it, so I was never able to get it to connect in either receive or transmit mode. I am returning it.

This worked exactly as I hoped.  I have a receiver without Bluetooth.  I charged it as outlined in the directions, connected it to the receiver and within a few seconds it was working.  Great addition and highly recommended.

This definitely does the job. One thing I noticed is that it has a buzz in your Bluetooth headphones when the power is plugged in. Other than that it works well. Some devices/apps have some latency, audio syncing to video etc. Love how small and portable it is.

The device seems powerful and is small and lightweight, but the cords supplied with it were crackling as I moved them, and they will need to be replaced with gold-tip cords for fidelity too. I also picked up some hum while moving it around next to my amp. Once it's sitting there in place though, it's great (so far after two days).

I'm using the transmitter to connect my wired headphones to my Bluetooth capable TV. I just plugged my headphone's wire into the transmitter, and paired it with my Sony x950g.The transmitter is small; almost as small as a cigarette lighter. The setup was absolutely simple and easy. The build quality is surprisingly good; it has a matte, rubberized finish. The audio is crystal clear, and has no trouble getting loud.

Wanted to connect my bluetooth buds to my computer and thought this product would work. It didn't. I gather it is for connecting bluetooth speakers to the computer which was not what a I wanted so i easily returned it.

The product arrived how it should have and setting it up was fast and easy, it did what I needed, it allowed me to listen to my TV using my bluetooth earbuds, but there was a light static sound constantly in the background, and the sound would also dip out whenever the show or movie had a moment of silence or was quieter, so I returned the product because that was too annoying to ignore.
A cute little toy that helps me convert Bose QC25 wired earphones to wireless.You just easily pair up TaoTronics small rectangle with the cell phone and plug into it the earphone cable.

I bought my first one of these nifty little devices to connect my "unsmart" living room TV wirelessly to headphones, allowing one person to watch TV in the same room as someone working (in other words, a pandemic era peace keeper).  I bought the second one to connect an unused computer monitor to a wireless speaker in the bedroom, turning the monitor into a de facto TV streaming device.  Because my monitor doesn't have a remote control, I can now control audio volume at the speaker next to the bed.

This small unit does its job well. Easy to pair with powerful, clear sound. This is the third Bluetooth transmitter I’ve used by different manufacturers and this is by far the best one. It’s a winner.

I wanted to use this transmisor to watch tv at night so I connected it to my Onkyo receiver. Now I can watch TV at night without bothering my wife when she tries to sleep. I had to reset it because it wasn't pairing at first. But thanks to instructions of the company I managed to make it work. It does what it says and for a reasonable price.
I love this product it lets me connect to anything, like a PC with no Bluetooth or a piano, it is really helpfull. I use it daily and it works every time, never had problems with it.

What a great idea! I have so many non Bluetooth items that I would love to be able to use with Bluetooth. And there it was, the answer to my dilemma. This will both transmit to or receive from Bluetooth electronics. Try it! You’ll like it!!!!

Might be great but can’t tell. Charge/recharge is virtually impossible.Pairs easily but unless your device has a 3.5 mm out jack this won’t work. Get the optical one instead. Has all connection options.

I use it to make my old work laptop work with my nice bluetooth headphones. Good sound, easy to connect. Charge lasts a few days, it charges pretty quickly, and you can still use it while charging. It perfectly solved my no-phone-signal, cord-hating, crappy-laptop, usb-not-allowed, still-want-to-stream-music dilemma. Thanks!!

Great for watching tv and don't want to wake the house.  There is a slight delay between what you're seeing and the sound, but not that drastic.  Just keep that in mind if you're sensitive to those things.
I got this to connect my iPod Classic to a set of Bluetooth 5.0 wireless earbuds.  Works great, paired seamlessly with earbuds!

Pretty disappointing - bought these for an outdoor cinema so we could connect two Bluetooth headsets. There is a latency issue with a slight delay but that is not the biggest issue. When watching a movie and the sound goes low they cut out and then there is a delay again for them to fire up again - which means you can miss parts of conversations. There is also considerable background noise of a high pitched frequency that is annoying.

Well both headsets paired fine easy to use but only one headset sounds great 2nd headset very poor sound.  After TaoTronics read my review they contacted me by e-email and offered a refund or a replacement great customer service I'm changing my rating to five stars.

I returned it because it did connect nor sync with anything.This is a update on my experience.  Customer service was excellent and made it up to me as my phone was not compatible but they sent me a gift that was! Thank you very much!

Having prior generations of this device allows me to compare the current version. Very nice upgrades. Makes connecting much easier less fussy. That alone makes this acquisition worthwhile. Sound quality is better.

Worked great right out of the box when easily paired. Exactly what I needed as a Bluetooth transmitter for a project I am building that includes extended battery backup as a docking station for an older iPod. I can transmit the iPod audio and power both off a small rechargeable battery pack. Great value for price and would highly recommend.
I have this connected to my TV and use it with Tao Tronics bluetooth earbuds.  I find the connection works well and the unit is so small that it is almost invisible.  I recommend this product.

stopped working after using it very sparingly (used only when others are sleeping and I can not fall asleep)Update 2/28/2020 - I called the customer service and I was told the product is out of warranty. The bottom line is DO NOT BUY if you plan to use it rarely

I use this with my metal detector and wireless headphones.  Works very well with what seems like no delay.  Small enough unit that I attach it to the back of my metal detector.  Seems to last quite a long time on a charge.

I plugged the charging port into a usb a wall plug.  so it stays on and does not drain the battery.  I also plugged it into a head phone outlet on my receiver.  It actually works pretty good.  I am still trying to learn the pairing of two devices which should workout great.

I like the packaging and look, but it simply didn't want to pair with any bluetooth device,Followup: The manufacturer did reach out with a new version that works well. Now I would recommend the product.

We use this on our TV so he can hear it without me losing my hearing. He uses the same Bluetooth headset he uses for his phone. Pretty easy to set up and use, but we did have to buy a digital to analog converter because our TV didn't have the right connectors. Still a good value for us.

Hi there I’m here updating my original review, and by the way my biggest thanks to Mia at customer service you were awesome taking care of me, my first unit had a small problem but Mia was quick to send a replacement unit and this new unit works wonderful now I can enjoy tv without disrupting my wife at night, My tv doesn’t have Bluetooth and this was my way out, save me a few bucks buying more expensive unit.
A great device for rational customers: does what it says!I connected Bluetooth headphones to Ipod Classic in 30 seconds. Sound without delay. Punches through two walls.
I bought this item to transmit from my piano keyboard to my Bose wireless headphone. It’s connected easily and sound was little low compared to wired. But completely happy with the setup.
I'm using it in my car all the time now (mine has BT2.0 which doesn't work for sound streaming). Battery lasts long and ability to use it while charging is a benefit for sure!

The adapter worked perfectly with my TV and required little setup to get going. I was able to connect my Bluetooth speaker within seconds. However, I was unable to connect my Bluetooth headphones. I tried to troubleshoot and check online but I could not get it to connect.

Good product, works well.  Easily attaches to Bluetooth devices, volume controlled by device and not transmitter.  Make sure to keep extra batteries as the transmitter does go through them fairly quickly

Just as other customer stated, sound cutoff during low volume to save batteries. The cutoff happens even in the middle of the song. If I cannot listen music with this transmitter, it is basically useless.Contacted by the company and made a compensation for the produce.... After 2 years....

I purchased this specifically so my wife and I could use our wireless headphones together to watch a movie on a single iPad. It was relatively straightforward to get the double-pairing and everything set up. However, we barely got two minutes into the movie before one our headphones disconnected permanently. Only a complete reset and repair could fix it. Then the other person's disconnected.This is completely unusable for the "double-headphone" case that I specifically got it for. Waste of money

This worked great for my frequent trips on the airplane.  Pairing to my Bluetooth headphones was easy and has no issues staying paired. The sound quality is better than I expected.  It is small enough to fit in my headphones case so I always have it with me.  I usually connect a short USB cable to the airplane entertainment USB port to keep it charged at the same, but it's nice it has a battery in case that USB port on the plane isn't working.

I've never tried out a bluetooth transmitter before and I am happy that this was my first one (still using it).  Whenever I want to listen to the TV across the home but not disturb the neighbors or wake up everyone inside it functions very well.  I've never had it run out of power mid session even when I binge watched my shows.Nothing I can really say bad about the product, even the instructions were clear.
I went through 2 Hx cheapies that I spent more time trying to connect than listening! This one connects every time without problems, even when switching between the phone and TV.

Works great. I've only used it as a transmitter cause that is the only use I have for this item. But it has always connected and I've never run out of battery while using it, so to be on the cautious side I recharge it about 1 to 1 1/2 weeks of use.

Easily adds audio Bluetooth connectivity to any of my device. The control is intuitive enough that I don't need to keep the manual. Mainly, press and hold the button to power on/off, or double click to start pairing.
Works for me to connect my BT-less FLAC player to Sennheiser phones, and my home audio system. Easy to connect, and the sound quality is excellent. Battery life seems good, we'll see how that lasts.

Took longer to unpack than set.  Had 3 different cables in package.  Set up and connected in less than a minute.  1st time use was great.  Now unit will not stay connected more than a couple of minutes.  Restarted phone and unit multiple times.  Disappointed.

This worked great for a few weeks and then just stopped. I tried pairing a new set of headphones and it stopped working. I followed the directions for clearing the old headphones like suggested, and nothing. The light just stays blue. I tried charging it that does nothing. Tried everything that was recommended and nothing works. And of course this happens a week after the return window expired.

I purchased the BT 5.0 transmitter to be used primarily as a transmitter for my computer and television to listen on my BT  headphones.  I was able to plug in easily to each using the 3.5mm adapter.  For my TV I used the adapter for the AV ports.  Both ways worked perfectly.  The sound quality was great, no issues noticed.

It's turning into my favorite item. For both transmitting and receiving.  The convenience is a must for anyone who likes to be quiet and enjoy tv or radio. I can rest assured knowing I don't need to have volume to high and neighbors aren't bothered by my music or movie. 👍

Works great and it's exactly what I wanted! Easy to use and no issues with pairing, and it has clear sound with no lag. I've been using mine regularly with my TV for ~6 months now and haven't had any issues. Would definitely recommend.

Bought these for me and my kids to watch movies on an airplane. It took 5-10 minutes to get it to connect after several tries. The signal got crossed with the movie of the person sitting next to me, and with other signals (music instead of the movie). The volume was barely loud enough to hear the movie. This technology is premature and this device barely works. Very frustrating and disappointing. Got it to work for part of a movie. Might work better on an empty plane!

I use this so I can use my Bose headphones with my TV and other audio devices without native Bluetooth. I find it tricky to get it connected sometimes but always figure it out after a minute or two. I don’t notice any lip synch delay when using with my TV and Bose headphones.

This device has allowed me to connect my headphones/speakers at work and at home. You can also use it in your car for bluetooth audio with your cell phone. I'm very happy with this device that I bought two. where other devices failed this device has succeeded.
Edit :Great customer service. They reached out to me and made everything right.Disconnects at random
Great Bluetooth adapter for RX or TX. Allows for the use of wired headphones or plug into an AV device to transmit to Bluetooth speakers or headphones. Very happy with the product.
I wanted to connect old Samsung TV to Bose Bluetooth speaker since TV speakers started to sound muffled and static-y.I finally figured it out and now it works perfectly. Good product!

I was skeptical but when i received it it was pain less to pair, no loss of sound quality, and most surprising the battery plays all day. i'm going to order more for my other old no Bluetooth sound equipment. I specifically purchased this for my XM Roady which does not offer BlueTooth just 3.5 output.
FALSE ADVERTISING: TaoTronics models in this line do NOT support aptX when in receiver mode, so useless as a hi-fi solution for most users. Also does not remain always-on when in receiver mode.

This device is awesome! It fills the bull in many ways. The multi device connection, no buzz from being plugged during use, the multiple app included connectors and small size make this device a must have for anyone who travels and need to play music through a stereo system.

I was able to eliminate all the charging electrical noise by connecting the USB to an AC adapter. Connected to a USB port on any PC it was whiny and noisy from EM interference. I'm satisfied now that I found the quirks with the product, and I appreciate the customer response.
This pairs up well enough with my headphones and there doesn't seem to be any noticeable lag between the TV picture and the BT sound, so it must be Low Latency as advertised.

I bought this On June 14 and it stopped working on September 26th. This is the third one I have purchased and I’ve had the same experience. The device stops working after about 4 to 5 months. I cannot recommend it because given the cost it should last longer.

Sweet little device that does exactly what I wanted it to do...allow me to watch movies at a loud volume at night without disturbing my neighbors. I have it hooked up via RCA audio outs from my TV.  Clarity is great, and no noticeable Bluetooth lag. I'm hearing sound details I never noticed with my soundbar.Two thumbs up. I'd give it three if I had an extra hand.

Everything works as advertised, I use it on long flights and have sold quite a few to other people that didn’t know a device actually existed. My primary use is from my projector tv to an external speaker/headphones which is great! I keep it plugged in continuously for this application and have had no issues.
I absolutely love this.  It's plugged into our TV and we run a bluetooth speaker off of it .  Works great, the volume control is on the speaker as this is just a transmitter.

I use this everywhere.. to bluetooth signals from my phone, my old stereo, my pocket FM radio.  True that I have only had it a few weeks and should wait longer to give a more accurate review.  But I have not yet had to recharge it and there have been no problems.  I should have looked for this years ago.

I wanted bluetooth speakers for my office and workspace, but didn't have the budget.  I hooked up some old box speakers and a couple in ceiling speakers to an analog receiver and plugged this bluetooth transmitter in. It works great.  My husband is jealous that he didn't put them in the garage first.  The whole setup had been gathering dust out there for 10+ years.  I bought a second one for his living room setup, so I think he's forgiven me.

Killer simple little product! Allows me to use nicer headphones wirelessly with my phone. Easy way to add Bluetooth to a home stereo. Creative possibilities with flinging audio across hallways without cable runs. Very cool!

Works great, only one thing, I noticed if I have my echo dot plugged in and not active. The sound cuts in and out, at 1st I thought was bad reception. After an issue with Alexa's alarm time zone. Worked perfectly after I unplugged it.

I got this thinking it was going to allow me to transmit to my computer. My computer saw and tried to pair to it and it didn't pair. After that, my computer was unable to see it again no many how many times I put it in pair mode. Half the time, my computer could not see it for transmitting audio to it. This product is not worth it.

Company rep sent an email to see if I had any problems and liked the product. Who does that anymore? Works great .Use on my Victory motorcycle and lets me listen to my Phone music through my factory stereo.

My Fisher receiver is high impedance so when I paired it to the headphone jack on the receiver I barely got any sound. Instead I paired it to the headphone jack on my Sony three head tape deck. Works fine now.

Was pretty straightforward to set up.Connection to devices is pretty great haven't had any random disconnects or any random cutting out of audio. Also a lot smaller than i thought it was which makes it perfect for use when on the go or for hiding away in more permanent placement situations. Overall pretty great.

Works really great! My husband didn't have a Bluetooth in his car. Once he bout this my hopes were lifted. So I thought. Lol. It won't connect to a phone call. Only music and the likes. At least, not for me.

Works great with everything I’ve connected it to. Pairs without problems and most important you can plug them into AC while they’re being used. Not all these devices let you do that so this is ideal forcTVs and stereos.

I take a potable dvd player camping and can set this device up on the devices 3.5 jack and transmit it to a bluetooth speaker especially since the speaker on the dvd player is very soft, this device remedies that and a similar cases.

I didn’t even know this product existed until I needed it.  I realized my smart tv didn’t have Bluetooth connectivity which I needed for a Bluetooth accessory.  Super easy to hook up and connect.  Definitely recommend.  Great price too.
My husband wanted to use his Bluetooth speaker with his PS4 controller.  He now just plugs this into his controller and gets the game sound from his speaker.  He loves it.

I used it to connect a bluetooth speaker to my surround sound system which had wired speakers, so I could have the rear speaker wireless, by swapping the rear speaker with one of my bluetooth speakers  and connecting the transmitter to the corresponding output on my surround sound system. Much less expensive way to have wireless real speakers.

I purchased this to pair with my Peloton bike to be able to use a home theater receiver for the audio for my workouts. The  sounds quality is great, battery life is excellent and pairing with the Peloton was super easy.  I've had no issues with the device yet.  Even in the crowded bluetooth transmitter/receiver market, I would buy this same unit again if I had to do it all over with again.  A++++

These paired with everything but my new AirPod pros so I returned them after many attempts to get them to work. Great volume compared to the Airfly Pro I bought to replace them.The adapters with the RCA plugs allowed easy hookup to my TV set.

I needed to be able to watch late night  television without disturbing the rest of the house.I got the TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter and paired it with my headphones and never have to worry I am too loud and I can still hear everything perfectly.

I bought this Bluetooth transmitter to use with Oculus Go and AirPods.  First, I disabled Bluetooth in iphone. Second connected this device to Oculus Go using audio cable. Third, paired this transmitter with Oculus Go. It worked fine without any issues. Later I enabled Bluetooth connection on my iPhone and now both devices are working with air pods. I bought it this week only so cannot comment on durability.
Used it to hook my AirPods to my Nintendo switch and PS4, works great for both

I'm an older guy who suffers from hearing loss. My wife has suffered from migraine head aches for years. Loud noise exacerbates the headaches. Trying to find a compromise television volume level (loud enough for me, soft enough not to cause headaches for her)  has been an ongoing problem. Taotonics solved the problem with the Bluetooth transmitter. We each have Bluetooth earbuds which we connect to our tv through the transmitter. We each can control the tv volume to meet our needs.
This was the first product my husband found that allowed us to both use wireless headphones with my iPad. Now we can watch the same movie on flights. Easy to follow instructions. Good purchase.
I like this because the sound quality is very good and no lag on the voice. Battery last a couple hours.Can watch TV and listen on my COWIN headphones. Very please with this product.

First off I have a hard time with bluetooth electronics.  I  don't why I always make it so hard on myself.  I watched a couple of youtube videos and between all of them I finally figured out how to make it work.  It's pretty simple if you know what you are doing.  The product works well so I would recommend it.

I use this to play audio via Bluetooth in my car; it works like a charm! No issues whatsoever with connectivity, and it has great battery life. The controls are super simple, and the connectivity noises aren't super obnoxious like they are with similar products. Highly recommend if you need to send Bluetooth to something that doesn't have it!

Got this for my dad who loves his Bluetooth headphones. Great connectivity. A little hard to figure out at first but once I got it, they work wonderfully. Side note, you have to disconnect the headphones or speaker from other devices before trying to connect!
The product is great for watching TV with my Bluetooth headset. My wife and I both have suffered hearing loss but with this transmitter and some good headsets we can enjoy TV again.
Works exactly as it should. Very easy to set up. My projector did not have bluetooth capability.  I was able to connect my bluetooth speaker for surround sound with this device.
I use this to play my electric guitar through headphones - wirelessly. As long as you use the proper device (headphones/speaker) to connect to it, it works GREAT!!!

My Jabra 65t Elite overall are very nice, but dropouts are frustrating and seeming unavoidable with many devices - tablet, phone, Fire TV. When connected to this, however, there are no problems. Glad to have it.
I wish there was a fix for this. It seems all transmitters work like this. There is a lag between the picture and sound that makes it impossible to enjoy watching anything.
I've been looking for a way to connect my Bluetooth headphones and earbuds to my TV. After ordering a Bluetooth receiver several months ago, I did my research and ordered this. Works great!

Great device, connects to two devices at the same time, syncs perfectly, size is a plus. I use it on airplane a/v system with no issues... Bluetooth disconnects once in awhile, battery life is decent, could be better.

Came on time as expected. Love the product.  Finally I can listen to my MP3 player using the TaoTronic Bluetooth 4.1 Transmitter/Receiver.  I have it hooked up to my Sony mp3 player with the transmitter on, and it is able to pairs up with my new Sony High-Power Home Audio System  MHCV11C. Would highly recommend.

This is just what I was looking for!  I have a projector that I put a Halloween  effect on our window, but didn’t have a good way of getting the sound outside.  I plugged in my new TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 transmitter into the projector and connected my wireless speaker, problem solved! Also, like the fact that we can now use two Bluetooth headphones with one iPad on the plane now.
Bought this to connect my bluetooth headset to my TCL tv. Originally was only getting sound out of one headphone, needed to move the 3.5mm audio jack around. Works great.

I have previously purchased Tao products and will again. They work exactly as advertised. If it says Tao, buy it, you won't be disappointed. Great sound quality, works good as a transmitter or receiver.

I use this device as bluetooth transmitter for my TV.  It's easy to setup/pair with my Bose headset.  There is no audio latency.  The sound quality is good.  HOWEVER, the audio signal was cut off when the video/audio in a quiet/silence scene, there should be very low background noise, but I got dead silence in these situations. The signal came back when the dialog came back. I tried the same video on iPad and with my BOSE headset via bluetooth connection, I didn't have this problem.

I bought this transmitter/receiver to use in a live performance scenario where I connected the transmitter to the headphone jack of my monitor and paired it with bluetooth earbuds.  My intent was to get rid of cabled headphones.  The sound was fine and pairing was easy enough (once I moved other bluetooth sources like iPhones away from the transmitter).  The problem was that there was about a 1 second lag between the sound I was playing on my guitar and the time it hit my ears.  This would not be a problem at all if you are just using it to play back music from a source but it made it impossible to use in my situation.  I gave it 1 star for sound quality specifically for that - otherwise the sound quality was fine.

I ordered this product based on the high recommendation but was very disappointed. I was very surprised it has such a high rating. The pairing was easy but there was a delay on the sound. There was also a static could not get it to work properly. I received a replacement the very next day but had the same issue. I do not recommend this product.

Super helpful for long haul flights! I live for the aisle seat on long trips so I can get up often, but it also means getting up for neighbors. So much easier when you aren’t tied to the seatback. Also easier for falling asleep. I use with my AirPods and there’s no delay and sound is great! Def worth it for me. I’ve only used it a few times so TBD on how long it lasts

This particular product did not work with our TV (type of audio output didn’t match). Technical support was helpful needed to order a “newer” version.  Customer service reached out and offered a gift card, they went above and beyond.

Awesome little wireless transmitter so far as this is the first one’s I’ve ever bought. Connected to my AirPods, by following the instructions, in all of 10 seconds. Been using them for a few minutes now and have noticed cutting out when quite scenes come on and a little interference but I just pulled them out of the box and don’t think they are fully charged yet so I’ll give them some time. Update to come shortly.

My apartment's HVAC is loud, and in the evenings, I had to resort to either cranking the volume up or using subtitles. I purchased this for my TV (which has a stereo out) a pair of Bluetooth headphones (that doubles as a speaker) and it works much better in the evenings when I don't want to disturb my neighbors.
It took me about 3minutes to set this with from my tv to a remote speaker . Turn the sound down or not on tv and use sound controls on Bluetooth spesker. Works great.
It does the job, but syncing to my headset is often a pain.  Its blinking visuals are not always easy to see.  There is a bit of a learning curve but once you get the hang of it its fine.

The product works well as expected, easy to use and implement.  The only issue I have had so far is the volume level on the TV has to be much higher for this device than for the TV speakers.  I would expect that this more of an issue with the TV electronics, but it would be great if the TaoTronics had a built in way I could compensate for volume since volume is going to vary based on the device, the phone software alone was unable to compensate enough.

Love it! Hooked up to our Samsung tv and had it paired to our headphones with ease. My wife has the first gen Beats Studio headphones and I have the Beats Studio 2. Sound quality is great! So cool that 2 headphones can be paired at once!!
Works great.  When using on my laptop there is no delay.  From the TV there is a slight delay, but not too bad.  The initial charge lasts along time.  Great value for the money
I use this to connect to my Cowin E9 headphones.  Allows me to hear the TV in my hobby room where the A/C unit is located.  Easy to pair to my headphones.  Highly recommend.
For the simple use of playing music off a playlist it works just fine but I wanted to use it for transmitting my instrument to my Bluetooth headset and there is a terrible delay.
I got this to turn a speaker into a bluetooth speaker for the pool area. It was easy to connect it to my phone and the speaker. Very pleased with how well it worked.

The product works fine for what I needed it for.  I wanted to connect an old CD changer to a bluetooth speaker, and it worked perfectly.  The lack of a volume control is a bummer for this application, because it was way too loud, but a simple inline volume control solved that problem.  Good product.

I bought this model over 18 months ago, used it for a while and then recently "rediscovered it" as I reconfigured my TV and sound system.  I had difficulty pairing it with my Sony headphones, even though it had worked before.  My email to Customer service describing the problem and what I had tried was answered within 24 hours with a very comprehensive reply, laying out easy to understand steps, which, once implemented had me successfully connected in no time -- and no issues since.I recommend this inexpensive item.
This device works flawlessly. I was surprised by the simpicity of connection and the superior sound quality.  I would recommend the device to anyone looking for a superior bluetooth transmitter.

Works perfectly for me.  On a non Blu tooth Sound dock I had previously purchased a Blu tooth receiver which I paired with iPhone or iPad.  I have 2 first generation iPods with a ton of music and wanted them to have Blu tooth capability.  The Taotronics transmitter was exactly what I needed.  Paired easily, works very well.

Once I got it set up - follow the instructions carefully - this device worked great. On my tv, I had to pull the plug slightly out form the "audio" connection to get stereo. Not sure if it was the plug or the tv but the stereo and sound are good.
We couldn’t get it to work. After 3 afternoons of frustration, threw in the towel.  It wasn’t the device’s fault.  We are elderly and don’t understand technology

Used to provide Bluetooth connectivity to my good old CAMBRIDGE SOUNDWORKS 765 TABLE RADIO with subwoofer (which they never should have stopped producing) now can produce great sound from phone and tablet out doors
Haven't used much so I can't speak to durability, but in the few times I've used it has worked just fine .... would definitely buy again. Paired easily with my BT headphones.

Low Latency ONLY IN TRANSMITTER MODE.  It does NOT work in receiver mode.  Still an excellent product, however. Smallest tx/rx I've ever seen.  The Low Latency???  Oh yes!!! Works beautifully.  You have to have low latency receiving device as well though.Shame that Qualcomm has done away with this codec😔

Pairs easily and quickly. Sound reproduction not discernibly different from direct wired connection, using JHAudio in-ear monitors, streamed from an iPhone X. Compact size (this is part of a travel kit), and the battery holds its charge quite well, even when left off for an extended period.
I use it for my wife who cannot hear the tv. She can put the speaker close to her and not blast everyone out. It has a miniscule lag but not that bad. Good quality.

IT works great.  Seem to have much larger dynamic range and frequency range than the (popular brand) 4.2 transmitter I replaced.  Very happy I upgraded.  It also has about 15 feet great range than the 4.2 unit.  :-)

Like my favorite meme would say, "I came here looking for copper and I found gold". 10/10 would buy again. Leaving all jokes aside, I'm very happy with my purchase and my whole buying and user experience in general. It's small, light and more than portable size was a must for me. It works with absolute everything. The battery lasts forever without needing to plug it every now and then.Too long, didn't read: The quality is amazing and I would definitely recommend and buy it again.

This thing work exactly how I wanted it to work I have a newer TV that has a Optical out and it was perfect because it also had Bluetooth in this thing hooked directly to my Samsung Q60 with no problem great product works exactly how it's supposed to

The sound is good and low-latency as advertised. When the sound is quiet, this will temporarily stop transmitting (for example, when playing Skyrim and the background music is quiet it will cut out), but mostly great!
We did notice there were lags, it's not bad, but you can notice it. There is no volume control for a tiny device like this one. It does work, and will work for what it was intended, so we are happy.

This product is an absolute piece of garbage. I received it and plugged it in to charge. Per the instructions, I let it charge fully. Next step, press and hold for 5 seconds to turn it in...well, it won’t turn on. Nothing in the how to video or the instructions works. It is just a dead unit...other than the red light that indicates charging. It lights up red while charging and shuts off when fully charged. I have no blue light for pairing and it won’t even turn on.

I often like to watch TV in bed but don't want to wake up others sleeping close by. I'm also struggling to hear some of the dialogue (especially when quiet and combined with external noises from traffic in the neighborhood). This plugged into the back of my TV using the (RCA to 3.5mm) adapter and now my bluetooth headphones provide great sound without waking others in the house at night.

We needed a boost in the signal from our Spectrum modem as we had devices like an X-Box and a second Samsung TV several rooms away from the signal's source. The TaoTronics Bluetooth Transmitter solved the problem.

I've been using it for 18 months without any problem, watching 60 minute shows without any interruption.  It's well built and should last a long time.I have it plugged to power continuously, so I can't comment on the battery life.  Everything else works great!

They work well and the small size eases my wife's mind about visibility. There is a slight delay but it really isn't noticeable to most folks. Much better than running wires all over the living room. Now I just have to get used to the sounds I never heard before the extra speakers got hooked up.

I hardly write a review but I will write for this one. According to the description, this model should connect up to 33ft away but it doesn't. The sound quality is great until 15ft away. From 25ft away, no sound and it disconnects. Your phone has to be next to it in order to work properly. My sound system and TV is in my living room and the sound is not audible from the kitchen or bedroom. Sometimes it disconnects. I would return it if it was within the return window.

I LIKED BEING ABLE TO CONNECT TO ALL MY WIRED DEVICES, VIA THE 3.5MM OR RCA (L) + (R), THROUGH (SUPPLIED CORDS) TO THIS AWESOME TRANSMITTER/RECEIVER. IT PAIRS UP QUICKLY, AND SOUNDS PERFECT!!! I WOULD DEFINITELY HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANYBODY!!!!

It was so easy to set up. I can't believe that I waited so long to get this. It works like advertised. If you have a bluetooth headset, you need one of these. You now can turn any device into a bluetooth transmitter.  You can't go wrong. Sound is great and the freedom that I have now, instead of having a long cable, just the headphones.

battery life on this thing atm (new) is what it should be, sound quality is 3.8/5 also ive dropped this thing a few times on hard wood floors and it still works alright besides a few blemishes. overall its great product for what i need it for

It’s sleek and it works well for audio. There is a small but noticeable delay that made videos awkward and almost unwatchable. Easy to connect to other devices, comes with all the wires you’ll need. Minor interference (high pitch noise) when plugging the device directly into my projector, fixed by plugging into the wall instead.

We all have a few older TV’s at home that do not have Bluetooth. This transmitter is great. It was easy to use, just plug into the ear phone jack behind the TV and easily synced to my wireless Bluetooth headphones. If so can do it anyone can!  Now I can enjoy watching my shows via bluetooth without annoying others at home watching another TV program in the next room.

The sound quality is OK, Bluetooth took a little bit of time to pair did pair 2 devices. Didnt work well the issue was sync the voice together there was too much of a delay where it was irritating watching a movie or TV show.

The device is decent.  It took several attempts to pair. Had to restart everything and eventually my phone and laptop  recognized the device. I'm not sure why it did not do so immediately.  If you have problems pairing, keep resetting/power cycling.
This works great.  Use it for pairing wireless headphones (Bose quiet comfort) to media players or iPad on airplanes.  Transmitter can be plugged in for really long flights.

The TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter worked great! It was just a small discreet little box that easily plugged into the back of my stepfather’s TV at the nursing home that made his noise canceling wireless Bluetooth headphones turn into his own little home Cinema with great sound, volume control and easy Bluetooth connectivity. He was finally  able to enjoy watching and hearing his own TV!
I love this transmitter!It paired with my headphones the first time,

This product was easy enough to set up. It had everything very easy, including mini plug to RCA adapters. That’s the good news, and here’s the bad news: the latency is significant enough for this product to be unusable. I connected this to a Samsung TV and my wired stereo system. Sound is perfect, but the ass promise zero latency, it’s very noticeable. Other people seem to have better results with headphones, so I would not recommend this if you’re using this to connect to a wireless stereo system.
This product works.I had already bought wireless headphones but couldn’t connect to the TV due to it not being Bluetooth.

Great sound quality and easy to set up. I bought three and paired two receivers with one transmitter.  Works as promised. Limited range though. User manual says 33’ but it’s more like 20’ and once you walk out of range they do not automatically reconnect when you walk back in range. Manual says working battery life is 10 hours. I tested this after fully charging them and it’s more like 8 hours but that’s still impressive. They are very small and lightweight which is what I wanted. Would like to give them 5 stars but the limited range is problematic.

I HAVE 2 OF THEM. AND I LOVE THEM. USE THEM FOR TV, COMPUTER, HOOK UP WIRELESS EARBUDS OR SONY WIRELESS HEADPHONES. SO GLAD I FOUND THESE ON AMAZON. I WAS NOT ABLE TO USE THE WIRELESS HEADPHONES OR EARBUDS TILL I GOT THIS GREAT PRODUCT

Ok. So I bought this product about a month ago. At first it works great. When we first received the product, it was able to connected to both Bluetooth headphones at the same time. And just today it would only connect to one headphone and NOT BOTH. Very disappointed.
This unit allows me to connect my nice , noise cancelling headphones to my phone without using the power jack. Now, I can mow the lawn and protect my ears.

This is very easy to use.  Plug it into a standard headphone plug, plug in the microUSB (for power), and put both the transmitter and your headphones into pair mode.  Done.I haven't had a need to use this as a receiver.
Back when I used to fly constantly (pre-Covid) I used these on every trip. They work perfectly to connect my Bose headphones to the plane wirelessly. So much better than cables!!
I was really excited about this device that I would finally be able to watch TV without bother other people but it did not work for me maybe my TV is too old really sucks
This Bluetooth transmitter/receiver sets up quickly and works well. We use it in an exercise room to broadcast TV shows to Bluetooth earphones. No problems.

I’ve had this for a year now, and it’s still working just as well as when I got it. It has good sound quality, exceeeeept that you can hear the rpm’s of the engine, which sometimes makes an annoying squeal, especially if the volume on your device isn’t all the way up.
The transmitter works great with the Nintendo Switch and my Samsung Galaxy Buds+. Easy to set up, sound quality is clear and good, no noticeable sound lag or anything.

the device has a feature to save power that causes it to stop transmitting sound during low volume scenes. So it will sound like it keeps cutting in and out.. not good for gaming, movies, regular tv, etc.. I just got this in the mail today, and unfortunately I will be sending it back today as well.

Works like a dream. Connected my bluetooth headphones to it, use it on my nintendo switch and computer (which doesnt have bluetooth).  Plan to bring it with on my flight so I can continue to enjoy my nice bluetooth headphones.
Love this device! Very easy to use with a great range. I use it to stream from my computer to my headphones and have had zero issues. A great device at a great price.

The product arrived nicely packaged with instructions on set up, which was easy enough. My intention was to connect this to my electric guitar amplifier and my ear buds, eliminating the cord between the amplifier and the headphones I was using previously. I found the sound lag between my strumming and the sound reaching my earbuds to be too great to be helpful. Perhaps it was a lag created by the amplifier itself, but in any case this product was not effective for that use and I'll be sending it back.

The Taotronics Bluetooth transmitter and receiver does it all! It has great sound quality and is easy to use. I have personally used many times in my backyard, in public, and at home. I highly recommend it.

It randomly goes silent with 'detected' audio is too low for it to think something is worth transmitting. There doesnt seems to be a way to increase the sensitivity. Great company service though. If they make a better revisions I will be the first to buy.

I guess I can only give a product 1 star if it doesn't work. I bought this to connect to my Jabra 65T at the gym for the treadmill. It paired, I was able to hear sounds for 10 seconds, and then the pairing stopped. I have not been able to get it to pair in TX mode twice now. Your mileage may vary.

The device was super easy to set-up, I really like the fact that it powers off if nothing is connected to it for a period of time. Now I can stream Bluetooth audio in my car which previously only allow hardwired Aux cable
I use this to connect speaker on my deck to Alexa within the house.  Managed to connect fairly easily.  But after about 5 hours it dies.  It works but not as well as i'd like it o.

It just wouldn’t pair with my speaker.  It came well packaged and included an assortment of adapters. I bought a lamp from this same company and love it. It’s probably a great little device just at the wrong house.

I needed this item for my outdoor tv so I wouldn’t have to blast sound across my entire yard and disturb the neighbors. The unit is no bigger than a box of matches, it hooks up easily and works perfectly. The extra cables included were exactly what I needed to hook it up. I was able to connect it to the tv and power it continually by using the USB port on the tv. Pairs almost instantly and I’ve experienced no lag in transmission. I would highly recommended this product.

It works as it is claimed to work and is easy to setup. I use it on a TV with Bluetooth Headphones and it is working perfectly. I recommend purchasing this one if you are looking for a way to turn a device like a TV into Bluetooth capable

I purchased my first Bluetooth adapter from TaoTronics more than 5 years ago and it still works great.  I purchased this one since I just purchased a new headsets.  Same great quality and I can see the subtle improvements made from the first version I purchased.
I have this set up between my Sonos speaker and iMac which are less than 3 ft apart. Once connected it kept dropping signal. Impossible to watch a DVD this way

Does exactly what it advertises. I game frequently and when the wife is asleep and I can't use loud gaming headphones I use my airpods to play Online Shooters like Escape from Tarkov and counter Strike. Where split second sounds are Necessary. There is NO LAG with this device. It does exactly what it advertises. As long as you're not taking it with you and it's a stay at home device it will last. If you put it in your pocket or use it for let's say a Nintendo Switch it will NOT LAST. The headphone jack port is already bending, covered in scratches and i fear it won't make it 6 months.  good for the Price but will see if it stands the test of time.

I plugged this into my projector that I use for outdoor movies, turned it on, followed the instructions to pair and had this set up with a Bluetooth speaker in just a few minutes.  Sound is better than I could have hoped (my neighbors may not be as excited about how well this works!).

I purchased this Bluetooth transmitter/receiver for use on a plane to watch in-seat movies.  It is perfect.  It easily paired with my earbuds and sounded good.  I love that it has a built in battery that lasts for a few hours.  It is small so it travels well.  The unit comes with several cables for connections to different devices.  Smart design.  I recommend purchasing.
