Works well. I use it for an integrated amp that can only receive Bluetooth so that I can transmit whatever I’m playing through the headphone output to my BT headphones. I also use it for the TV so the wife can use same headphones to listen to TV if I wanna blast the stereo. Don’t use the RX function but for the price I don’t feel like I’m under-utilizing the product’s potential. Really like his item. Good buy!
I normally don't give out reviews, but this is impressive!  It still works as new when I got it around 3 years ago.  I will will more Taotronic products in the future.
This thing is great! The only issue is a smaller buzzing noise coming from the RX mode.  Besides that I docked a Nintendo switch and made it Bluetooth!

This device sounds great and syncs audio to video over Bluetooth with no appreciable delays. I have several bluetooth devices and they all suffer from audio sync problems, so this was a pleasant surprise that prompted me to write a positive review immediately!
I bought this to make my son's TV fully bluetooth.He is disabled but finds it easy to use.
Only for music, so if you're looking for something that you could utilize hands-free on your phone this would not be for you but if you're looking for music it works as described

I bought this to connect to my iPod classic, and play through my 2019 Subaru Outback sound system.  Could not get it to pair with the car radio...it was the car's fault, not the device, as it paired easily with my iPhone 7.  Handed it off to my son-in-law who is quite happy with it....
At first i thought it was a battery, it's that small and i was skeptical.But after charging it and plugging in my non-bluetooth headphones, i was impressed.
This has solved our issue with not being able to hear the TV clearly in the gazebo at our camper. Now the neighbors don't have to listen to what we are watching.
This thing made my tv blue=tooth capable,  I can use it with ear pods or another blue-tooth headset that I have.It so far has handled both items simultaneously.

Just received this. It came with a tiny book with pictures of all the parts and NO directions. When I called for help they told me they are in the process up updating the instruction manual... Apparently, this won’t work for my tv so I am sending it back. A waste of time and money.

An absolute lifesaver on airplanes with wireless headphones. I bought this for when traveling on airplanes with my wireless noise cancelling headphones and this is a great addition for in-seat entertainment devices. The sound quality is great and audio latency/delay is unnoticeable
This product did exactly what it was supposed to do which was allowing me to connect my stereo system's receiver to my Bluetooth headphones.  Product is very small and simple to operate.

I used the auxiliary jacks to hook this up to a receiver from the 90s.  Easy to operate and works great. I can now stream music from my phone through the receiver to my big speakers.  I am finally living in 2018!

Product works great for audio, easily connects and has good audio quality for the price. My only gripe is that is does not work with audio and microphone (if this is mentioned in the amazon product description I didn't see it). Was hoping to use this to convert an older pair of bluetooth headphones to use for conference calls, but will only be able to use it for music instead.

This product is awesome.  I initially purchased it to play my old stereo through my Bluetooth headphones.  It worked beautifully for that purpose.  It then dawned on me that it is a receiver also, so I can use it to play music from my iPhone through a non Bluetooth unit.  I love the versatility the TaoTronics Tansmitter Receiver gives my devices.
I couldn’t get the dang thing to work.  The tv I’m using is maybe too old but it does have the port so idk.  I’ll try it on my new tv at some point and maybe edit this review.
Easy to install and use. Purchased a second one and utilize both every day with no problems. WOW, Bluetooth from older TVs and all the benefits that brings.

This has helped my husband hear the tv much better.  He describes sounds he hasn’t heard in a long time (due to hearing loss).  It’s inconvenient because it has to be recharged, but the biggest negative is that if one person wants to use it, both have to because the device is all or none in terms of the way it works.  Still, if you don’t have a smart tv, I think this is the best option available.

Make sure you get a set of headphones with volume control. I paired my TV and AirPods and the volume was so loud, could not use volume control on the tv remote to change the volume. Once I figured out the trick everything worked well. Easy to pair through Amazon Firestick.
me gusto el tamaño pense que era mas grande pero tiene el tamaño de una bateria de celular por el momento todo bien bueno sonido conectividad rápida y practica.

Connects well, but has an u acceptable lag. I tried using this to connect my speaker to my outdoor projector, but it's unwatchable with nearly a one second lag. When I connect my speaker directly to the projector, there is no lag. Only this product results in a lag. So frustrating.

We were going to buy wireless headphones and then we got this bluetooth transmitter. It works just the same and is easy to connect. Very fast shipping and seller contacted me to ensure that I was enjoying the device. Very happy with my purchase.

Bought this for my wife, after I had purchased a set of bluetooth over the ear headphones, then realized unlike our other TV, the one she uses most did not support bluetooth.  Plugged this in to the 3.5mm jack in the back of the TV, as well as USB port for power. Pairing was easy and it works great. She's happy with it.  May buy another one to take to the gym so that I can listen to TV on the treadmill without karate chopping the earbud cables.

I use this to connect my old Bluray player to my Dolby Headphones and it works great. I've only used it for watching TV on the couch (about 12 feet away), so distance has never been an issue for me. It immediately connects and I've never had any issues with it. So, at least for this scenario, I highly recommend this.
Works great for one person, But it cuts the audio of the TV for other people to hear. It would be perfect if the one that's needing to use it could without the side effect of this happening.

I got it to use my Bose Bluetooth headphones with my TV. My TV has only optical out for audio, so I had to get a converter (https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00KNNSKV0/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o01_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1) to use with TaoTronics adapter. The whole setup works great! I can switch the adapter off when not using it to allow for the headphones connecting to other two devices simultaneously. Overall, I find it to be a good buy and am happy with a product.

I used this while watching movies on an airplane. I plugged it into the media unit in the back of the seat and connected it to my Sony headphones. I had no issue with the sound. I will definitely be using it again.

This was recommended to be able to listen to a portable CD player though the SUV's speakers that needed an Audio In jack that my vehicle doesn't have.  Although I tried numerous times, I was never able to get it to pair.  (It appeared to pair once, but the device didn't show up in my list of Bluetooth devices.)  Also, Ford Sync only allows 1 active Bluetooth device at a time, so even if I had been able to pair it, I wouldn't have been able to connect my phone (which I use for navigation) and the CD player at the same time, making it useless.
I found this to be hugely distracting when trying to monitor audio in a large courtroom.  It was like listening in an echo chamber.  Just too much latency for my purposes

Got this to listen to my TV with my Apple Airpods.  While this did work, I realized I had no volume control!I was replacing an old HP Bluetooth Tx & Rx set because the Tx would not work while connected to power for charging.  Since the HP Rx has a volume control and I pretty much never try and use that part while charging it, I paired that Rx to this TaoTronics Tx.  Works well!
I used this to connect my TXSR393 to a Plantronics bluetooth headset. My question to the supplier was answered very quickly and was information I was able to use.

I leave it plugged into the tv and have the usb constantly plugged in as well to keep it charged. (Knock on wood) but we haven't had a problem in the few months we have had it. Use headphones with the unit just about every night. Works great with a good range of 20-25'.

Works  as advertised. Easy to install, and easy to pair to a speaker. The only thing I don’t  like is the fact that you always have to turn on the device after the tv has been off for a while. It would be great if the transmitter will turn on right  after you turn on the tv.

Works like a champ. I was skeptical of using it as a transmitter into my soundbar as I could not command my soundbar to search for this device and vice versa. But when I put both devices into pairing mode, they connected no problem.

In my  Yamaha Receiver I had to use the analog connection ,the sound is not as good as I am custom to listening music. Connection was really easy ,but my main concern was the distance. In my case only work for 15, 20 ft max. I need at least those 30 ft that site says. If 20 ft are enough for you, this is an excellent add on to you receiver

After initial introduction, unit has worked correctly with no major problems linking to a Vizio HD TV, and a pair of headphones from Radio Shack. Just takes a little patience and attention to detail. Unit provides 45 feet connection distance, even through interior walls.

I bought this item to allow an old Apple iPod Classic to work with a pair of Apple wireless Air Ear Buds.  Why Apple discontinued  this iPod version I do not know.  It holds an immense amount of music and just focuses on this feature.  Anyway, this Bluetooth transmitter works just fine for this purpose.  Why not.five stars?  I'm not sure, maybe because nothing is perfect.  Longer battery life would be nice.

I have been looking for something to connect my non bluetooth headsets and this little device by TaoTronics is a life saver.  This is great with the new iPhones that do not have the sound port anymore and also for connecting to TVs to your bluetooth headsets.  It is both a Transmitter and a Receiver.

Bought this to play audio through the interior speakers from the TV of our 2020 Lance travel trailer. It worked a few times however now it just sits not connecting to the bluetooth DVD/CD/AM FM radio receiver.  When it worked it was perfect which is the reason for the rating. Would love to return it.

This thing worked really good...when it connected. That was the biggest issue with this. It took a long time to get it to connect via bluetooth on the plane... in the hotel... but when it did the sound quality was excellent.
Doesn’t work on apple products.

I purchase it to transmit sound to a speaker being used outside while showing movies.  I wanted the speaker under the movie screen.  I did not want to run a speaker wire all the way to the projector.  This worked great.

Bought this produce to use with my Bose speaker so I didn’t have to use an AUX to play music from my phone. This gadget is awesome. No more cords to mess with, and when I have friends over who have phones without AUX cord capabilities (thanks iPhone), they are still able to play music. Would recommend!

This product connects to my Bose&Jabra with no problem. But I later noticed that there seems to be a threshold volume such that sound below certain threshold will not be heard. When I am listening to some BGM from some Switch games, it is so obvious that the background music can only be heard from time to time. This is so annoying, please beware of this fact when you consider purchasing one.

I had the old version that would take a very long time to connect.  This new version is wonderful. And when I don't need it attached to the charger, the internal battery lasts for a long time.  I use it to attach the sound from my projector to my surround sound so I don't have to worry about wires or an expensive Bluetooth speaker.  This has saved me a ton.
Had issues connecting but they were resolved thanks to customer service

Well packaged with good instructions.  Connected to my phone easily.  (Transmitter on inside house with phone outside.  About to 20’ this through brick wall)  Bought to play outdoor speakers through stereo.  It works.  Was hoping for a little better range.  But other than that good
Ridiculously easy to use, connects quickly , converts an older receiver into a blue tooth ready one making it easy to stream music....great product

I am pretty savvy with electronics... this is not a good product, nor does it make sense. Tried maybe 5 different times, even downloaded the .pdf for review because the instruction sheet even under magnification is a joke. Anyway, I like good products, this is not one of them. great concept though.
Used to watch movies wirelessly on the airplane. Works well with AirPods pro. Volume is soft even when turned all the way up on the plane, so might not work for all

What a neat lil contraption it literary enables your device to become bluetooth. I use it on my Oculus Go. I got a lil bit of velcro and now it sits comfortably on the vr makes it looks more futuristic lol.
This hooked up and paired with my earphones very easily.  Do not have Wifi at work so used this to plug into radio. Now I don't have to worry as much about using too much data.

Small, compact, easy to connect with good range. I like the removable 3.5mm wire because the older version had a permanently attached wire that did not last (the wires frayed). I also like the control  button ease of use.
Very easy to set up!! Works great, even with my Amazon stick!!

I like this case - I originally had one without a pocket and prefer this one. I like to store my mouse and cord in the side pocket. I use my laptop in various parts of the house and this makes it easy to have everything I need in one place.This one fit my Dell 13 in laptop fine, snug enough but not too snug and the handles make it easy to grab when I need it. Good price, good product.
I don't like earphones or, especially, ear buds. This thing lets me play my old cassettes (hundreds of them) on my soundbar. It works very, very well. I'm super impressed for the price.
I found it helpful to go online at the suggested website for more detailed instructions but found, after that, the exact sound and features that I needed.

Simple and understandable instructions with ease of use. Only one negative for me is that it does not hold a charge as long as my BT headphones and I can find no warning for low power. That being the only negative is what prevented me from awarding 5 stars.
Had it working 15 minutes after I received it. Easy Bluetooth setup simple instructions. Works as advertised. A great update to 40 year old equipment.
The team behind this product is a great team and they really do have great customer service and great technology, i look forward to purchasing more of their products.
Made my non Bluetooth 2003 IPod to be able to streamline music to my Bluetooth speaker. Pretty easy to install. Follow instructions. Keep instruction for future use.

Had received the item and the audio cord was defective. Got in touch with customer support and they sent out a new cord. Great service. Oh and the item works great as well. No issues connecting my Bluetooth speakers. Works like a charm.

Volume and sound control are fine however  due to latency issues with the audio line was so bad on this product that it rendered useless for anything and I would need it for. I would highly recommend that nobody purchased this item .
It does what it's supposed to, but honestly the bluetooth doesn't seem to be super consistent upon first connection. Either way, I use it weekly and will not replace it. Worth the buy.

Inicialmente había adquirido otro producto similar que no transmitía el audio con calidad. TaoTronics tiene una excelente calidad de transmisión estéreo. Fácis de conectar además de funcionar como emisor o receptor. Ideal para conectar en SmartTV como transmisor de audio o en Sistemas de sonido como receptor.
If the sound didn't cut out when people were not talking it would be great... but as soon as they stop talking things go silent and all background sound is gone.
I'm using the transmitter to an Echo Dot from the RCA jack on my 42" Vizio TV. It works pretty well but with a very slight lag. Good enough for me and I am satisfied.

Plugged into our TV audio out jack so we don’t disturb guests at night. Works great.  There is a high pitched tone around 13khz that might be distracting for those of us with sufficiently good hearing to notice it.

The bluetooth transmitter does exactly what it says it will do.  Works great in my office.  My work involves listening to lots of music, creating tracks, etc., and the Tao Tronics unit really frees me from having to be right at my desk.  Range is even better than I expected.
Probably a great adapter, however; we have a low end Visio and it was not compatible. You should check compatibility before you go ahead a buy it.

So far as stated. Bought for my husband to allow him to play his music thru the speakers of our camper via the integrated sound system.Sound is good, great price for what you get. Overall happy, but one button for multiple functions makes it a bit complicated to use and must keep the directions handy. Would prefer seperate power/play/pause buttons.
I bought this for my husband for father's day. Mainly got it to listen from spotify through the car radio. Sound is great and works great! Definitely recommend.
Makes life in house great because my husband can listen to the TV with his headphones with this transmitter. Now we can all hear ourselves think
Being an elderly person with limited electronic knowledge even I could figure out how to hook up this TT Bluetooth transmitter.  The directions are spot on.  No problem with hook up or pairing.

I tried a pair of Bluetooth 5.0 headphones and 4.2 headphones. They had Horrible lag. About 300ms. Making it unusable... HOWEVER,After buying certified "apt-X Low Latency" headphones (NOT apt-X HD!) they work without perceivable lag. I bought these "[2019 New] Avantree Clari Air Dual Driver Hi-fi Sound Bluetooth Earbuds, aptX LL". They don't have the greatest sound quality due to the foam earplugs not staying completely in the ear, but they work.

Thought it was only me but i found a few other reviews that couldn’t hear anything during low volume scenes during movies. I have these connected to the Bose Quiet Comfort IIs and was planning to watch movies with it at night, but was kinda disappointed :( they work great with music though, but thats not what i got them for

I purchased this to use while traveling. However, due to its versatility I use it in the evenings to watch my Apple TV (so everyone can sleep) and also at work to stream music from my computer since cell service is horrible.

This was super easy.  Charged it, plugged into my soundwave audio in, set it in Rx(receiving mode), turned on.  Went to control panel on my windows PC, typed in bluetooth on search bar, and clicked on find bluetooth device.  Boom- it found it right away.  Opened up itunes and I'm enjoying music on the Bose!

Used almost everyday!  Pairs well with my phone and has great range.  Hooked up to a central stereo in my house, I can listen to music from my phone and never lose signal.  This has also been ideal for DJing when I decide to free up and cut loose on the dance floor, never losing signal when I switch to remote control with my phone.  Great investment!  Highly recommend!
Great so far! Charged and paired quickly. Does exactly what I wanted it to, which is to transmit tunes from my desktop PC to my Bose headphones. Highly recommended!

I have a speaker in the house that I thought I had no use for. Then enters this Bluetooth device. I had my eye on it for a while wondering if it would work. I got it and it was almost immediate plug and play. One of the best purchases I’ve made at such a low cost
Used this to link a laptop to a PA system.  Two of these connected easily and lasted all day.  Sound quality was quite good.  no issues in a large conference room.
Audio lag from video on movies unacceptable.  Returned.  Perhaps someone else has better and faster technology to avoid this annoying problem.

At this point, have connected the product to the tv for transmitting and with one headset for receiving, which worked as described. I imagine a second headset linked to it will work as well. It should be noted that it does not automatically mute the TV when connected to it in tx mode.
Great device!  Used it on a flight from a Phila to Paris, and was able to watch movies on the seat in front of me with my wireless earbuds.  Very cool!

Worked great for a few months. Now it won't pair with anything. The lights will flash red/blue indicating it's in pairing mode but it will not show up on any devices (phone, laptop, headphones, etc).UPDATE:  The seller reached out to me and sent me a replacement. Has been working for over a year now.

Purchased with Bluetooth ear buds to watch tv. Instructions didn’t include how or where to hook into the tv but all the wires were included and pretty easy to figure out. Easy set up and pairing and works perfectly and exactly what I needed. Great value. Highly recommend.

I bought this Bluetooth transmitter for my car when I got my new phone that doesn't have a headphone jack. I was first worried that it might not work well since I trust wired connection more, but to no one's surprise this thing just connects and work without questions.I had quite a few Bluetooth connection issues on my PC in the past, but so far with this transmitter I haven't run into any issues yet. Would recommend.

On vacation and have tried over an hour connecting one set of airpods let alone two sets. This should be trivial, not impossible! Have read many sites and many suggestions and have finally given up. Save  your money, and your sanity.
I wanted an extra Bluetooth transmitter for my iPod but didn't work at all, even though I followed the instructions to the T. I sent mine back.
Purchased this to listen to the TV with my bluetooth headset so I wouldn't disturb others. Pairing was a breeze and the sound quality was excellent. Overall, a great product!

I honestly didn’t know what i was getting myself into but my lady hates the tv on at night and i love it. Now she sleeps peacefully with the tv volume on mute and this little wonder transmits the volume to my Bose headphones in bed. I should’ve bought two. It’s that awesome.
Used it to connect my bluetooth telephone to my radio. Transmits my music, or whatever I want to transmit, to my sauna music system. Easy to install and works well.
I use this for my 80gb iPod so I connect it to my wireless headphones at work. The battery last probably about 5 hours of continued use.

This transmitter/receiver was straight forward to connect to my phone's Bluetooth. The sound quality is great; no static or feedback at all. Super easy to hook up to the car. I have a Mini Cooper Countryman and the built-in USB and AUX ports work perfectly with this device. It also fits in the console tray nicely.

There is a one or two second delay from TV to bluetooth speakers so this doesn't work for that. Too annoying seeing lips not synced. I'll have to try using it with my old stereo amplifier. Hopefully it will work receiving signal from my iphone.

This was a great product.  It worked as expected.  Initially, I purchased to make my digital piano connect to Bluetooth speakers, but that didn't go as well as expected, but for all my other devices, it was perfect!!!
this is awesome!. thanks works great and allows one user to have 2 set of ear buds connected to one device.. good for silent dancing lol

Tried first with laptop and worked easily. Works great to be wireless on flights. Being able to use own Bluetooth earphones rather than being locked into the lousy airline earbuds is much better. No issues.

This product works great even though I had an issue with the first unit that was sent out the seller made it right and sent me out a replacement that has been working flawlessly. I would highly recommend this device
Just what I needed for watching TV at night. No lag at all with both of my bluetooth 4.0 headphones.  Major lag with my bluetooth 3.0 headphones, but I expected that.

I bought this to work on the radio in my Excavator. It works and interacts with my Galaxy Note perfectly. I can transmit my music through the radio or transmit the radio through my phone and hear whatever I wish. GREAT Device and Great price
I hook this up to my TV. Clear sound and decent range. They claim you can charge while using but when l do there is a lot of static.
This is an amazing product. It allowed me to turn an old 1990's era CD player into a modern blue tooth transmission CD player. I didn't have to throw away any of my old CDs. No that's amazing!

I was using this with my Bose Bluetooth headphones until it just quit.  After about 2 months it just stopped pairing with the headphones.  The headphones continue to pair with all other devices but not this one.  I have tried everything no luck.  Be careful.
This thing works great with my QC35’s so I can go wireless on flights m.

We bought this to get sound from our projector to our Bluetooth speakers. It took a few attempts to connect but it did and sound is great BUT we cannot control the volume and after a while it is just too loud to listen. We are going to try in another projector to see if same issue. Not sure if it’s me or the product. Other than that, it serves its purpose well and seems good quality.

This litter receiver works very well with my wife's car. She has a car with just an aux input. I originally bought this to use with my Nintendo Switch, but as I didnt not pay attention that this was just a receiver, not a transmitter. That was my fault.
Worked once and now cannot get it to sync with the bluetooth headphones.  Have tried all forms of troubleshooting and have given up.  Micro-manual that comes with it isn't much help.

Me gusta mucho para conectar mi pc vieja con mis airpods pro. No hay latencia.. La calidad es aceptable pero si me hubiese gustado que tenga más calidad de bajos, en general estoy a gusta con mi producto.
We were looking for a product to make the sound from the tv come through our RV's speaker. This worked perfectly. We can use it for the inside speakers or the outside ones with our projector.
Product as advertised good range & sound quality.  Good instructions product operation quickly had it working with my Bluetooth ear buds.

I use this to connect my television to my variety of Bluetooth earbuds and headphones. Easy to set up and works great.  I happened to have a volume adapter but one on the device would have been cool. Other than that it’s great.
Easily enabled connection of bluetooth headphones to my non Bluetooth tv.  I Have been using it daily for several months and it works great.

I used the product to transmit sound from both a tv and computer to bluetooth headphones.  Sometimes the bluetooth connected quickly and flawlessly, sometimes it look a little fiddling.  Even with the aptX there was still a little lag between the picture and sound on the tv.  Overall I'd say it works well for the price.
Sound cuts off totally during low volume periods and doesn't come back on until the source is loud again - extremely annoying during movies etc.

I bought this so I could ditch my wired headset and just use my air pods pro for everything. They’re amazing, easy to use, and in a convenient package. Pro tip for pairing with AirPods, make sure the air pods are in the case when you try to pair. Spent a good 10 minutes troubleshooting before I’d remembered that’s a key step to the process.

I am super happy with this purchase. I can either use it to receive bluetooth or use it to transmit bluetooth. I have wireless headphones (not bluetooth). I use this to connect my wireless transmitter to my smart TV via bluetooth. VERY happy with the results.
Bought this to connect my non Bluetooth tv to Bluetooth headphones. Easy to sync up and works really well. Well worth the price and it even comes with the audio Jack's to connect RCA. GREAT PRODUCT!

This is a small light weight Bluetooth transmitter that easily pairs with two Bluetooth receivers.  It has a rechargeable battery which is great and lasts a long time between charges.  It has great sound quality.
I use the TaoTronics' to transmit my TV audio to my bluetooth enabled hearing aid.The sound quality is excellent and the fidelity is good.
I've only had this a couple days, but it works perfectly for my needs.  I can use wireless headphones/earbuds with both my computer, and my satellite box.  Great stereo TV experience!
Great sound quality. Highly recommend. Use it in our movie room when wife insists on working next to me on couch on laptop. Don't know what I would do without it.

It paired well enough to the wireless headphones I have. But there is a noticeable lag in signal processing and transmission. I bought it to use with a guitar amp. The delay between playing a note and hearing it through the headphones makes it useless for that purpose.
I really liked this as the connectivity was good. I am eager to use this in the flight.  I hope I get a chance to use it in the flight soon.
Easy install and great reception/transmission.  It works great with the Tao aptX earbuds and all my other wireless headsets.  Great product!

More information from vendor would have been nice. Does not work with a 2020 Volvo XC60. Never recognized by auto's Bluetooth search function. After numerous tries, I'm giving up. Even tried finding it on the iPhone & MBP, never recognized let alone paired. Hard to figure out which standard this device is. Online instructions from various sources didn't help. Thus, turns out this was a blind purchase with the vague hope it would work...and it doesn't.

I am truly amazed by Tao Tronics.  I purchased the Tao Tronics soundbar and the Tao Tronics bluetooth transmitter.  I am truly amazed by the quality of the product as well as the price.  I highly recommend Tao Tronics products to everyone.

I purchased this because I work from home.  Bluetooth headphones for my husband while he watches TV are an absolute requirement to maintain a quiet environment for my work. This Bluetooth transmitter works great with his headphones, is easy to use, and has been reliable.  Definitely recommend.

This was my solution to getting better audio out of my new TV. Cheaper than a soundbar, and less noisy for neighbors.I paired my Bluetooth headphones very quickly, and then enjoyed a very loud Marvel movie! Have also used it to listen to music played on YouTube on my office PC. Sound quality is very good. A few issues with the connection failing for a few seconds while watching TV, but that does not seem to be a pervasive problem.

This is an easy addition I use to hook up my bluetooth headset to my TV.  It works easy and great.  After I learned the routine, you press the power button, press it again for a few seconds to start the link, then wait about 30 seconds and your headset works.  Turning off is a cinch; hold the power button for about 5 seconds and it powers off.  The small size is perfect.
good sound.  sometimes buzzes/whines when listening on higher volumes while chargingedit:

This is the most inconsistent device ever. Headphones blue tooth capability tested and works fine. Paired with phone and audio comes through. Tested on multiple tv’s using both connection options and despite device being “paired” no audio transmits. Got it to work for a little while with some pedantic resetting and unplugging. Now nothing.

The TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter and Receiver is an essential part of my air travel kit.  It works flawlessly, allowing me to hear in flight entertainment with my wireless headset.  I tried several other transmitters, and this one best fit my needs, for size, time of use between charges, and ease of use. Easy to use, easy to set up, I recommend it highly.
There is a noticeable lag in the speaking on TV. The"Hagibis Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter Receiver, 2 in 1 Wireless aptX HD Audio 3.5mm Jack Adapter"

I recently bought a pair of Apple AirPods and was having trouble connecting them wirelessly to my TV through the provided system. I bought this little transmitter/receiver, and have been enjoying watching TV with my AirPods since! It's very simple to connect to the TV, and as a regular traveler, I appreciate the very small size. It will be great for using with airplane entertainment systems!

This was my first purchase of a Bluetooth tx/rx, and I am pleased with it! Setup was easy, I connected this in tx mode to an older stereo without bluetooth to transmit to my bose quietcomfort headphones. All I can say: It works and the quality is really good! Of course bluetooth audio quality is not audiophile quality, but it is still excellent. I would highly recommend it!

It’s nice and small and works easily. The battery held a charge several days. I typically charge it each night before using it at work. I fly small tour planes and it allows me to use my cell phone as a background music device.I wish I had gotten one that offers changing to the next song and volume control. I did not read the description well enough beforehand but it’s not a big nuisance to have to use the phone for that
It works very well but it has a limited range.  30 feet away and the signal drops.  All other aspects are very good.  There is minimal lag and excellent sound quality.
Who knew?  This little device works perfectly with my new Aftershokz Titanium Mini headphones on the treadmills and other entertainment-equipped machines at my gym.  Perfect!
This is the best product available for use in an airplane with the inflight entertainment system. I tested this personally and it works exactly as promised.
Really like this product, I don’t sleep at night much and this small yet simple device has been able to allow others to sleep when I can’t. Awesome!!!
Power on and pairs easily but it seems that the sound seems to cut in and out no matter which bluetooth headphones I useEdit:

Customer service was outstandingWe wanted these for a drum kit but the delay was too great. Good as an add on for devices without blue tooth but not for instruments. Customer service was great but unable to resolve our problem other than refund or replace.
I love this little transmitter. I plugged it into my chromebook and now I can sit and watch a show or listen to music with earbuds without disturbing people around me. I love it!

This is perfect for our set up we have at our pool. No need to get up and switch cords when someone else wants to play their playlist. All we have to do is disconnect one unit and reconnect another. We love it!
This is a small device that you can have it with you all the time. I am using this to transmit my record player to a bt speaker and it is pretty good. No issues.
Lo estoy usando con unos audifonos MPOW ademas de acoplarlo a otros equipos que no vienen con bluetooh de fabrica

Bought this along with Bluetooth headphones so my husband could watch tv while I read. Best money I ever spent! He is NOT tech savvy AT ALL and he had it set up in just a few minutes. It works great and we are both happy!

Good little device. Literally took 2 minutes to plug it in and pair Bluetooth headphones to it. Good sound quality. Can’t review battery life or durability, as I just got it last night, but so far I’m impressed.
I have a nice amplifier it is not blue tooth.I hooked up my TaoTronics Bluetooth Transceiver

This is a great little transmitter! I use it for our TV in the living room especially when others are in bed. It pairs quickly with a pair of earbuds I have. It charges with no problem and lasts about 4-5 hours with ease. I would buy from this seller again.

I bought this so I could use my wireless Bose headphones on planes with the seatback screens. Sometimes I hear a little static or only in one ear but honestly it works fine for what I bought it for- just watching movies and tv on flights. I don’t know that I’d love it as much if I were trying to listen to music with it though

Ive bought a few in the past but I love this one Ive had it for years and people are shocked I have such good bluetooth in my car or shed/computer or even headphones..For so cheap.. And I use it everyday
I bought two to send audio from a non Bluetooth device to an amp. One the transmitter, one the receiver. It actually works. No Bluetooth needed. Pretty cool.
Use this to connect my mini projector to my portable Bluetooth speaker. Then I can have sound coming from the screen instead of the projector.
Initially I had some difficulty with this unit - but the customer service team has gone out of their way to help fix the problem. Will update with further info later.
I am using this with my metal detector and it works great. Long lasting charge, no latency with my AptX headphones. Happy camper.
this device is much better than the original one, I can pair two Bluetooth devices at one time, and it connects much faster This is a great product for the price, and the shipping was as stated.

Really great product - as a transceiver and receiver it gives a lot of options to make audio setups easier.Great battery life and sounds. Easy pairing with headsets (although it‘s good to have the PDF of the manual with you when traveling..)
Occasionally a little trouble when connecting, a little more so with the send/rec model.Overall though a pretty solid product which is why I have 2 of them.

I've been trying to find a bluetooth adapter that doesn't turn off AND doesn't have connection problems.  This adapter didn't have connection or stuttering issues but it turns off after 5 minutes of inactivity.  The next time you want to connect a device you need to press the button again!  Will be returning it.
A must have if you fly Delta’s newer planes that have the audio and usb next to each other on the monitor and want to use your AirPods or Powerbeats, etc.
Now I can use my vintage iPod with bluetooth headphones or speakers...  very versatile being both transmitter and receiver capable.
Followed the instructions to the tee. Having had other brands, it was disappointing that the device would not pair. Returned for refund.
I have a Bluetooth speaker that works on any other device, but it paired once with this and never would again. It still pairs with my phone easily.

with all my other devices once the headphones have been paired once, they will automatically repair with that device when I turn my headphones off and back on.  With this thing I have to manually repair every time I turn the headphones (an LG and a Samsung) back on.

I've had no issues with this product and it syncs easily to my Smart TV and headphones. My husband and I can watch a movie when it's late at night and not disturb others, which is why we bought this item. We've been using it regularly for a while now. I would recommend it as an easy way to solve a noise problem around the home.

I bought this to connect an old CRT television to bluetooth headphones and it has worked great for this purpose. The headphones always pair quickly when powered on, and bluetooth stays connected until I turn them off. The aptX Low Latency is great for watching TV since there is no lip sync delay that you get with other bluetooth codecs. It's a solid product that's a bargain at this price point.

This is a great little device. Comes with a 3.5 headphone and Male RCA adapters. Well made and works perfect with my ipod classic. I bought it in conjunction with a FM bluetooth transmitter for my vehicle. I leave them plugged in the power socket, as soon as I turn on the ignition it's ready. It can be used for lots of other gadgets if you need to transmit or receive a bluetooth signal.
It works pretty well with devices I have. No volume control for transmitter, you must have it in your device: speaker, headphones.

A little awkward to use and manual was basic help.  I managed to pair with skullcandy crushers after 15 min of messing with both.  There is a delay from my guitar amp to headphones making it a bit odd, so I cant give a 5 star because of that, but they work and I've had no issues.

This thing is really useful, and nice and small.  The sound quality is great when running on batteries.  Unfortunately, when plugged in, there is an annoying buzzing sound ☹EDIT: the manufacturer got in touch with me, and sent a replacement unit that doesn't buzz at all when plugged in, seems they fixed the issue
Just what I was looking for! From the moment that I connected it, never have I had an issue where I loose connectivity due to being too far or something.... worth every single penny

Can’t get transmiter to connect to my Bluetooth earbuds . I connect one bud as per instructions them try to pair second bud and it cuts off the first bud and connects the second bud. I can faintly hear the first bud after second bud paired.
Took me awhile to figure out transmit and receive terminology. Probably because I'm not a techie. Once set up, it preformed very well. Well worth the price.

TaoTronics always makes a good product.  I own several devices from them and never had an issue.  This device works well and provides good quality sound.  Easy to use with most of my device's.  I highly recommend this product and seller.

The best one I’ve tried yet! Can leave plugged into usb power at all times. No buzzing/interferance noises or battery issues. Please update description to say no batteries required! Battery is built-in!
It works as advertised. I had a problem with one, they immediately replaced it, so i bought three more. Battery lasts all night

I've used studio headphones and IEMs with this thing and the first thing I hear when I connect them to this device is a constant HISS. It's super loud and distract; I know it's not from the transmitting device because this thing generates that sound even if it's not connected to anything.Would not recommend this thing at all.

Bought this to use for my amp, sat 7 ft away with no obstructions, music is cutting in and out, tested with 2 different phones, problem is from the TaoTronics bluetooth transmitter. Will not be buying again, this is bluetooth 5.0 and from a 7-8 foot range it is giving me a headache.
I plug it into my tv, and listen to movies through my Bluetooth earbuds! Excellent sound quality and no lag time. Definitely recommend!

These are great...work as expected and were easy to setup.  I got 2 of them in short time to setup a Halloween effect.  I didn't have to do anything but set the mode to transmit and setup the bluetooth speakers to receive.
This is my second purchase of the same product cus it’s that awesome. Well, that and i Lost the first one. It does what it suppose to do and battery last long enough.

I purchased this originally to connect two sets of headphones to my iPad.  It worked great with no problems.  I've since relocated the Bluetooth Transmitter to our Church's Sound board. It allows us to send music from iPads and Phones to our sound system completely wirelessly.  I plan to purchase a couple more in the near future.

Works as advertised except NOT for Alexa streaming. If using this in TX paired to Echo (like for TV sound, which works ok) and you ask Echo to stream other audio (like XM), XM plays about 30sec then reverts to Bluetooth. Probably Alexa’s fault but Amazon tech said not. Also, volume seems too low.

took me a while to get it to pair to my bluetooth earbud but got it to pair after unplugging the TaoTronics from my laptop (even though the steps in the instructions listed having it plugged first). after pairing, i plugged it in my laptop and it worked great. i got as good of a sound quality as my earbuds is capable of, which is pretty good. but the reason i got the TaoTronics is to use it on my Oculus Go and unfortunately it didn't work good. the sound kept dropping. actually, it was mostly no sound. i'd only get like a second of sound for every like 5-10 seconds of silence. so yeah, pretty much unusable for my Go but i'll still use it for my laptop

Absolutely stunning. Is the range good? yes Can I adjust the volume on my headphones? yes Is the sound quality good? yes Is it large in size? no Did it save my relationship when someone wants to study and someone wants to watch tv? YES!!!!!!!! Buy it!!!!
im confused on how to get this too work/pair however..... it does as promised. will connect two headphones to it and play with no lag.

Use this in my Jeep to plug into the AUX port and play tunes. Was easy to pair and the battery hasn't run out after a couple hours use, though I charge it occasionally. Nice small form factor. Highly recc!
I can watch television now, through my headphones, with the volume turned up as loud as I want without disturbing anyone!
I had no problem connecting a portable speaker and transmitting sound!from my projector.  My setup is about 20 feet in distance with no interference between.
Does exactly what I needed. I’m satisfied with what I got for what I paid.Like the quick Bluetooth connection when the earplugs are turned on.
This little unit works great.  It was a snap to pair to my headphones and it has a long range.  Great product and fast delivery.

I purchased a Yamaha receiver at about the same time that receivers were just beginning to be sold with bluetooth.  At the time I wasn't willing to spend the extra $100 it took to get bluetooth.  This $30 gadget does the trick and it works beautifully.  Sound quality is excellent and it runs for hours before I have to recharge it.  I highly recommend this product.

This is a fantastic Bluetooth transmitter! It was easy to set up and works perfectly! I can now play Napster and SeriusXM remotely from my iPhone around my house on my old school home stereo system!! And you can’t beat the price!
Sound quality is good , but when using it to watch TV the audio is out of sync 😕  so its not too much out of sync but it gets annoying 😒

I bought this so I could watch TV with wireless headphones, Jaybird X4. I still can't, because the device does not connect to my headphones. It connects perfectly to my phone. I've watched how-to videos and read the manual plenty. It should work.
Easy to connect works with two Bluetooth headphones at once.  Love this easy to connect and battery life isn't a problem at all.
Very small. Works very good. I don't understand the volume control question on this survey. Doesn't have a long battery life.

So far so good. Using it in the bedroom on my LG Bluetooth headset over a distance of about 15 feet. Sound quality is excellent. Occasionally there is a little interference for a couple seconds but it goes away.Overall very good.
I use it to pair my wireless headphones to my TV so I don't disturb other people. It works well and has good Bluetooth Range.
I bought this transmitter so that I could use AirPods Pro on airplanes with the in-flight entertainment system. This transmitter connects properly and works with the AirPods Pro.
Best of three different TaoTronics adapters I have tried. Have a problem with lag, so I sometimes hear the TV before headset.

The latency is very bad. Not good for watching videos nor for real-time audio...like sound recording, DJing, or podcast production. Okay for listening to music.Update: After a firmware update the unit works fine.
I wanted simplicity. It would pair with a JBL Beats wireless tube. It never ever paired with SAME BRAND TaoTronics bluetooth headphones Model TT-BH048 .  I am irritated.

It is smaller than I expected. Works well with my Bose headphones I can control the volume through with my headphones. The range is really nice as well. I use it with my TV had to use the included AV adapter as plugging it into the 3.5mm audio jack didn't work.
Bought this to link my TV to wireless headphones. Works really well. Just have to mute tv sound if no one else is watching so as not to disturb others.

Works great with my tv.  I paired it with an old Bluetooth speaker that I’ve had 3-4 years.  It paired perfectly and I noticed just the slightest delay in audio compared to video.  I plan to buy a Taotronics BT sound bar and expect there will be no noticeable delay.  Only one minor complaint is that I turn off the tv at bedtime and turn off the speaker, but the transmitter flashes red or blue waiting for a signal.  Then I have to get out of bed to shut it off.  Otherwise I’m quite happy with this device.
It can be frustrating to pair to a set of headphones (or a speaker) when in transmit mode, but once you figure that part out it is a wonderful little device.

The latency is kinda bad. There is at the very least a 0.3 second latency delay. That doesnt sound like much at all, but its very noticeable, especially for video games.The sound has a very low threshold, meaning if your volume is any where at 30% its always cutting in and out, as if its trying to auto adjust for some reason. Its very jarring and very annoying to the ear.

This vendor should either stop selling this device or put up a prominent warning not to buy for owners of Airpod Pros. It will not reliably pair with Airpod Pros. I am getting about one successful pairing for every ten tries. If you have 30 minutes or more to fiddle with this device every time you want to listen with your Airpod Pros, then you can pay your money and take your chances. Otherwise stay away!

The audio is clear and the range is great. I can go anywhere in my apartment, still hear the audio on my Bluetooth Headphones, even with the doors closed. Almost no latency. Buy it, definitely worth it.
My son is using this in his older car to hook up his MP3 player. It is working well, doing the job it needs to be doing.
Can’t give this a rating. The instructions are real bad and I never figured out how to use it. Just sits on a shelf.
Must buy if you own wireless Bluetooth ear piece and travelling. This is the only way to use your BT ear piece in plan.
Unfortunately this unit did not connect with bluetooth earbuds or iPhone. However, the company has been very diligent in returns and customer service. I would try their product again in the future.
Do not purchase if you are trying to bluetooth an audio interface (such as a Focusrite) to Bluetooth headphones. Too much latency.I figure this would work very well with other equipment.
States that it connects to two speakers, which it does.  However one continually will drop off and it is difficult to reconnect.

I have used this for 10 months with no problems, then it quit working. I went thru warranty support, received excellent support and suggestions on what to do. It turned out my USB cable I used for charging had gone bad, the unit was working fine!
Works great. I use it with my projector.  There's a slight lag when  I connect to my receiver but its like 1/2 a second.

When you turn down the volume on the television the volume is also turned down on the Bluetooth speaker. I got this so I could turn down the television and keep the volume up on the speaker so my husband could hear it better. There is also a noticeable delay between the television and the speaker. We wouldn't notice it if we could turn down the volume on the television and keep the volume up on the speaker. We've tried everything to make it work. :(
Tested on laptop, chromebok and TV, it pairs my two bluetooth headphones, excelent sound quality on both. Great value for the price!

I have purchased a few TaoTronics products (another transmitter/receiver and couple pairs of headphones) and have been pretty happy with their performance.  I purchased this product for AptX support, but apparently it is not supported in receiver mode, which isn't clear based on the product description.  AptX functions as expected on my headphones, so I know it should work with the right receiver.  I'll be returning and trying TROND's transmitter  next.
Works great, long-lasting battery, compact and very light. I'm pleased to be using a device without built in bluetooth as a bluetooth device now.

This is a nice add on for anyone without Bluetooth devices, I used it on my Laptop so I could use Bluetooth headphones to listen to youtube, Netflix, and so on. I've had no issues with it and it was a lifesaver when I was recovering from surgery and couldn't use the laptop on my lap thus could only use wireless headphones.
The only thing I could ever get this to connect to was my Alexa dot.  Never could get it to connect to my Harley or Sena head set systems. Just tried and tried for over a year and not I've given up.
This is live save when I want to watch shows and YouTube but not bother my family, the gadget is a bit finicky at times, but it’s so useful that I’ll look it over

I love (LOVE) that this is a transmitter AND receiver!  I put it in receiver mode and can dj from my phone.  I put it in transmitter and can dj from the sound board.  Why am I just discovering this!  Connects easy and fast every time.

The product works great. I paired it to an old XM radio and Bluetooth speakers and it works great!!!!  Fast shipping and the seller will follow up with you after receiving the product to see if you have questions. Definitely will buy from this seller again.

I purchased this Bluetooth transmitter so I can listen to sports on my TV without interfering with my wife's ability to hear her music. It has enough range so I can still hear my programs from most places in our house.  I am very pleased with this purchase.
After receiving a broken unit, the people of TaoTronics immediately send me a replacement without questions in order to fulfill my expectation and now it works great. Thank you TaoTronics
I bought this product to use with my electronic drum set. I connected my Sennheiser Bluetooth headphones which uses apt-x. But the latency made it impossible to play drums using this device.
Set up was fairly easy. Not SUPER easy. You need to have SOME tech skills to set up. Worked great. Used to to connect wireless Blue Tooth headphones to the TV. Would buy again.

This product was very easy to connect.  It worked the first time for both my i phone and headphones.  I did call customer service with some simple questions and they were extremely helpful.  I am planning to buy another of these devices for my downstairs television.
Would not pair to vehicle. Called customer service 4 different times and was put on hold then hung up on.  I guess the customer service  is like the product .......A COMPLETE JOKE !!!

Great product that is able to be used for transmitting and receiving Bluetooth signals making most any product wireless. Love being able to connect to the entertainment system on the plane without a cord. The initial connection took a couple of tries but works flawlessly once paired.

Initially bought for pairing headphones to TaoTronics transmitter out of smart TV.. There was substantial lag between frame rate sync(video) & audio. If using just for audio then you dont really notice but still lag.. You definitely dont get quality built into this little guy. You can open it up & find very poor soldering connections to inputs(circuits), cheap housing & not very much protection to the battery(board.) Typical battery life for the day & age. The one thing that did justice was the range of signal. Carried very well in noise & other frequencies.

I use this product to transmit to my wireless headphones and speakers to add to the entertainment sound experience.  Especially useful for when the soundbar in unwanted by others in the household.  Keep the sound without offending others.

without any mishap at all, this unit stopped syncing after only a few uses.it was difficult to pair from the beginning, but then it started cutting in and out for a few seconds and it never paired again.  far too expensive to be trying to keep up with replacing them every three months, so i can't recommend this product.
Garbage. Took a long time to figure out how to pair it. Once I finally got it paired it disconnected and then I was never able to get it paired again.
Easy to use. I ranked sound quality mid-level because it seems to drop a split second of sound following any silence

The high level output of this devices makes it great for plugging in just about anything. The streaming quality is very good and distance is shockingly good too. As with any Bluetooth device there is delay but for music that is totally fine, just don't try to watch tv with this.

This is a great product when it comes to connectivity and it charges with the USB outlet behind TV. It takes a while in the beginning to connect but after that it connects very easily. The only drawback is that you have to turn it on every time you turn on the TV unless you plug it in directly to the power source. Overall, i am very happy with the product and will buy it again.
Sometimes sound cuts out.  Iuse it primarily on airplane to use bt headphone with airplane entertainment system.  They work great!

I have only had this for a week now but it works great for listening to the TV through head phones and the sound quality is very good. I plan on using this to blue-tooth the car and motorcycle radio to my phone and will review again when I do.

First unit didn’t work well at all. I reviewed it, customer service got back to me. They replaced it with a newer version and threw in a complimentary copies of earbuds. I have not had an opportunity to test it out yet, but am impressed with their service.

My understanding is that the Bose bluetooth headphones that I am using (paired with this device)...does not feature aptX Low Latency and because of that, I'm not able to use that feature. But, with that said - while I do see/hear a small delay while watching dialogue on TV, it's not enough to bother me that bad. I've already watched a few movies using this device connected to my stereo receiver (in the headphone jack)...and I'm happy with the purchase.
I knew nothing about Bluetooth things. This was very easy to use and connect to my TV for speakers for my deck. I was very happy it was so easy to understand.
Slight echo when connecting 2 speakers.  And a slight lag delay from the picture on the tv.  But overall, it’s a great product!

It doesn't work to adjust volume with my airpod. I never expected lol is there any thing i can do figure out?3.30 updated- Thatronics customer service contacted me. and I am so impressed how to deal with the customer experience. and they resolved problem with other way. thank you!

The product came in great packaging so your guaranteed that your product will arrive in great condition. I used the product and I don’t even notice any sort of delay when I’m using two Bluetooth device. I also like the feature that your can turn any non Bluetooth device into a Bluetooth device for example a TV or a car that has aux but no Bluetooth. Great product highly recommend it.
Easy enough to connect to your Bluetooth earbuds/headphones, but won’t always stay connected unfortunately. Was having connection issues while about 6ft away from the receiver :(

2nd review: After 1 year using it I noticed the problem happens when I try to connect high quality sound and when it has been in use for long time (maybe some heating issues) .The sound is frequently interrupted. After 2 months the bluetooth connection stops working
Does exactly what I need it to. It allows me to attach this to the TV or laptop so I can use my bluetooth headphones with it.  Quality sound and connects to your headphones really easily!
I use this all the time with my projector. I cast my phone to a HDMI Screencast Mini and then bluetooth the sound to my bose soundlink!

The sound is fine. The issue with this device is the delay in the sound and also pausing of sound if too quiet. for instance if you are using a nintendo switch to connect this to bluetooth headphones, you will miss sections of sound as you move around the screens or between apps. Any lapse in audio causes the device to pause transmission which brings you silence when there should be noise. I would not purchase except for streaming music or audio you don't care if it matches with mouths moving on screen.
Used it on the airplane from Denver to Hawaii, nice not having to deal with the cord from the plug to headphones.

I bought this to connect Bluetooth headphones to my TV. The sound quality is great, there is no sound delay and the range works great for my large living room. I have even left them walking into other bedrooms and the bathroom with no problems. I will be purchasing these again for other electronics I have in my house
Seems to work OK in RX mode but my unit will not pair in TX mode for me. Perhaps my particular unit is defective.

It took me a long time to get my Bose 35 headphones to pair with this product, then in the middle of using it, it ran out of charge!  Had to wait 2 hours to use my phones again.  Save yourself some trouble and go for the Avantree Bluetooth transmitter, it charges while you're using it.  Worth the extra $5 and great tech support.
It would not hook to my AirPods then it would blink all night then it stoped working after 2 times.I don’t like to give bad reviews but it might help someone else.

There is a noticeable delay when using this with wireless earbuds and my TV. I’ve gotten used to it so it doesn’t bother me as much as it did at first.UPDATE: After submitting this review, Taotronics sent me the updated version as well as a free pair of compatible wireless headphones, and pretty much fixed the problem. I am impressed that the company is eager to satisfy their customers. Thank you!
I got a few of these and this is the only good one.  I wish the batteries would last longer, but considering how bad the others are, I’m lucky it works at all.

I love this product and it is an amazing product. I bought this to connect my reclining Bluetooth chair which has speakers it's amazing I have Bluetooth surround sound now. Also it's amazing when you can sit on the patio and listen to music from your television while you're outside sitting by the pool. Such as NFL football games

Connected device directly to my TV’s headphone output and quickly Bluetooth connected my pair of Harmon headPhones. There was no delay in the quality of sound.  Another positive is the size of the product allows you to easily conceal it behind the TV.  Great product and would buy again.

This transmitter worked exactly as described. I was able to hook up two more speakers to my Echo Dot. As other reviewers have remarked, the transmitter doesn't hold a charge very long, but it works fine even while it's charging. I highly recommend.
Works acceptably with bluetooth headphones (although some latency).  Major latency issues speaker.  I don't recommend this product.

Could not be easier to pair with my Samsung smart TV. Now I can watch movies or play games late at night without bothering my neighbors and without stringing headphone extension cords across the room.
Easy to use with our projector
It would not charge or turn on so I never had a chance to try it. So I was contacted by seller concerning my issue and they sent me a new one and it works as advertised. Just what i needed.

Works very well. Good battery life. Good quality audio (considering it starts with an analog signal.) It can charge while operating. It gives my Chevy or my old laptop bluetooth capability. The cables it comes with are wholly generic. That's a good thing because you aren't limited to proprietary cables. The blue/red blinking LED's require the manual to interpret for pairing, switching sources, switching destinations, etc. but that's OK.

I purchased 2 TaoTronics units. I set one up as a transmitter and the other as a receiver.  It enables me to upgrade all my non- Bluetooth equipment to fully functional Bluetooth.  Saved a fortune by not needed to upgrade my older electronics.

I absolutely LOVE THIS! I can plug this into my Roku remote, then connect bluetooth headphone and do my morning workouts with the sound as loud as I want! Super easy to pair to bluetooth. Battery lasts quite a while too. We can also use this for literally anything with an headphone jack that isn't already bluetooth. Great product!!
Paired wit Bose wireless headphone. Perfect

One device for both transmitting and receiving Bluetooth devices.  Range was very good with very little latency.  Devices connected quickly.  All in all a perfect device to make non Bluetooth devices accessible.  Nice compact design with long charge .
Does not work for cell phone
Works great streaming YouTube and TV to my BT headphones in the Gym.  Battery lasts a long time between charges.
Product did not work well but was contacted by customer service and they offered help on the issue.Product works well .

Really neat feature of being able to send and receive as needed.  Setup was quick and easy.  Setting up two headsets went fine.  We are planning on watching some movies next time we fly.  For an even better experience make sure you get low latency headsets also.
Picked this up for $20 and worth every penny. I use it nearly daily with my iPod Classic. Works well with Bluetooth headphones as well as speakers. Easy to sync up. Would recommend.
Sometimes it disconnects without warning. It usually reconnects in a moment or two but it still is disconcerting. I have it hooked to my projector so I can have a wireless set up for sound
Audio gradually cuts in and out during quieter parts of songs and movies. Perhaps I got a bad unit... disappointed .
Easily connects with my Bluetooth headphones and does not cut out when I move to another room.  Great price for a small transmitter.

Purchased in order to be able to listen to TV audio from the elliptical machine at the gym.  Paired easily with my Amazon Echo Buds.  Sound is great, no cutouts.  VERY compact and lightweight so just hangs from the audio jack without getting in the way or stressing its own connectors.  I would recommend!
I really liked this one. I use it to connect my cell to my motorcycle auxiliary to play music. Works very good.
I purchased this so I could watch tv , my movies while my wife is sleeping.  It works just as they said it would.. I tell anyone to purchase it.

The only feature I do not like is having to pair it every time I use it. I do like the small size, though and the ease of connecting it to my TV.I do get an annoying buzzing sound when I plug in my usb to try to get longer power-life which my wireless over-the-ear headphones (about 8+ hours) have. But, I have an older flatscreen, so it could be the problem.

It's a good little device. I used it for my classic i-pod (so it gets moved around frequently). However, after a little over a year it is no longer working properly (not sure if it won't hold a charge or it is some other mechanical issue). You also have to pair it every single time you use it. Overall, not a bad device just sad that I need a new one.

This bluetooth transmitter/receiver works far superior to any others I have tried. The connection stays strong no matter where I am in the room, and skipping tracks does not produce any sort of 'click' sound as other receivers do. Thank you for an excellent product!
Awesome device , I am using with my laptop . Works great , set up was easy and the sound quality is great ! Great product
This works well once you figure out how to connect to to your TV.  If you have a Cable box you will hook this to it and not the actual TV
What a piece of "  " I've been more frustrated trying to connect or find pairing with the device VS any other ... wish I could return!

It works very well, although at times when my phone is in my pocket and I bend down, I briefly loose connection.  Would have been nice to have a clip on it.  Battery life is 9 hours of continuous music listening.

I had purchased other Bluetooth dngonles and had a terrible time pairing them with my Bose Bluetooth headphones, but this device took mere seconds to pair up. The instructions were clear, easy and comprehensive.
Got this to hook up bluetooth headphones and watch movies at night without disturbing wife.  Works great! I left it on for 48 hrs straight,  by accident,  and still watched a movie before charging.
I bought the window projector for holidays and I needed to transmit the sounds so I bought this. It has worked great!
Excellent product.I tried cheaper transmitters.

Was really hoping this is what we needed to hook up my husbands wireless headphones to our mom Bluetooth tv. It was! Now my husband can hear the tv and we don't have to have the volume up all the way on our tv!

The transmitter doesn’t sinc with my solo beats blue tooth head phones.  But it does with my wireless speakers. You might want to check with manufacturer before purchase to see if your devices are compatible.
If keeps cutting out when the sound is low so conversations end up being choppy. Voices sound a little bit robotic.

I needed to have a transmitter that would connect to my Bluetooth Headphones.  This small TaoTronics Bluetooth Transmitter works great and the range is at least 30 feet.  The signal is clear and setup was a snap - just plug it in to the correct audio jacks.  Glad I purchased this unit.
I am hard of hearing.  Keeps peace in the family. 2. I turn off the sound on my tv and use this with Bluetooth ear phones at any hour.  I can now ignore those around me talking!Finished

I like this because I am not tech savvy and this was a cinch to set up.  It took me a while and I thought I'd hit a dead end when I realized my bluetooth Apple wireless ear buds were really designed to pair with all Apple products.  But I even figured out how to do that!  40 minutes later than unpacking, and it's up and functional.  I really like how there's only one component and 3 hook-up points on the back of the TV.
Can't believe it took me this long to do a review of something I love. It works. I connect it to my TV, laptop,Roku remote and pair it with my Bluetooth headphones.
Easy hook up to TV. Zero lag time in sound transmit to my headset (Zvoc). Quick pairing. Love the product.
Very slick little device. Works really well with my android phone and tablet. I have used it to connect with two different speaker systems. No issues with set up or use.
I've had this transmitter for a few months now and still love it. I haven't had any problems with it at all.
Good product and works once I figured out how to use it. Very poor instructions. Almost sent it back on the account of not having through instructions on how to set it up.

I bought this transmitter/receiver to allow for Bluetooth headphones to connect to On-Board Entertainment on flights. So far I have flown 4 times and used this transmitter and it worked perfectly. I even plug the USB cable into the entertainment screen and it charges at the same time. Very happy with this purchase

It was good while it lasted. Used once a week for the last 18 months. Tonight they would no longer sink to my headphones. Headphones would sync to phone with no issues. Transmitter is charged and shows the lights but is not transmitting sound any longer.

I've tried a handful of headphone jack Bluetooth transmitters recently, and this one is the best so far. It's easy to set up and use. The sound quality is nice. It's also the smallest I've seen. Overall good product.
This thing works great!!  Definitely worth getting if you are wanting to add Bluetooth connectivity to your devices.
I used this with an agptek media player and a bluetooth speaker. seems to work ok so far. hdmi works ok too.

I purchased several of these to put on a small TVs in bedrooms so that my family can watch TV at night without disturbing the house. It works really well and I have had no problems with it. Range on it is great as I can get up and walk around the room with no issue. I highly recommend.

Seemless right out of the box. Ran from the output on an echo dot gen 3 and connected to two pair of Sound Appeal Bluetooth speakers (SA-BLAST6-B), so 4 speakers in total. Connected without even so much as a hiccup.

Ot of the package, it was never able to connect to my vehicle, my wireless headset or my phone. I called the manufacturer for help and we ran some trouble shooting problems and decided the unit was malfunctioning and transfered me to Amazon to get a refund.I will buy it again and hope it works.

Very good product, it delivers on its promise, materials feel very strong yet light weight and the most important thing, connectivity is very easy and smooth alsa rage is actually bigger that what it says on the specs
I use it with headphones, and the only negative is that it needs recharging more often than the headphones.
I used this to listen to my tv with Bluetooth headphones. My only negative was a slight time delay from the actual broadcast.
I bought this so that I could connect my my phone to my car since it does not have bluetooth capabilities. It connects easily, works and sounds great for that so I would recommend!

I use this to connect my ipod classic to my headphones, also use it to connect my oculus go vr headset to my bluetooth headphones, I have used it for about 9 month and it works great on both and I am going to buy another one for a spare
This device works great. There is no noticeable delay between video and audio when using this transmitter. It’s simple to use and functions how it’s supposed to for a very reasonable price.

I've very pleased with this device.  It is easy to use and effective.  The range is quite good.  The battery life is not as high as I would have hoped, but I'm using it in an application where it can remain plugged in permanently so that is not a concern.

My son's HP laptop we bought a year ago had specs that indicated there was bluetooth - but it never worked.  This was a good solution to resolve the issue.  Now he can listen to bluetooth from his laptop and not have to have a physical wire connected to his headphones!  Thank you!
Sound is a little quiet,  but my wife doesn't get woken up at 11pm by a screaming woman on starkey and hutch. Happy wife, happy life.

I've only gotten this thing to pair with about half the Bluetooth devices I've tried. Unfortunately, the one specific device for which I bought this thing was not one of the ones I was able to pair it with.

Got this so my husband and I could listen to same audio tours on our trip to Europe. We used cord splitter last time but it was challenging having to stay close together as to not pull cords out. This blu tooth splitter is perfect! Had a little trouble syncing using instruction Manuel but watched video and followed exactly and it worked!

Had a problem with the first unit and returned it...kind of disappointing.  Then, to my surprise, TaoTronics contacted me and made everything right.  The replacement unit paired on first try and works great.  Super customer support people.
I gave this away because I couldn’t get it to pair with my Beats. Do recommend however if you have an updated tv.
I use it for TV listening with ear phones. Easy to set up and program. You can leave it plugged in all the time using the USB cable. The 33' distance is accurate.

Plug it in and turn it on. It connects to the first headphones. Two quick clicks and it then connects to the second set of head phones. It has good fidelity and no problems. We've been using it to look at NYPD episodes in bed.
Like the Bluetooth 5.0 features. Paired with iPhone easily. Sound clarity was great.
I like this product very much.  I use it for listening to an old Ipod that does not have blue tooth connectivity.  It connects to my blue tooth ear buds seamlessly.  A great product for me.
Great product that converts a device to Bluetooth.  I’ve used it on several older devices in my home and it has worked on everything.  Great buy!

Once I learned how to reboot my headphones the process was simple.  Couldn’t make phones work with TV so I tried the Red/White connections on the DVR.  Presto.  Only drawback is it doesn’t work with programs coming through the web (Amazon Prime). This is a problem with the TV and not the transmitter.
A bit of challenge to hook up to my skullcandy headphone but all in all it works in my Emerson television.

This thing is awesome. Make sure your TV has a headphone or RCA jack first though. Mine didn't and I had the buy a converter box to make the Digital Audio from the TV work Not this products fault though and I was still able to make it work.

Overall works good.  Transmitting to two Headphones from portable radio.  Periodically one of the headphones will drop but you only need to restart the headphone and it reconnects.  Will last over 4 hours.
This is exactly what I needed to link my headphones to the tv while running on the treadmill. Connects easily and works well.

I love this.  Easy to pair and great sound quality.  Helps your partner sleep when you want to still watch tv!  Had those wireless headphones before and never liked the quality.  Now I can use Bluetooth earbuds to quickly connect and enjoy.

I bought 2 of this devices, put one in RX and one in TX mode and pair them up. I am playing my string instrument on the TX end and on RX I noticed high latency, which is like a bad echo.Very disappointed as I bought this device primary for the "low latency" feature as it advertises. I was planning to use this device to connect my mixer and a PA speaker for live outdoor performance and this kind of echo would sound very weird and ruin the show.
We bought this for use with an electric piano and wireless headphones. Although this advertises low lag, that turns out to not be the same as no lag, so we ended up returning it.
My onboard Bluetooth fried out and this is the perfect solution, transmits and receives. Great sound good range.

Absolutely love this one. I travel a lot for work.On the plane I can watch movies using TaoTronics in transmitter mode to my bluetooth headset, so no wires between me and the seat in front (everyone sitting next to me asks what that thing is).

I always go to bed with the TV on and my husband hates it. We got this so I could still watch TV and not disturb him. Little complicated to set up but once we got it, it was just what we were looking for.
Bought this based upon a newsletter recommendation and very satisfied. Easy to connect in my vehicle. Good sound quality. Nice and small so it fits in my center console of an older SUV.

I love this product! I bought it for my plane ride to Thailand and it was the best thing ever! I got to use my AirPod pros to watch movies on the plane. It was easy to setup and use too! I highly recommend it :)

Connecting to my phone was a snap, great volume and clarity.  Using an adapter I've got this plugged into a  PA amp and am using it to stream a series of commands to the group activity.  No idea what maximum range is but I know I've been up to 60 feet away from the amp with no problem.  I'd buy another.J

This little gizmo performs like a boss during my Super Bowl party.  I connected two KOOS bluetooth speakers to my projector and the setup was amazingly easy.  You usually get glitches in sound, or momentary loss signal on this items, but not with this transmitter.  I plan to use the receiver on my old Jeep Cherokee see if I can enjoy some music while four wheeling.  I will let you know.
