I purchased this to use for traveling with my wife so we can both use our galaxy buds and watch the same movie on our galaxy book2 it worked flawlessly and sound quality and volume were good even on a plane watching a movie that had very quiet parts. There was no lag on either headsets and was on cue with the movie. Definitely would recommend if trying to use 2 different witeless bluetooth ear buds or headsets on the same device!

Works well with 1 pair of headphones but not with 2. if by miracle you get the sound to work on both it will stop 20 seconds later. Both devices are correctly paired and connected but one has blank audio. Shame.
Loved the product! Bought 1 for my Wife too! It’s really nice to be able to use ur own Bluetooth device on d plane.

I like that it can easily make my devices with no bluetooth ability whatsoever to be able to emit sound over bluetooth to my headphones. It took quite some time for me to get my bluetooth headphones to connect to the device, but it works great as soon as you can get it connected.

I bought this hoping to solve Bluetooth audio delay or lag,  but it got even worse.  I am using LG oled c8 and Sony wh-1000xm3 if this is helpful to anyone.  The delay was worse than the native built in bluetooth connection
Piece of poo. Impossible to pair to iPhone. Had it paired, initially....only to board plane and have NO CONNECTION!! Has never connected to phone or Bose headphones, since. Don’t buy!!
I'm using this as a transmitter from my TV headphone output to a new Bluetooth headphone. It works great and I'm very happy with it.
It was easy to set up however, I wish the battery life could last longer.*************

This worked really well.  Aside from the pairing its plug and play.  I used it with the same set of headphones on my TVs and my work computer without problem.  Sadly I have misplaced the thing so I have to buy another one.
Works better than I expected it to! I use it on my motorcycle and it works like a champ. Easy to use. Easy to set up. Easy to charge.
My Windows 10 laptop downloaded the transmitter through the system.  Excellent music quality using I Tunes Library.  Needs un -interrupted  air flow.  About 50 feet of distance.
This unit would check all the boxes IF it had a longer cord. My TV plug is in a not so great location.
Just what I was looking for. The ability to transmit or receive makes it great. Worth the price.
No setup needed. Plug it in and it works. I have excellent audio when I am 12-15 feet from the TV and that's as far away as I ever need to go.

I used this to connect a portable speaker for the tv. It connected easily for the first month then it stopped connecting to the speaker. I use this transmitter on my iPod.  It links automatically and the battery lasts a long time.  Also, the transmission distance is very good.  I'm happy with my purchase.
This thing is tiny. Like so tiny we thought we ordered the wrong thing. But it works great. Bought to be able to make the computer or TV Bluetooth & it does the job.
Found it Easy to pair and worked as expected but only used it for  a single device. Never tried it with two.
Had it up and running in 5 minuets.  Increased the range my headphones could pick up volume from my computer.

I use this to listen to the tv on headphones while I use the elliptical.It has a constant high pitched static that gets higher the higher the pitch of the sound, but is there when there’s no sound at all. The static also gets higher and lower with the noise of the elliptical or what ever else is In The room.
100% for what it does do, but note it will not work on a phone call, even if your headset has a mic. Great, very high quality for simply listening! With that as a note, I would highly recommend.
I'm going to use it for the TV with bluetooth headpgones.  I'm hard of hearing.  So, this is the real deal for me.  Thanks!!!!

I had to come back and give a positive review to this product. Not only do I love it, but it’s extremely durable!I left it in my gym shorts accidentally through a wash and dry cycle and just plugged it in for a charge and it still works perfectly! Absolutely impressed with the durability and overall quality. Easy pairing with AirPods as well.
Worked right out of the box. I use it on my guitar amp. Play songs off my phone to play along with my guitar. No cord, more fun.

It makes listening to my Zune MP3 player so much more convenient and now I can tie it in to my cars sound system. I wish it might have come with more instructions as I wasn't sure how to get it to work.  Yes, I definitely would recommend this product.

Smaller than I expected. Reminded me of how into making things *mimiature* the world was at the end of the last century. I'm never gonna love this little guy like i loved my walkman, but it does remind me of that lineage. Japan's still a little ahead in the race to shrink stuff for no particular reason.  Honestly that's kind of nice. The little things for the win in 2020.

This product offered very easy connectivity, excellent sound quality, and uninterrupted streaming. It's made my non-bluetooth speakers usable again. I recommend this item as an excellent solution for your non-bluetooth devices.
It paired easily to my outdoor speakers. Works well with my outdoor projector for move nights in the back yard.

With some headphones works fantastic, with some I've had to re-establish the connection (not sure if it's the headphone's fault or device's).  Nice to be able to both transmit and receive, didn't expect to use that and found it easy and helpful.
Automatically connects and overrides all other devices. Note- if using Netflix, turn off or Netflix won't connect.
Makes any device work with wireless speakers or headphones. I definitely recommend this 🙂

I use them for a bluetooth headphone set for a television across the room. The clarity and volume are great. Contributes to my pleasure in improving my listening comprehension and helps others by keeping the volume from being distracting and annoying.
Easy to use and works great in the audio jack of my stereo to stream Spotify from my phone.

When I received this item I followed the directions and none of the lights came on. I left it on the charger for 24 hrs and still didn’t work so I have to return it which sucks because I really was looking forward to using this. Buy at your own risk.
Does what it's suppose to
It was easy to connect. I used it to listening movies or games while my wife was sleeping.
This does not work for both music and phone calls as stated.

I wanted to be able to hook my iPod to my Bluetooth helmet device in order to listen to music while I ride. I've only use the device a couple of times so far, but it appears to perform as advertised. The instructions are clear, the item is well packaged and it connects easily to my device.

We travel a lot and were looking for a device that allowed 2 of us to share one audio signal without wires. This product has exceeded all expectations. The battery life is great and the device so small and light that it doesn't get in the way. This has made travel so much easier, we don't have to worry about the hassles of cables anymore. We would definitely recommend the product.

I use this to transmit audio on a daily basis while I am working, as I wear Bluetooth earbuds alot. I also enjoyed having the ability to transmit to 2 pairs of ordinary Bluetooth headphones simultaneously.

I tried with 3 different Bluetooth earbuds and 1 Bluetooth headset. Nothing would connect to this transmitter.

Nice product so far. Make sure to read instructions carefully and follow the proper pairing procedures for receiving or transmitting. It doesn’t really tell you that because it is different for a lot of tvs. You may have to play around with output settings on your tv.

This has been a lifesaver for me! We used to use a very long aux cord to connect our projector to the sound bar. This has given us the ability to be cord free! Sound is amazing and it works perfectly. 2 thumbs up!
Bought this so we could use wireless headphones with our television in our bedroom.  Works great and lets my wife sleep while I re-watch the Sopranos.  What could be better than that?Would buy again.

I've been using this transmitter for a couple of months now, and it's been working great, i have it connected to my computer speakers and the sound is pretty pretty good. I'm thinking on buying one more and one as a gift for my friend who's a music lover

Started transmitting an awful feedback noise after about 90 days and now no longer works. Garbage.

Works great as a receiver if you want to make something a bluetooth speaker. Even comes with a short 3.5mm jack and a 3.5mm to AV adapter which was nice.I tried two units. Flat out does not work as a transmitter, just stays in pairing mode and doesn't connect to anything. It's not discoverable. Tried connecting it to 4 different devices and nothing worked.
Works fine for me. Easy to install - connects with bluetooth headphone easily.  Little sound delay ( 0.5 seconds).
Used this device to add BT to an old computer to connect to Bose Headphones.  Worked great and was easily installed.
We love this! It was very easy to use and we were able to connect our bluetooth speaker to our projector with no issues.
Great little unit pairs flawlessly with my Samsung tv. Easy to use a very light weight.
Have used the product for well over a year now and never had any issues. Sounds great and works great. Will def purchase again

This transmitter works well. I got it to connect a TV to my hot tub. The hot does not have an interface screen to help with pairing, so I was not sure if this would work. I have used it many times now and it has worked fine every time. All I have done is turn on the transmitter and it automatically connects to my hot tub sound system.
easy to follow instructions. Simple to set up. Reliable blue tooth connections.  Good value for the price..

I needed a Bluetooth receiver that would allow me to plug in my analog headphones and listen to the audio output from my TV.I made sure it was set to receiver mode, plugged it into my headphones, and paired it with my TV. Sound came right through. Up and running in less than five minutes and I've had no issues with it thus far. Very pleased.

I have been looking to use by wireless headphones for watching in-flight movies. The choice was limited and most of them were expensive. This TaoTronics Bluetooth transmitter is extremely affordable and worked in my first attempt. The battery last long, easy to operate, and sound quality is good. I have not used it as receiver yet but I am very happy with it for my use in the flights.
A little clunky to set up with nose speakers and computer , but once I figured it out, quite useful.

This is a nifty little Bluetooth transmitter receiver. It’s pretty easy to connect as good distance and it has all the connections you need to connect to RCA 3.5 I’ve been turn my friends onto it and they bought one I would recommend.

It worked great right out of the box allowing me to easily use my brand new PowerBeats Pro earbuds with my "classic" 2010 Pioneer Elite 65" LCD TV.But then I had to reset my PowerBeats and couldn't reconnect.  I called and emailed tech support simultaneously, expecting to wait and not getting my hopes up.  Instead, both responded immediately with expert support allowing me to easily reconnect.

I received a personal email from Jessica in the Taotronics Customer Service Team and must share that she was very generous in reaching out to help me get a device that would meet my needs. Though it had been a little while, her efforts are tremendous and greatly appreciated. I still recommend the device for easy blue tooth connectivity for how small and compact it is and its flexibility to work as a transmitter and receiver.  A great product from a very customer service oriented company. Thank you Taotronics for your help.My initial review: Plays music well. Does not connect phone calls from phone.  It did for the first two days and stopped.

I bought this so my wife could use Bluetooth headphones when listening to TV.  Easy to setup and leave it powered 24/7 connected to TV.  She just turns on headphones and within 10 seconds it connects flawlessly.

I bought two of them because they had great reviews ! After about four months both of them quit pair I thought it had to be my head phone. I bought new blue tooth head phones they still wouldn’t pair . So I hooked and old $15 Mpow transmitter and it works great ! I’ve tried everything I can think of with no success! I watched You tube videos and nothing works . Tried to return them but four months is beyond the return time . (DON’T BUY these)

Great rx/tx device. I had it hooked up to my surround sound system in my living room for a bit to try it out and it worked perfectly throughout the house for my computer or phone. I was transmitting from my computer and receiving from my phone. I'm currently using it in my car and it's perfect for that.
I bought this to connect my bluetooth headphones to my Tv. It doesn’t work. Total waste of money

This little item was plug and play. I didn't rate volume control-it has no volume control. It does transmit a bluetooth signal very well. I haven't tested distance limits, but it's working very well over the 75 feet I use it for. Looking forward to working it out over the coming months
I bought this to use on a Windows 10 system that has a poor internal bluetooth connection. Plugged it into the headphone jack and now I have great sound to my bluetooth earbuds.
Works with my ipod and audio readers I get from the library.  Works perfectly for what I needed!
Used to make my pocket scanner a blue tooth device and send to my portable JBL Clip3.  Works easy and perfect!

I purchased two of these devices in an attempt to create a wireless audio solution. Unfortunately, the volume was incredibly too loud (I had to purchase a separate inline volume control) and the sound quality was very noticeably poor compared to a wire.I was willing to mark this as a failed experiment in bluetooth. However, the company that sells these has e-mailed me since asking for a positive review in exchange for free merchandise. I would be extremely skeptical of reviews for this seller's product.
The sound is great.  A bit of a learning curve when hooking up but just have to remember to turn Bluetooth off on the phones.

I liked the size and easy connection. I like how it seems to connect to almost every Bluetooth device I’ve tried. I like how it remembers the devices for fairly quick re-connection. The price was very fair for this product. I’m enjoying it every night and my wife loves the silence in the room because of it! Thanks!
This was my first time using one of these. It has worked flawless so far. I am happy.
Solved our connectivity problem in a non smart tv!  Awesome!  Easy to use, no issues!

I used the device on my TV to send audio to wireless headphones. I have used it 6 months and it worked perfectly until today. The blue light shows for a few seconds, then turn red (sometimes it alternates between red and blue) but it then just turns off.  No blue light flashing on or off, no steady blue light. Just stopped performing. I rate it highly until today.
Just like the title says. These are just what I needed. they are the best ones out on the market right now!
Perfect little Bluetooth transmitter! :)Super easy to use, and once paired, it just connects automatically.
This device never worked correctly. I paired it with multiple devices in transmit and receive mode both. Even though pairing was fairly simple. You never get any audio at all.
This works great with my headphone amp and headphones. Sound quality is exceptional.
as a new comer to blue tooth devices I was amazed how simple it is to use and the quality of it.I'm sure that I'll use it  to watch movies and to enjoy privacy on the you tube audio

Product works as described. I got this for my dad because someone advised him to get a Taotronics Receiver, but he needed the transmitter.Set up was easy as was pairing with his Taotronics Bluetooth headphones.
Performs as expected 5 stars ⭐️The product package was received opened and without instructions. YouTube came through with set up help.
Appears to be good quality.  Easy to connect with car stereo.  Very low transmitting volume, using an IPod to the car stereo.  Frustrating.  Had to return it.

I'm hearing impaired and wanted to get clearer sound out of my television viewing. Couldn't get the device to pair at first. Discovered that my headphones were automatically connecting to my cell phone Bluetooth device. Once I turned off the Bluetooth connection on my phone, the connection was made immediately to the device.  The device has paired quickly on subsequent occasions.

It works great, I couldn't notice any latency. Easy to setup and pair to my Q35 bose and TV. However, They say the product can be used while charging, but in doing so you’ll hear a white noise that was very disturbing to me. I reached out to them and they recommended NOT to use it while charging!
If you have great headphones and your TV is not Bluetooth, buy this one. It's great
Stopped working and now is just trash. Who can return my money??

This is exactly what I needed for the new generation of cell phones that are getting rid of the 3.5mm audio jack to make room for bigger batteries. I cannot attest for the longevity of it as I just found it again and have only just began using it, but I will adjust the rating as needed. Great problem solver as I only have really one Bluetooth headset, but now I have almost a dozen at hand. Kudos
Excellent,no extra equipment required for my purposes. Great little gadget! Thanks
Every time I want to use these to listen to my TV with headphones, it takes 5 minutes of trying over and over to get this to pair.
So far no delay like my previous Tao Tronics. Previous unit last two years. So far range is great. I go up stairs . No connection issue
I like how tiny it is, does the job, easily connect to my headphones or speakers.
Holds a long charge and turned my old sound system into a modern music box and I can keep my phone on me.
Worked great in my SUV to connect my kids Bluetooth headphones to the DVD player.

The device was delivered promptly and it worked right out of the box. I use Bluetooth streaming to assist my hearing aids, due to deep hearing loss. I am able to stream audio from my TV, Kindle tablet and Chromebook. With the 1 year warranty,  buying this is a no-brainer.

Very disappointed as it cannot connect to the second bluetooth headphone. Once it is connected, the first one is disconnected! (I followed the instructions carefully.)Also it is ridiculous that you have to disconnect the 1st paired headphone in order to connect the 2nd one.
This thing works great. It's so small it easy to hide behind the TV. There is a small delay which is expected.
Item works, but requires pairing with each use.  Does not automatically re-connect.  Also, when used with a TV, the audio and video does not sync properly.  There is an extreme lag in the audio.

I wanted a Bluetooth device for my TV. I usually watch TV after my wife goes to sleep. I wanted to watch programs without disturbing her. This product is great. It connects any flatscreen TV to any Bluetooth earphone set.
This thing works amazing. I bought it for the airplane and it worked so great. Easy set up and the charge lasts forever. Great product.

I was very impressed with the quality of this device and it is nice and compact for easy use. The setup process is easy and it streams music from my Vinyl Record Player Serial Jack to my Sound bar very nicely!

Great product.  Works exactly as described!  However, when I plug transmitter into TV speaker port (3.5 mm port) volume control is bypassed and you are stuck with the volume level TV gives you...can’t increase or decrease it.  I am certain this is a function of the TV (it is a Vizio) and has nothing to do with transmitter but for me it renders the volume too low.

I mostly use this little transmitter for my TV, and it works great for me. The sound quality is good and there is no delay in transmission. Bluetooth range is very good using it with TaoTronics TT-BH16 headset. I bought it in Feb 2017 and it is still working without any issues.
No lag noticed. Love it!
Solid little transmitter, little bit of latency, but that’s the same with all of them like this, two headphones works well,

I purchased this transmitter and a set of Bluetooth earbuds.  I was hoping to end complaints from my wife of the tv being too loud during my late night watching.  It worked well for the first 2 weeks.  After that the earbuds could not detect the transmitter.  The earbuds are connecting with my phone and laptop.  I’m currently looking for a better quality transmitter.
Oh I wish I could give this thing 5 stars... Unfortunately... It keeps having a break in the audio every 1-2 minutesEverything else is perfect but I am going to have to return and try another brand
Unit would not pair with my speaker no matter what I did - everything else pairs with it easily - Returned unit!
It was easy to set up and use.  I use it with my TV and PS4 so I dont disturb my wife at night when I am gaming or watching scary/violent shows.

Had a noticeable signal delay when connected to TV.  Everything worked well with the exception of a noticeable delay.  I was using Avantree low Latency ear buds that work great in our trailer with the Avantree transmitter.  I installed the transmitter from the trailer to house TV and it worked great.
This thing is amazing!!!  Great for two sets of blue tooth headphones to watch movies on a plane!!

This product does exactly what I needed it to. I can watch TV with bluetooth headphones while my wife is sleeping and not disturb her. The charge lasts surprisingly long, but the only downside is that it is not positioned well to work with different inputs. Either it connects to the TV or the cable box, not both. I have only ever gotten it to work with the cable box directly.
Wow this is so easy to use. I use it on my tv and i plugged it in turned it on and paired to my earbods with ease. Im considering buying another one

I wanted to Connect my Echo Dot to a set of inexpensive PC speakers across the room via Bluetooth. Worked flawlessly. I haven't used it in "Transmit" mode, but I have no doubt it will perform equally well.

I loved this thing. I used it with headphones that also supported low-latency for watching TV. It was great until for no apparent reason it would no longer connect to anything and could only be seen by other devices when in RX mode, which is not helpful. Maybe it was a fluke but it was my experience.
this is the second one i ordered. I liked the way it worked so much i ordered one for work. great product.
The devices worked great initially. Now, the device fails to pair with anything. It’s become a hunk of useless plastic in less than 8 months.Hard to recommend.
Does exactly what is supposed to do. I love the fact that it connects to 2 headsets!

It just works.  I had their old model before and stopped working a couple month ago.  I had a hard time connecting it at first for the first oneI but this one is a different story, it connects easily and doesn’t disconnect overtime.  Hopefully it last
Works great and as advertised. No lip sync delay like other products I've tried. Great for the price.

Great product! After 18 years, I now have bluetooth for my factory original Bose stereo in my 2003 Nissan Pathfinder. No costly radio upgrades. No costly AUX conversion kits. I just plugged the cassette adapter 3.5mm connection in the TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter and Receiver. Very impressed and so fortunate to have found this device.
I like this transmitter because it always connects.I use it every morning from about 4 am to 7 am so I don't disturbmy wife while she sleeps and I watch  TV.
The device turns itself off and requires physically going to it and powering it on and re-pairing it.  Other than that it worked well.
Works great with AirPod Pro and airline entertainment system which is why I purchased this.  No lag.  Small and easy to use.
Have used daily for months and never had an issue. Pairing was easy as well.
It's pretty pants on head easy to use. Hold the button, pair, done. The entire thing feels really solid and I loved the packaging.
Some times when I would switch speakers it would not connect. Reception is not always good at a distance between walls at 25-30 feet.

I received the unit quickly and appears to be just what I need, but I haven't yet been able to put it through its paces.  I was hoping it would pair with my hearing aids, but it turns out they currently only pair with Apple devices.  The limitation is on the hearing aids, not the Taotronics unit.  I'll update my review once I get it paired with a bluetooth speaker.
Hooked it up to our Samsung LED TV, now I can listen to my favorite sports, news or whatever through the Bluetooth speaker!  Much less expensive than buying a newer TV with BT capabilities.
No problem connecting this product to my Spectrum cable box and streaming via Bluetooth with my AirPod Pros.Very happy if they last.
Please see review on the blue tooth speaker I pair this with. Long story short, I love this.

Bought this item to use as a home stereo adapter for two systems simultaneously. That didn't work, as the fine print suggested it might not. However I found I could use this in my older car as a wireless connection and it works great.

I saw other reviews of people receiving nonworking item. Took a chance. Waste of time researching and purchasing.  Won't do that anymore. I did notice this was a 2015 product. 5 years is pretty old for technology.
Uses two of these units to connect turntable to stereo receiver, one as transmitter and one as signal receiver.Connected as expected works well.
The product was delivered in nice packaging.  It came with supplies to use the product in a few different ways.

I needed help with BT connection to Marantz home theater via add on BT adapter (from a different company). Support was excellent including follow up by TaoTronics to confirm connection success. The BT transmitted works perfectly with all other BT capable equipment.
Works well, and has food range. I like when your device needs to be charged and one wants it to be used with non-blue tooth
My brother uses this all the time in the car for about 12 hours of music. It's very handy and gives us Bluetooth in the car
Excellent device to connect those older non-Bluetooth devices, occasional lag/sync issues on video but excellent for music
Excellent product. Worked perfectly to connect my bluetooth headphones to my TV.
My husband uses this in his car everyday! We love it! Easy to find Bluetooth and very simple to set up.

Worked as advertised. Took a bit of experimenting to get it to connect to my Sony headphones and Apple AirPods.  Once paired, it worked fine.  Range is not great however.  I can walk around tv room, but don’t expect to walk too far...
Update.. I received a refund in the form of an Amazon credit which was easy to use.Original post: This worked great for 2-3 weeks, then it would not charge. I had to return it.

I use this to play music on my motorcycle and works great.  The only issue I have is if u want to charge it and use it at the same time it creates a static background noise that is very annoying.  Otherwise it works for what I need.
Compact. Good volume and sound quality. Took a couple tries to get it set up, but works fine.
There is a very noticeable lag between the original signal and the transmitted sound.I bought it to use with a guitar amp and the sound was about 2 notes behind what I was playing.
Did not work in Ford Sync (the reason I purchased it).  Wanted to use high-end Flac player (not so highend- no Bluetooth) in my Ford vehicles.  Would not connect. Support helped, refunded.
Connects instantly, has higher volume than others, very well made, small and elegant
Happy with this. Bought some other one from the best but vending machine and it does not have transit opntion... This unit is amazing
Solved all my problems.  Needed something to allow my tv to find my headphones for my workout.  I would recommend this product.
I like to watch tv as I go to sleep but my wife falls asleep way before me so I bought this to let me hear the TV without bothering her and it works great!

Terrible. Won’t charge. Have had it plugged in for three days and nothing. Very disappointed in this product. Charged it once back in January after unplugging and plugging back in six or seven times and worked great. Now, can’t get it to show it’s charging for more than 30 seconds at a time. Would love a refund but too late now. Should’ve opened it and tested before  giving as a gift.
connected with ease, works great. I used it on the plane with my bluetooth speakers, no wires between me and the console...heaven!

Great little device with easy pairing. Love the battery recharge capability. Would be good for audio bluetooth streaming only.I have a low latency bluetooth TV device, yet still see unacceptable lag between video and audio.  Was hoping for better performance.  Would not recommend for TV Bluetooth streaming.
Got this to pair my BT 5.0 earbuds to peloton bike as it would previously only pair one earbud and would not play both.  Worked like a charm!

I am surprised how easy this is and how interchangeable this piece of tech is. I love how my non Bluetooth laptop for work is Bluetooth now. My switch, Bluetooth. Anything with an audio port is Bluetooth. The price is right as well
I m really happy with this device because I can use my wireless headphones
Windows 10 PC could not detect it. Spent an hour trying to troubleshoot with no luck.
used for blue-tooth streaming of devices to TV- product works as it should!
Very easy to set up.  I have used several different headsets and with my phone and TV and it works great with all of them.
Works great with my vizio 49 inch. It’s easy to sync with my wireless headphones. My tv had the option to turn off its speakers so once I did that and only I could hear I was set.
Overall this product is good would recommend  for the Bluetooth for the TV
Works as described with iphon11pro, Pioneer VSX L503 AVR, Sennheiser and Dr Beats wireless headphones

My son bought this for me and I was HOOKED the first time I used it. It paired very quickly and easily. It carries virtually ANY type of sound cleanly and clearly no matter what volume level you choose to set it it at. I damaged the one my son gave me and I immediately bought a replacement device, if that tells you anything.... I depend on this decide and so far, it has yet to fail me.
Super handy device, receives and transmits, easy to use. Read the manual, good to go. Adds some great bluetooth functionality to your devices.
Annoying lag when connected to tv and headphones,Won't connect to SYNC 3 main reason I bought it.
Works like a Charm! Perfect! Seller was Amazing including after sale follow up! Thank you!

The product is amazing works miracle with the car. But I would still return this product it’s because my cars auxiliary slot is having very poor tolerance and creates disturbance.It’s my auxiliary slots fault and not due to this product.

Used it with my projector. Worked well for the first two months then refused to pair with my headphones. Headphones pair fine with my other devices and I've done as many troubleshooting steps as I could think of with no results. Disappointed this didn't last even a quarter of a year.
Turned my non-Bluetooth devices into a Bluetooth-enabled devices. Hooray!
Worked perfectly for connecting my projector to my Bluetooth sound bar.

The packaging is great for the product, and I appreciate the cable accessories included. It has great functionality for being so cheap and small. Everything seems to be just as promised in the product description, so I am excited about this little device!
I now can hear my patio tv from my hot tub thanks to two of these. No delay. Very happy!
This is exactly what I was needing to connect my old school ipod to my bluetooth speaker.
Developed a high pitch interference noise. Would transmit music and sound effects but not dialogue! Took a long time to pair with its own headphones! (Taotronics)

Great product! We needed this to adapt our stereo system in our pole barn for a graduation party that we were hosting. It was easy to connect and worked great. Everyone could easily connect when needed to play their chosen music.
This thing is tiny but works perfectly.  Use it all the time to listen to Spotify music though my home wired speakers.

Excellent device.  Worked perfectly on overseas flight. Tried it in multiple modes.  Only issue was slight inconsistency with re-connecting to headphones.  After fiddling, it always reconnected, though. All in all, having a separate volume control and being able to charge while listening is great.

Warning. This device is not a Bluetooth aptx low latency receiver. The description is misleading. I have an aptx low latency transmitter which indicates the mode of transmission. When this device is connected it does not indicate low latency.  I’m not sure if it can transmit aptx low latency codec as I didn’t test that.  If you plan on using this device as a receiver you will encounter laggy audio and unacceptable lip sync.  Bummed out.
Great little item, works as easily as it sounds. We paired this with a pair of Bose noise cancelling headphones for use while running the log splitter.
Used to connect my non- smart TV to my Alexa echo dot. Essentially a sound bar. Love it !

I was tired of being wired to the radio when I attend sporting events. I plug this into the headphone jack of my portable radio and pair with my bluetooth headphones and bingo! I leave the radio in my bag and listen to the game on wireless earbuds. Works exactly as I wanted. Charge easily lasts 5 hours--maybe longer; I don't know as it's never run out!
Excellent product. Wish a customer service telephone number was included however.
To sum it up read how to pair it first.Hold the button down until flashes then press twice once flashing

I wanted to play streemed music through my stero system but didnt want to purchase a new receiver. I ordered this device and it was easy to set up and works great for playing Amazon music, Pandora, etc through my stero system.
I love this Bluetooth transmitter.Easy to connect and the battery charge last a good 3 hr or more
Really happy to be able to listen to my I-pod music on wireless headphones. Easy to connect and works great!

This Bluetooth transmitter was surprisingly easy to use. I used it to connect my non Bluetooth projector to my Bluetooth Bose speaker, and all I did was turn on the Bluetooth to both devices and then put them next to each other and in seconds it was connected. Great sound quality and the battery life lasts for serval movies and more. Very pleased with this buy!
Out of sync with soeach
Needed a bluetooth option for a Nintendo Switch. Tried others and they failed. This worked perfectly the very first time. Excellent to pair Dolby Dimension Headset to the Switch.

I bought this to listen to my guitar thru Bluetooth headphones but it lags as when I pluck a string I dont hear it for a 1/2 second.  However I also plugged into my phone and it worked awesome just listening to music.  Triple A customer service!!!

This is the third one I have purchased for home and work.  We transmit sounds from our work desktop to a bluetooth speaker in our Nuclear Medicine room for our patients.  They love it.  This is a great product and the size is perfect for tucking it away.  I highly recommend it!!
Now, with bluetooth phones, I'm not tethered and can move around the room and still hear.
Connected easily via the instructions provided. Unit is small and packs/tucks away easily. Nice little gadget.
Cool little item, I use this to run my projector to a blue tooth speaker and use in my car. Works great for transmitting and receiving.
Great little Bluetooth transmitter, been using it for years now and extremely pleased
Bought this for my wife to listen to our new stereo.  Plugs into the headphone outlet on the stereo and pairs relatively easily with bluetooth headphones.  Excellent sound.

Battery life is very poor. Fully charged it lasts about three hours only. I solved the issue by connecting to an accessory battery power supply. Connectivity varies with battery power. You must follow the specified sequence to connect.

I bought this to use on a projector... it is NOT realistic for a mounted projector as you would need a ladder everytime you use it.  This device does not auto reconnect!!!  I can't not be "re pairing" ever time I want to use the projector.
This works great with my Beats headphones. I also love the receiver feature. This product turns my old car audio jack into a Bluetooth friendly speaker.

Using this to transmit audio from the U-verse set top box to the Bluetooth ear buds. TV volume can then be turned down or off completely if no one else is watching TV. Able to power this unit directly from the set top box USB port. Working perfectly for the 4 weeks or so we've had it.
Works Perfect !!! Easy to installHooked right up with Bluetooth

For years, I've been struggling with plugging and unplugging a 3.5mm jack that would invariably cause lots of loud static over my studio speakers. Super annoying. I've been shopping for some bluetooth solution for some time but they were all bulky. TaoTronics's Transmitter and Receiver is the perfect solution. Simply plug and play.
My wife wanted to be able to wear bluetooth headphones with our Samsung TV that doesn't have bluetooth so I got this and it works great.

I originally purchased the unit so I could use my airpods with my TV.  It worked but I could not control the volume which was an issue if I wanted to keep my hearing.  I realized that I could use the unit to convert the AUX cord that I installed in my car to bluetooth.  So happy now.
Easy to connect to bluetooth.  Can connect to two devices at the same time.

Very handy for receiving and transmitting especially with my new XS.  Pairing occurs rapidly, range and sound are good.  Haven’t yet tried comparing MP3’s vs lossless formats sound, but I’m not using anything Bluetooth for serious listening.
It works fantastic. I use it to connect multiple speaker for a surround sound effect.
This device works great! Battery life is about 8 hours. The company has great customer service and is very responsive.
This does exactly what I needed...to provide a Bluetooth transmitter to a non-Bluetooth device AND it works fantastically! For such a small device it works like a champ.
I absolutely love this Bluetooth transmitter by Taotronics. It's simple to use and it works great! I wish I had purchased this a long time ago to use with my PC and over-the-ear Bluetooth headphones.
Out-of-box and audio is lagging. Sound comes in a second after lips move in screen. Do not buy!
No brainer set up.  Works well in both modes.  Pairs easily.  Good battery life.  What more needs to be said.
Has been as described and easy to install. no lag in voice to picture.
Worked great for a month now it wont connect to my speakers at all. What a waste of money.
I love it! My husband works some nights and this allows me to watch TV with out keeping him awake!
I purchased a Taotronics bluetooth speaker as well as a Taotronics transmitter; you would think they would remain paired, but I have to sync them every time I turn on my TV.Very disappointed.

The unit is fantastic and works great. I did have to buy another cable so I bought two as the original cable got the end broken off at one of the stereo joints on the plug. I use it for interim music when I take a break from playing in a band. It is great and works great. Volume is not a problem, maybe too much volume if you’re not careful!

Nice little Bluetooth trans/rec! I can now play my music library right off my PC! I have a great music player app with equalizer and a lot of sound settings which allows for fantastic sound via Bluetooth. Allows me to play 96/24 flac and high res wav files. Spotify off my phone not as good, mp3 and no settings. Excellent quality and functionality for the price! Makes great old stereo system relevant again!
Are your teeth blue?  Then this is the way to both transmit and receive without wires!
It’s simple and easy to use.  We connect the tv to two different headset at the same time and it works great
Best idea for old iPods and new bluetooth headphones..works perfect
Hooked up quickly to TV and earbuds paired easily. Now able to hear TV over the sounds of rambunctious children.
This is a really good little Bluetooth adapter. It pairs easily, has good transmit range, good sound and signal quaity and is reliable.
Great item, for connecting to my sound system back at home. Easy set up and paired quick.

I bought two of these so I could keep my turntable (with line-level outputs) in the living room, and move the rest of the stereo gear to the laundry room. It sounds fantastic. You just pair them together.I also pair my phone and iMac with it for Spotify.
Active and fully functional while charging so you can always leave it 'plugged in'.  Good instructions and large, easy to use controls and LED indicator.

I thought this product was absolutely great. My television factory speakers were poor sounding, so with other bluetooth speakers, I used this TaoTronics Product to create surround sound with my tv audio by linking two speakers. Affordable and easy way to create surround sound audio!

Received and connected to Sharp LC-58Q7370U RokuTV, connected to a HarmonKardon and JBL speaker and both have a minimum 1s lag. Amazon support had generic responses and no resolutionUpdate: Seller sent an updated device that no longer lags with the above devices.

The TaoTronics functions are inferior to others. It does not charge while connected so it must be charged separately. I switched to Avantree Audikast BTTC-418. It works well with my Bose wireless headset. It has a separate USB cord so it is always charging while being used.
This is a great device to add Bluetooth functionality to any device with an auxiliary input. The rechargeable battery allows it to be used in outdoor settings.

I got this one mostly due to the long battery life. I don't need the transmit feature, but the sound quality and battery are more than worth the price. Also has pretty good range. I have already recommended this to others.
It was nice and easy to connect. This a way to retrofit some of my older systems. It really opens up a lot of possibilities. I'm very happy with it.

I had bought this product for my Nintendo switch to allow Bluetooth audio and it works perfectly! I was also able to use this product to transform my headphones from wired to almost wireless. On the aux provided, the covering between the wire and the actual aux was a little bit thick for the headphone aux slot but other than that everything was amazing. Definitely recommend!

Nearly impossible to get this piece o crap to connect to any of my devices. Don't do it.Nevermind my bad review: I realized after this dissing that it wasn't connecting only because I needed to recharge it.

The overview claims "ALWAYS ON: TaoTronics Bluetooth 2-in-1 Adapter continuously streams even while charging. Built-in battery for up to 10 hours use - enjoy your favorite wireless content all the time."  It does not last 10 hrs.  It only lasts 8.5 hrs. Just as bad as most bluetooth ear buds,  but with more inconvience.

Very small but dynamite sound quality reproduction. Delivery instructions were easily followed and worked the first time without any difficulty. Delivery was fast. Seems to be a great high quality product provided by a company with integrity. I recommend both the company and this product.
this product works very well. I use it on my Roku tv, love it.
It works fine as a bluetooth transmitter, I haven't had any troubleI have only used it plugged into the TV connected to a bluetooth headset and it works fine

This product works as advertised - made a non-bluetooth television "blutetooth" capable.  My only criticism is you have to re-synch your device each time, but that is very minor, takes maybe 20 seconds.  Would recommend, would buy again if I needed to have bluetooth functionality on a non-bluetooth device.

This little thing is amazing! Plugged it into the headphone jack on my stereo amp and everything in goes out to my bluetooth headphones. I can walk over 50 ft to the family room paired to the TV in my bedroom and still be in sync with the TV in the family room with no lose of signal.
This is plugged into my earphone jack on my computer, and paired with alexa, and works one in 5 tries. Very frustrating and a waste of money

Follow the Tao! I'm using this as a transmitter on my 2009 Toshiba TV to connect with my wireless headphones.Set up was simple & the sound quality is excellent. There's no lag at all. Highest recommendation.

Wow, this little baby gave life to my television. I wanted a way to view my TV while my husband slept but volume was always to high even when at lowest setting on tv. This added a way for me to watch tc without sound. Just what I needed.

I needed a product to where I can listen to the TV without disturbing anyone else in the house, this delivered for me. Simple hookup connected easily to my wireless Bluetooth headphones and sounded very good too. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.

This does exacting what I need it to. There’s only one small problem, there’s about a two second sound delay. I’ve tried resetting it with no result. I mostly use it when I play video games at night so it’s not a big deal for me but I could see it being pretty annoying for someone trying to watch a movie.
Used this to connect my non-BT tv to my non-BT speakers. Bought a receiver for the speaker side. They connect from about 10 feet away from each other.
Works fine on my Windows 10 PC that had no Bluetooth capability
Truck doesn't have blue tooth and all my music is on my phone.  AUX port and this baby and all my tunes come through the speakers.  Excellent.

I used these for my Bose quiet comfort headphones to make my tv bluetooth and it worked well the first day then it would not connect any more I tried turning it on and off clearing bluetooth history and nothing worked. Unsatisfied.UPDATE
Easy connect, great sound. Use it to watch television and it’s worth every penny for someone who doesn’t hear as well anymore.

This little gadget works great. Connected to my phone faster than a lot of other devices. Would not hesitate to recommend this to a friend.

I have been using this unit with my iPhone 7 to listen to documentaries on YouTube. For this purpose it gets the job done. TaoTronic has very good follow up and customer service thank you.

Had one of these from another company, would take a few tries to connect. This thing will connect to headphone immediately.
Just watched three movies with the tao bluetooth transmitter and receiver.  It is wonderful, the sound is amazing soundslike the theater.

Much smaller than it looks. Love being able to use my Bluetooth headphones with my switch.

Nice to have Bluetooth on my bedroom tv.  Can now use headphones.

simple to set up, worked 1st time no issues. Would recommend

attempted a number of times to connect with my AirPods Pros.  Never worked.  Plenty of contact with mfgr and still no go!  Looking for another source.
This was very easy to install and works great.  We bought it so we could use our new Bose headphones, which neededwi-fi in order to use.
Really easy to set up and connects quickly. I like the compact design.

UPDATED REVIEW - my initial review was 2-starts because I could rarely get the transmitter to synch. I posted my review and within a couple of days received a letter from the seller stating that they wanted to verify my address so they could send me a new transmitter. I received it a couple of weeks later and tried it out. It worked perfectly. I charged it, plugged it in to my 'headphones' jack on my laptop and it synched up immediately with my Phaser BT earbuds. I plugged it into the aux spkr out jack on my television and it synched up with my headphones immedately. No problems. Sound quality is good and there is no 'latency' - or delay. I have a 2400 sq ft home with the tv pretty much in the middle of the home and I can listen to my music or programs while walking throughout the house without any loss of signal. I'm happy with this transmitter. KUDOS to the folks at SunValley (sellers) for their excellent pursuit of making the customer happy. They contacted me based on my initial Amazon review, sent me a new unit, contacted me again as to whether or not I received it and wanted to know about it's performance. Good job on supporting the customer.

The features as listed on the product page are accurate enough to be credible such as the: LOW DELAY: aptX Low Latency for High-fidelity Stereo Sound, lag-free content streaming in transmitter mode. Low Latency supported Bluetooth receiver is required. MAKE IT TWO: Upgraded 2-in-1 Bluetooth V4.1 transmitter can be paired with two Bluetooth receivers (like headphones + speakers) simultaneously. Note: aptX Low Latency does NOT support Dual Link mode. ALWAYS ON: TaoTronics Bluetooth 4.1 2-in-1 Adapter continuously streams even while charging. Built-in battery for up to 10 hours use - enjoy your favorite wireless content all the time. BLUETOOTH EVERYWHERE: In Transmitter mode, turn a non-Bluetooth TV, PC, CD player, iPod, MP3 / MP4 into Bluetooth transmitter. Receiver mode: Ideal for home or vehicle music streaming sound system. PURE SOUND: aptX audio codec for a richer and deeper sound experience. Listen to CD-like audio quality at no compromise. Plus, 12 + 6 month extended warranty and 24/7 friendly customer service.  A wide range of compatibility for easy plug and play set up. Highly recommended great product for a great price!

This device paired effortlessly with my Bose AE2w bluetooth headphones. I bought 2 of these TaoTonics transceivers - one for an immediate purpose, and the other for “I'll think of something.“ I have a pocket-sized portable SDR receiver for AM/FM, short-wave, and HF ham bands, that I wanted to use with my headphones, but without the hassle of using a cord. A small piece of double-sided tape was all it took to stick this bluetooth unit onto the receiver, next to the receiver's earphone jack. I set the TaoTronics to TX, and paired it with the headphones. A few seconds later, I was set. At the office, I usually listen to MP3s or audiobooks, from my android phone or tablet. But now, the ability to use my headphones also for my receiver's commercial AM/FM, short-wave, or other radio listening while I work, completes my office auditory trifecta.

This works nice as a Bluetooth transmitter for music or other audio only applications (old stereos, old record players, ect..).  But if you are trying to use this to transmit audio from a TV where you need the audio to Sync with the video, this will not do that.  There is about a 1/2 second delay so the lips on the tv video don't match the sound you hear on the remote speaker.  I tried this with two speaks and both had delays, one worst than the other. I also tried it with a new set of bluetooth headset and it worked much better but still had a slight delay.  So if your just looking to send sound to a remote bluetooth speaker this works great but if you need it to sync with video (a remote speaker for a tv) then you should look elsewhere.I did contact their tech support and they were great not wasting my time they told me upfront that there would be a Sync Delay for TV with this device.
