First off I am not a verified purchase because I did not purchase this directly from Amazon but, rather, was sent the product by the seller as an upgrade from the BA01 with which I was having some AV sync issues because of inherent bluetooth lag, although the BA01 were perfect in every other respect except for audio.These low latency headphones are great.  the BA07 which synced perfectly with the video on the tv.  i buy a lot of sunvalley/taotronics products because their customer service in terms of responsiveness is unparalleled.

This was a very satisfactory way of connecting a modern phone to an early 2000's vehicle. I did not realize how valuable Bluetooth connectivity was until I had to drive my wife's old (2004) Odyssey instead of my 2013 VW. This BT receiver does what it says. I was pleasantly surprised by the battery life; even if I have not been using the receiver for a week or more, it still has a charge. Overall, a good purchase. (And delivery was on time, it was well packaged etc.)

Read all the reviews including the negative ones. Since I already own a bluetooth receiver from this manufacture that works great, I took a chance. Turns out that it works great. Just a little hinky the first time I paired it but give it a chanceSecond try worked. Seems to have a good signal as I wandered all over the house and never lost the signal. Have only used the tx portion of this as I already have a rx. I would recommend it highly. TAO seems to make good products.

I bought 6 of these and left in the car. All 6 batteries swelled and cause side of transmitter to bulge out. They said temperatures near 100 degrees was excessive temperature. Its going to be 96 today. In the car it'll be warmer. The day I left these in the car wasn't that warm. The battery is a lithium ion polymer battery and can explode and cause fire. They wont take them back so into the recycling these will go.

This protective weather resistant case from Taotronics makes travel with your 13" laptop easier and safer.They spared no effort to bring you a great looking neoprene material that is lightweight and durable in black and white. I could see and feel the quality protection offered immediately after sliding my laptop into the case. The dual zippers are made by YKK and will ensure a long reliable life. I like the feature that lets you hide the handles for a sleeve look. This is a great functional product at a very fair price. It comes with a very lightweight pull string bag as a nice extra.

This is a great buy if you are interested in protection and functionality.  The design of this laptop bag is a little boring, but it does the job.  The size is perfect, it is form fitting and protect every corner.  The sides are very thick which creates a lot of cushion if you drop your laptop.  Water seems to roll over the sleeve and not get absorbed. So it seems to be some spill resistance.  The handle makes this very portable.  This is perfect to bring anywhere without bringing a bulky laptop bag.  This is light weight and convenient.  Overall this is a great bag for a great price.  Well worth it.

Really easy to pair, great battery life and great sound quality both in transmit mode and receive mode. Have used it to transmit an old record player to a bluetooth speaker, and used it in my classic car with a cassette adapter to receive Bluetooth audio from my phone. Worked flawlessly. Can also charge while streaming which is a big plus for me.

I have now used this sleeve for a few weeks and really like its build and quality.I like that there is a compartment for carrying charger, mouse, etc. And then there is a handle to carry the sleeve, which makes it a standalone product as well if you want to carry your laptop in the sleeve. It is minimal in size, and has proper soft padding to protect 13" devices. I use it for my MacBook Pro 13 and Chromebook.

It wull not connect to my phone, laptop, headphones. it may be picking up interference, but it should not be so vulnerable to interference. from what i gather, the 2.4GHz channel on my Xfinity wifi completely renders this device useless. and i am not shutting my wifi off so this thing works.

I've had this for quite awhile and could only get it to pair with a phone. The other day I decided to try again to use it to transmit from my TV audio to My Headphones. Again I had problems with no device detected in my headphones. I had a thought that maybe there was interference confusing the unit. I turned off all the phones active Bluetooth and a active speaker. Instant success! I have now paired this with Everything I have including Echo. The pairing in transmit and rec. now works great! Also this works great with my TV audio as there is no delay between the video and audio. I have tried other units and the sound was never quite in sync with the video.

Outstanding performance I have both the TT BOA1 and the TT BOA7. Hands down the TT BOA7 is the much better unit. The TT BOA7 is both a transmitter and receiver. I am using it with my ipod classic it has fantastic sound quality a long battery life and is very easy to use. It feels like a very well built unit  Taotronics is an excellent company their customer service is very helpful.

Edit: The supplier reached out to me and has sent me a new device. This new one has NO static. The quality is as clear as me using the bluetooth straight from my cellphone. I can't even tell I'm using bluetooth with my desktop.This product does what it is supposed to, but the static while being a transceiver is atrocious. I bought this as a gift for my husband to use with his Bluetooth ear phones (Trekz Aftershokz Titanium) and his computer (Win7, all updated). I have also tried it with my own Bluetooth ear phones (V-Moda Forza wireless) and my own computer (Win10, all updated). The sound is worse than my Firik bluetooth receiver that I believed was of poor quality. I have not used this as a receiver, so I can't speak for the quality there.

Let me tell  you, watching TV at night with the whole household sleeping has just become way easier (and cooler). Most definitely I am impressed with this little toy. It is very easy and straight forward in operation.  I have not had any issues pairing it with several of my bluetooth headsets. The transmitter allows pairing up to two devices at a time and this is a life-saver function. Real-life example: you and your wife want to watch some TV with the baby sleeping in the room next to you. You pair up two sets of wireless headphones and you each wear a pair and control your sound volume individually as it suits you through your own headset (headsets are obviously not included with this transmitter/receiver). No more sharing one pair of earbuds and fighting with "TV should be louder" or "Are you deaf... turn it down" (don't get me wrong, the 21st century's version of the famous cartoon's "Lady and a Tramp" moment may add a little romance to your marriage... you know, the one where they share a noodle... except that in this case instead of the noodle there is a earbud chord going from your ear to hers... you catch the drift...).But on a serious note - this is a good product, easy to set up and delivers pretty descent sound. Battery life, unfortunately, could be a little longer. I set it to charge every night, even though I am not using it on daily basis.

I have a Victrola 8-in-1 that has Bluetooth in but no Bluetooth out.  I wanted to pair it with my home stereo in one room and a Soundbar setup in another room.  With this Bluetooth Transmitter/ Receiver, I was able use it in Transmitter mode to pair with both systems.  I can now have either one or both on and have the audio out as provided by the headphones jack on my Victrola playing in either or both rooms.Some people have complained about pairing and especially pairing to two devices.  My suggestion is follow the directions closely and when you try to pair to the second device, have the first device turned off during the pairing.  Once paired to the second device, turn the first one back on to have both working.

I needed this adapter to connect two bluetooth headphones simultaneously to one device for work. This adapter works well for connecting one headphone but it is very temperamental when trying to connect two headphones at the same time.  I only got it to connect to two headphones simultaneously one time out of dozens of attempts.  As soon as I turned the adapter off and back on, I was forced to start the process all over again and had no more luck. I followed the enclosed instructions to a tee and watched manufacturer sponsored You Tube videos to make sure I was doing it correctly.  Not worth the struggles so it is going back to Amazon!

Got this to send audio from the steam streamer TV doodad, a Playstation TV, and a DIY android TV box that connect to a projector - to a soundbar that is under the projector screen. I have a lot of devices that do half of what this one does, receive bluetooth to make a car or stereo or whatever become a bluetooth speaker. This one can do that, too, but it also can turn something that doesn't have bluetooth output (like a walkman, dvd player, musical instrument) into a bluetooth device that can connect to bluetooth speakers.Just think, with two of these you can make everything bluetooth! your gameboy and your old boombox! Your discman and that karaoke machine!

There are different types of sleeves and cases available for electronic devices. This is one of my favorites. It is made of neoprene and is waterproof. Having a waterproof case helps put my mind at ease because there is always the possibility of something being accidentally spilled. The inside is like a pillow for your device. It is padded with small cushiony circles. It is very roomy. I put different devices in it, like my iPad Pro 12.9 and a Chromebook. Each device easily fit into the case with room to spare. The outside has pockets available to safely store all of your accessories. This case is amazing! For me, the icing on the cake are the handles. Because of the handles, there is no need to insert the case in a separate bag. It can safely and securely be carried by itself. If you don't need the handles, they can easily be tucked away so they are completely out of sight. If you need a case, and want something affordable that offers a maximum level of protection, look no further. This is the case for you!

Just got these in the mail yesterday. Tested them right out of the box. Life changing, i mean this thing dramatically alters your daily routine, especially if you work on your computer for extended hours. I also travel quite a bit, so can't wait to test these out. Currently Velcro'ed them to Vmoda m100. I think it's kinda cool that TaoTronics has a blue light on it, makes it look futuristic. Going to test them out at the gym as well- no more running on the mill with wires slapping me on the face!In terms of sound quality, I'm no audiophile, but i do produce music on Ableton, there does seem to be a little static when it hits the lows, mids and highs relatively sound good.

I bought the Adaptiv 2.0 Radar Detector for my motorcycle. I didn't get the Bluetooth right away, I figured I would make sure the radar detector was good. It was and it is. So I got this product, and I connected it to my battery via a portable USB plug that I attached to my battery tender connection so I wouldn't have to be always taking it out to recharge it. I love it. With the Bluetooth connection, it is much better because I get the audible signal right into the speaker in my helmet, so I am not always looking at the visual alert. Much more relaxing.

This case is really nice. It is small and portable and makes for a good carrying case. The reason I like this case is that it has handles on it!! It also has a small compartment to hold your charger. Be warned tho that it will bulge out of your case if you have a thicker charging brick. Overall this case is great for traveling. You no longer have to carry the laptop in your arms and have too much to carry. The smaller compartment makes it so that you also no longer have to worry about carrying your charger in another container. It also may have enough room for you to put in a battery pack  and charging cable! (battery size varies). The interior design is fairly unique it has a lot of bumpers inside to make sure that the laptop is shock resistant and the exterior makes it so that you no longer have to worry about any scratches or dents that may occur if you run into something. The handles are very thin and flexible so if you wish to put this case inside your backpack that is possible however be aware compared to other cases this is a little bigger to accommodate the smaller pocket. The zippers are definitely very sturdy so your do not have to worry about any of them breaking!! Overall I really enjoy this product and highly recommend it!

My wife bought this product for me for Christmas. I tried to connect the trucks Sync 3 to the transmitter setting of this device.  Sometimes the truck will see this device in pair mode, then the truck will tell me to verify the pair number on my device, but there is no way to do that.  If u just click yes, it will say waiting for Taotronics please check your device for pairing process.  It goes no further.

This product is not a 5.0 Bluetooth device as the title claims to be. It is not even 4.2 as you can tell by looking at the specs for range. It is a Bluetooth 4.1 device. 5.0 has a range of up to 800 feet and 4.2 has range of 65 feet.  This product only has 33 feet range hence a 4.1 device. Don’t be duped...

Well, i used it's transmitting feature, and compared to just using an audio jack, i can already tell the quality of the audio that it transmits via bluetooth is poor. Kinda cool though. I didnt use it's recieiving mode but my buddy got a full blown oldschool stereo with real big speakers, so i mailed it to him so he can simply play music from his phone. Cool concept, but in the end, it just wasn't what I expected.

I originally bought one of these to attach to my projector. The projector has a terrible speaker and I wanted to broadcast it to my Bluetooth soundbar. That worked great, however, I decided to put the projector in my car and unfortunately, my radio was not Bluetooth equipped. That being said, I simply bought another one, connected it to my stereo in my car, and used the two to transmit/receive to each other. I've never had any latency issues or battery issues. They last a long time, transmit quickly, and once you figure out how to connect it (button presses), it's off to the races. Even auto connects when I turn on my car now. I would highly recommend this product and it has endless uses!

I have used this for soo many things. I got it as a birthday gift, so I can make my mp3 transmit to my Bluetooth gaming headset. Worked perfectly. I used it to Bluetooth a CD player to the headset as well, no problems. When I had Bluetoothed my headset to my PC for gaming audio, I plugged this into my headset and connected it to my phone for YouTube, so I had two Bluetooth sources in one headset! It's amazing!!
These worked great until I upgraded to AirPods Pro.....they will no longer sync. So now these are pointless to me.Edit: after about 30 times of trying it finally connected but is really quiet

The first transmitter I received was defective. I emailed the company's customer service department to see if I was doing something wrong connecting it to my headphones. They walked me thru several tries until they decided it was defective. They responded quickly to every email I sent and sent a new transmitter even without me returning the defective one. I can't say enough about how responsive they were to my inquiries. I now have a new transmitter and it working just fine. Thank you, TaoTronic.

I wanted this to be able to use my bluetooth earplugs (Bose noise cancelling) in the plane with the inflight entertainment. The sound is good. I tried both receiver and transmitter and both worked fine. You can even pause the playback with the on/off button.

Works well.  Doesn’t shut off by itself.  When it transmits, it goes to my headphones which was my goal,  but, if you turn on tv in other room, the sound bar picks up the device and you hear it through the speakers.

I have had the device for about two years or longer, and It has worked great. Have had no problems with bluetooth connectivity or volume issues. Works great on my non bluetooth stereo, connected through the rca cables( I believe that's whats it called if not the red and white to 3.5mm). Had one problem with connectivity at one point, but the people at TaoTronics replied to me in a  timely manner and were able to help me resolve the problem. Would highly recommend this brand and device to everyone.

This is my first blue tooth transmitter, but I chose it after doing a lot of research. My primary purpose was to be able to use my noise cancelling bluetooth headphones at night with my big screen TV and not keep others in the family awake. It works fabulously. There has been no lag between the video and audio. I also connected it to inflight TV after reading Aaron's travel post, and it was wonderful. Like I said, this is my first transmitter, but so far I couldn't be happier.

I use it for connecting  Letscom Wireless Headphones model H10 to my 55" TCL ROKU TV.  It paired in seconds when as per the directions.  I will get another one if I need another blurtooth transmitter.
Easy to connect phones or tablets. Was easy to setup. Small and lightweight, doesn't take up much space in the car. Durable too. Really does make everything bluetooth, even MP3 players that aren't.

I have this Bluetooth for a year now and I’ve been pretty happy! It’s easy to use and makes it easy to listen to music and talk in the phone hands free. Only complaint is that just recently I was having trouble connecting to my phone, but I just reset everything and it worked like new again.

This doesn't send stereo information.  If you're using a DAW (ableton, pro tools), and you pan your audio hard left, sound still comes out of both your bluetooth headphone speakers.  I tested with multiple audio cables, and compared against headphones plugged in without the bluetooth, so the issue is certainly within the transmitter.

Fine piece of equipment, paired with my bluetooth devices perfectly.  Not a complain, but why offer a 2 year warranty at an additional cost when this fine product already provided a total of 18 months warranty?

Can't say enough good things about this little device. Life changed big time since using this to sync with my bluetooth headphones to watch movies on my tv. Even sporting events sound incredible. You here all the crowd reactions that you wouldn't have by using the tv's own speakers.  I've had this for a couple years now so its safe to say its pretty rock solid

It's extremely difficult to get it to pair. Don't believe the comments that claim otherwise. Once it is connected, the audio quality is fine, but there is a noticeable delay between the video and the audio.

I received for a birthday gift. I am impressed, I haven't had any problems yet(knock on wood). If you are lookng for a bluetooth adapter for your TV, I recommend it. It is a shame though, I need a Amazon invoice to register it.

Ordered two of these...and in a previous review, one did not work. TaoTronics reached out to me, and gave me great customer service. I've appreciated their products before, and now their very good customer service. I'm a happy buyer.
Easy 123

Solo una observación, con audifonos beats al momento que está establecida la conexión bluetooth de un monitor y el dispositivo está cargando se dejaba de escuchar por un auricular, cuando se retirar la carga se escuchan ambos.
We use the Bluetooth transmitter and receiver in a 2004 Toyota Matrix with several phones (Google Pixel 2, 2XL and iPhone 6 and 7). Works flawlessly out of the box and has a long battery life.

Bought this for mother in assisted living. She's hard of hearing and needed a speaker by her nightstand because her tv was across the room. Paired with Bluetooth speaker . Works great! Tried in receive mode with older stereo and my  iPhone and worked there as well. Great product for my needs.
Very disappointing. I have one of there receivers that has worke perfectly for more than a year.
You have to charge it every night.

The transmitter part works fine although there is a significant audio delay. I got the transmitter for my piano keyboard to pair with my bluetooth headphones and the delay makes it unplayable, even for practicing. Very disappointed as it's marketed as low latency.

This case is wonderful! I really love the protection that it offers my MacBook. The zipper is lined with additional padding so it doesn't scratch up the edges of the computer. Fits perfectly in my backpack making it very convenient to carry around campus. Overall, great product! Would definitely recommend to a friend!
battery lasts for hours bluthoot work perfect with nice sound quality can make any non bluthoot player in to one only neet to have a jack 3.5 entrance

Great little device! Low the low latency, which is important when watching live TV or movies.. There is nothing more annoying than when the moving lips do not match what one is hearing and this aptx box solves that issue!
No luck for me - tried to use it with Chromecast and a monitor - no dice. 1) Wouldn't pair with bluetooth headset at all.  2) while it was on - it didn't allow Chromecast to connect.
Works great, I use it to watch TV while my roommate is working and it's nice not having a long cable going from the TV to my headphones.

Overall, it works great. Connects every time. I wish there was a way to auto shut off, but the sending and receiving works great. However, it has a hard time picking up low volume sounds. For example, if two people are talking in a cafe, the sounds cuts out when the people stop talking and doesn't pick up the background noise. Same with music.

Just recently started using this Bluetooth receiver.  I like its small design and rubber-type coating to grip easier.  It also allows you to use it while it's charging!  That's a huge improvement and advancement over other Bluetooth receivers.

Works as advertised. Comes in nice, clean packaging with easy to understand instructions. Have had since August, no issues so far. I use it with my tv and Bluetooth headphones when I’m on the treadmill.
Spend the few extra dollars for the best model they offer; you'll be happy with the product but especially
Will not pair with headphones (device).

I use this on a Peloton bike at the gym and when traveling. It works perfectly and allows me to use my Bluetooth headphones when riding instead of wired headphones. It was very easy to set up and the battery life is excellent.

Only disappointment is that if it hasn’t been used for awhile you have to physically  turn it back on again (press and hold its button), wait ten seconds or so, then it will reappear as available to connect to
Its a good product, hoping the pocket for the charging cord was a little bigger. It works great though. Thank You.
Always had trouble pairing and after 7 months it stopped working and is not discover-able  on any device.All procedures are followed.
No lag for me
Simply amazing. Does the job spot on.
connects to an older stereo, till has "big" speakers. Left, right channel interface great
like it very much
Very easy to use.  Good product
very good reception
I am happy with the performance.
Worked exactly as it should.  Cheap way to upgrade devices.
Extremely difficult to pair with.  Extreme lag if/when you do.
Ease of operations
Easy to pair,worked like i thought fair price.
Nice
I have tried in so many ways, even calling support for help, but it does not work to transmit audio signal so a Bluetooth device can pick it up.
Easy to set up and work small doesn’t take up much room
You can’t buy the cord anywhere to connect. I found one from an old I Pod that worked.
Easy to follow instructions and worked as advertised.

Had it for a month. Dies after a few minutes. When charging, it has an interference with my radio. If my phone volume is all the way up, it has tons of static. None of my other brands ever did this. Now I can't return it. Literally last just past the return date.
The replacement works great. Thanks.
This device has good range, good connectivity and is easy to pair.
Plays the sound on my Nintendo switch threw my bluetooth but microphone dosnt work for my bluetooth and its brand new and works for calls.
Funciona a la perfección, fácil de usar
Crap. Stopped working.
Did not work as exoected

I don't know if Amazon's getting kickbacks from TaoTronics or what, but I have no idea why they keep recommending their stuff. The fact that the power button is in charge of both power and pairing makes it a huge hassle. "Did I hold it down for three seconds, or four? Wait, how many times did the light flash? Is this thing even on?"But what KILLS me is the noise. This thing transmits constant static. It may seem like the gentle hiss in the background is insubstantial, but trust me, after a while, it gets OLD. Sometimes you even get little pops and bursts of static, just to remind you that it's there. At first I assumed it was due to my old CRT television, but I recently upgraded to a flat-screen and it's still there. Pairing the same headphones, in the exact same location, to a different device they're completely silent, so it can't be interference. You can mitigate it a bit by balancing the volume settings on your headphones and the tv, but this shouldn't be an issue to begin with.

Been Impressed with this for awhile. I drive a truck for a living. It has a USB port in the radio but I use 4 USB Ports through the cigarette lighter. Everything we do now is powered by USB and a 2014 International dosent have enough.I bought this to use on the Aux port on the radio. I have enough wires running out of that area so I mounted it with double sided adhesive.
Bueno

I received this adapter as a replacement for an older TaoTronics Bluetooth adapter that didn't work well. The first one didn't hold a charge.This adapter works beautifully.  I've been using it about 2 months and have needed to charge only once after initial setup. I must mention, though, I(1)  I don't use the adapter every day, and (2) I usually turn off when not in use.  With the first one, none of that seemed to matter.  I do wish it turned itself off automatically when not in use, but not sure that's even an option with devices such as this. Maybe a more expensive make/model can do that; I don't know.

I received this product and opened the box. The first thing I did was turn it to transmitter mode and attempted to connect my bluetooth ear buds. My earbuds connected after 3 tries but so did a sound bar in my house. This device won't let you select the device to connect. It just connects to any open bluetooth device.I was going to use this in my band but I won't be able to. It appears you have to have low latency earbuds to connect to this box otherwise, there is a really bad delay.

I'll say this is a cool product and I think it's price is quite fair. I connected it several different ways and had it transmit to the Letscom bluetooth headphones that Amazon sells. Pairing was easy enough and sound clarity was good. And, it comes with charging cable and connection options.  I even connected it to the TV and it worked great.Unfortunately,  my reason for buying it was to have the option  of playing a guitar, along with recorded or, backing tracks, to a small practice amp and, plugging this device into the headphone Jack of the amp so I don't disturb other hotel guests while working out of town for several months. It works perfectly for that purpose right up to the point I begin to play guitar. The latency is  almost a full second from the time you pick the string until you hear the note.  Obviously that won't work for playing along with recorded music.

This gets daily 60-90 minute use at the gym with either my ATH-M50x cans or some good earbuds, paired with my Pixel 2.  I get around to charging it weekly, and it has never failed me.  Small, light, inobtrusive, terrific battery life, and astonishingly good sound.  In a busy gym full of people with Bluetooth devices, this never drops out or skips or loses connection -- ever.  It is just that staggeringly good.

This item couldn't perform better! It is so small but extremely powerful. The item was delivered quick & arrived a day early. I have this device connected to my headphone jack on my PC which allows me to use 'BOTH' my Bluetooth Soundbar in one room & a Bluetooth Home CD/Stereo System in my other room for maximum sound throughout my home. Awesome!

This is a very nice product however I had to practically touch it to the Bluetooth receiver when using as a transmitter to get it to connect with it. The Bluetooth receiver is a 4.2 version however this shouldn't have made a difference since there backwards compatible and this is why I gave it only 3 stars for connectivity otherwise it works fine.

Got this adapter  primarily to pair my Nintendo Switch to my Samsung Galaxy Buds. Pairing was easy and the connection was strong. There was a small amount of latency when playing Zelda but definitely didn’t effect gameplay and I can’t be sure if the latency was caused by this adapter or my headphones. Overall great, compact Bluetooth adapter, looking forward to using it when I travel.

Turn That Thing Down !!! Well, let’s jeep it short and sweet, I don’t hear that anymore:-)This unit is easy peasy plug n play. Works with just about any Bluetooth and keeps a charge for many hours! With a good set of head phones it’s like being at the movie theater. Buy it and try it, nothing to lose but all the chatter that don’t matter.

Worked as advertised and easily connected to my cell phone by Bluetooth.  I returned the item because I bought it by mistake.  I needed an optical Bluetooth transmitter instead.  However, the device works and very versatile.  You can easily switch the device from being a transmitter to a receiver with the flip of a switch.

I purchased this to be able to wear my headphones at night: while my wife was sleeping and it is easy to install and also has the charger that plugs directly into the television. It is very easy to pair up with the headphones too. I suggest you get a good pair of comfortable headphones to go with it and you are good to go.

Its good but sound lag happens on Tx (transmitting)mode. Transmitting while watching video causes this, but if your listening too music, it's perfect. I was using this to do a wireless projector setup. The sound lag made me disappointed so I eventually did a direct wire to the speakers. Works excellent in Rx(receiving).

I have tried everything to get this to work on my tv.  It's a smart tv but not blutooth.  No matter how I hook it up it will not load or transmit to my wireless earbuds.  I should have expected this when I saw how vague  the instructions were.

I have a non bluetooth tv in my bedroom and in order to keep the neighbors from hearing the t.v. at night I wanted to set up some headphones.  I bought bluetooth headphones but I also needed an adapter to pair with.  This worked quite well, very easy to pair the two and it fits into the back of my cable box.  Decent for the price
This worked just like I thought it would.
Mine did not work and Company has offered no solution to resolve.
This laptop case is great. It has great padding for the laptop.
Worked for 2 hours then nothing but static.

When I first received this adapter I was disappointed.  I wanted it to pair with my hearing aid.  I was not able to figure out how to do that.  I kept working with it and finally went to my favorite place to learn anything YOUTUBE. I learned how to pair with one of my headsets and all problems were solved.  Now I can watch my tv without bothering others and the same with my computer.I still can't pair with my hearing aid but am confident I will figure it out.  Worst case I will have to talk to my audiologist.

I was looking for an easy way to watch TV with my wireless headphones without having to buy an expensive set of headphones. I love the fact that this allows me to connect two sets of headphones simultaneously! Now that's a plus. The sound quality will depend on your television settings and type of headphones. Connecting was so easy. It also runs on battery power that it stores when plugged into your TV's USB port so you can take it wherever you go without having to worry about having a power source. I can get 6 hours of playtime on battery and forever when the USB is plugged in. I highly recommend for home or on the go. I never lost connection, even around corners and behind walls.

Took a little bit to pair at first, finally I put my head phones right next to this transmitter and it snapped it right up! Took about 5 to 10 minutes. Now there is no problem pairing now, works perfectly. Used this to connect my tablet to my head phones for music, really like getting rid of the wires, less wires the better! Now if they can wirelessly power something about a foot or two away, that would be wild! lol Will definitely buy everything with Bluetooth on it in future, get tired of getting up to plug transmitter in and out on the Tv to listen to the speakers on the Tv or headset, one or the other.

I got this to replace my aging Anker MB221 bluetooth transmitter. Not sure why Anker doesn't make it anymore. It was a very popular product too.In any event, this one works nicer, because I can leave it plugged in to a USB port so it's not using it's battery when I'm at my desk.

I had been using a 3.5 mm/ USB power  to lightning splitter/adapter with an iPhone X. The splitters don't last very long. This lets me charge my phone and connect to the car radio aux input. The bluetooth connection works great and hooks up every time I power the Taotronics adapter on.

I bought this to hook up a Bluetooth speaker to the projector I bought. We liked to watch movies in the backyard by a campfire and this made it perfect to hear. The Bluetooth connection is quick and solid. After an hour and a half movie, we had zero issues. I've yet to charge it and we've been through a couple of long movies. I might have to pick up a second to put in my car since I don't have Bluetooth connection in there.

I found m self not using my two iPod Classics because I had to use a corded headphone or speaker.  This wonderful product can both Transmit or Receive Bluetooth. I can connect it to the ipod and send the sound to Bluetooth devices. I can also use it to connect some wonderful light weight Sennheiser sound canceling wired headphones I have had for 25 years to my my computer, phone etc.  I also have one on the TV in the Bedroom so I can watch with Bluetooth headphones without disturbing others.

Item works well I had a little issue paring with TaoTronics Bluetooth Headphones due to another Bluetooth device was on in the house. After pairing unit worked well even with the other device being on.I would by again.
Easy to set up and no more of the wife yelling that the volume of my TV us too loud.  It also improves the sound quality - especially movies!

I bought two different brands of this type and neither one was able to pair on any of four different devices, this includes the car stereo. I followed instructions for many hours and to no avail, nothing. Returned.

This is exactly what I needed! Very simple to use and tiny for easy placement. The cables are long enough I can plug in the audio jack and the USB at the same time to the back of my tv. Would recommend.
Like it, works great, and sound great too, Got this item for my every-day travel and car aux use..Great item..

I transmit the sound from my TV to several Bluetooth speakers and headphones. In ways I do not understand I can pair two devices at the same time!I haven't used the receive function so cannot speak to that but the transmit function is AOK.

I use this on my iPad to play music on my amplifier.  It's easy to connect and when connected it doesn't drop my bluetooth connection.  The device is well made and very simple to use.  I highly recommend it.

I purchased 2 receivers and a transmitter. They all work well #1 receives my phone/Pandora for DeWalt work radio, #2 receives for a Bose speaker system in my workroom. The transmitter is for the TV in my workroom. All work quite well
I have an older TV and use this device for headphones while my wife is sleeping or reading. Just a slight delay but otherwise works quite well; easy to pair and connect.
I bought it for our tv. I was able to connect all the three headsets, Sony, Bose, and trekz air to my tv. Sound quality is good.
We connect our TV and speakers using this device and the sound quality is great! Easy to use paired up with our equipment in seconds. Took us about 3-5 minutes for setup.

Great device to listen music. I used as RX in my car( no phone calls) and as a TX to listen tv in nights both of the options are amazing

Fairly easy to connect to AirPods Pro. I plugged it in to my stereo at home to test it, so I have not used it on a airplane yet.

This Protective Sleeve from TaoTronics (designed mainly for 13") gives an added piece of mind when transporting or storing your unit. The sleeve itself is lightweight yet seems very durable. The sleeve actually came with a storage bag also which I probably won't use. This is made of outer shell neoprene (which will resist liquid spills) and a very soft inner shell which will not scratch or damage your laptop. The zipper seems top of the line and moves freely, the pulls have the TT logo. I am super impressed with this sleeve for the cost of the added protection!!!!!!
Works great on my projector thank you for a amazing product
Top Notch delivery! They work great!
I purchased this item to use with a bluetooth sound bar.  It was so easy to connect.  The directions were flawless.  I high recommend if you plan on adding a bluetooth sound bar to you tv.
Very pleased.  I can listen to Sirius Radio and my CD's on my patio now.
Great device but the power and the aux cord are very short.

Very easy set-up. Also way smaller than other bulkier ones on Amazon. Amazing product!

The sound quality is solid, connecting has not been an issue. Use it nearly every day.
It keeps power for many hours. I use it for my Bluetooth headphones. LoveIt.

I keep this in my car and the pairing was pretty easy. I like how it can pair with two iPhones and we both can easily switch and stream our own music. Good volume/sound quality. I bought this as a recommendation from someone else who had one.
Loved how small it is, great for flights, and TV late night when people are sleeping.
The item performs as indicated.
Works really well and good quality, highly recommended!

Only got this yesterday, but have probably used it for about 8 hours or so.  Seems really easy to use.  Just plug everything together, make sure it's charged (they recommend charging it for 2 hours before using it when you first get it), pair your headphones (I have Bose QuietComfort and they paired easily. My old Jabra wouldn't pair at all) and away you go.  I thought all sound would come through the transmitter, but it doesn't, so I had to turn the volume down on my TV, but now that I know, it's not an issue. Doesn't seem to be a delay between my headphones and what's happening on the TV, but there normally isn't with my headphones, so that's good.Haven't used it in the receive mode, so I can't judge that, but I didn't get it for that.

Works really well for the price. Pairs easily. Instructions were not great but once I figured it out was very happy. Can now use my noise cancelling headphones to watch my shows over the school holidays
This is so easy to setup and use. Even my technophobic oldies can use it. Once paired, it connects super quick every time. I mean every time!The quality it good, that includes both sound and build.

Arrived ahead of estimated time. Easy to pair with iPhone. All required cables supplied and was charged so basically works straight out of the box. No more unsightly wires from cabinet. Importantly, the quality of what I'm hearing is very good so no attenuation anywhere, so a great little product
Ease of set-up - 5 starsValue - 5 stars

I had a slightly different use-case for these - I had a last-minute need to get audio from an outside event's soundboard into a smartphone for livestreaming where an audio cable connection was not practical.I ordered two, which arrived very quickly, and then it was a simple case of pairing them as transmitter and receiver. They worked perfectly for the duration of the three hour event. They are small enough to tuck out the way, and light enough not to adversely effect the smartphone 3-axis gimbal.

As my Sony Bravia TV does not support Bluetooth audio devices, I had no option but to buy a transmitting device. I found the TaoTronics 5.0 Transmitter/Receiver device at a very reasonable price and decided to give it a go. It was very easy to pair and set up, working seamlessly with my TV. I would however recommend using a longer audio cable at least 1 meter in length, so that the transmitter device is in front of the TV rather than behind it. TaoTronics supply a very short audio cable with the device which places the receiver behind the TV resulting in loss of synchronisation sometimes with spoken dialogue. The longer audio cable however solves this problem. All in all, I would recommend this product as good value.
I use it to connect my TV to bluetooth headphones.  It works very well for that purpose and is easy to pair/use

Fantastic product, great price, and delivery time was fast!After reading reviews for this device, I was expecting to get some lag when pairing it with my Plantronics sports earphones to watch TV, however, I was surprised to find that wasn't the case at all for the vast majority of times I use it, I get no perceptible lag, lip syncing is fine. I've found that using a longer 3.5mm stereo cable to connect the transmitter to the TV headphone socket works better than the short one provided with the product, the short cable results in the transmitter having to sit slightly behind my TV, which does result in a little bit of lag, the longer cable, however, means the transmitter can sit on top of my entertainment unit, and in that position it works lag free over a distance of about 4 metres to where I'm sitting.

I bought this to be able to listen to my TV via Bluetooth headphones. My plasma Television doesn’t have a sound outlet to attach any Bluetooth transmitter so my set up is a little complicated to do it but this device seperates the sound from the HDMI cable coming out of the TV ( or Media Box ) and I could use a Bluetooth transmitter via a 3.5 plug into it to get sound sent to my headphones. My downstairs neighbour now hopefully won’t complain about my loud movie watching.
Pros- Small

Killer feature for me is ability to pair two bluetooth earphones to it simultaneous. My partner and I use this to watch TV when the little one is asleep.There's occasional popping though, and sometimes in quiet scenes the music cuts out (even though there should still be some quiet sounds). Not sure if its our earphones or this transmitter.

Very happy with the overall quality of it. Very easy to switch between transmitter and receiver modes. Very light and portable, I can't wait to use this in planes while travelling but for now, it works great with my TV and wireless Xbox controllers. The seller is very customer focused, which made it a great overall purchasing experience.

An modern upgrade to the old FM transmitters, I originally bought this for use on the plane but I have found many uses for this little device in addition to that. The inclusion of transmit and receive options gives a lot of versatility and the battery life is very impressive.

I am glad I bought this.  I have found many uses for it.  The sound quality is good - and being able to connect two headphones to it when streaming from the TV is great when quiet time is needed.  Very happy

I bought this device to use my bluetooth headphones with my guitar amplifier.  Unfortunately the lag was too bad.  Even with the promise of Aptx low latency, the lag is still noticeable. The device also cuts off at low volumes to save battery so even if lag issues were better, it would still be unsuitable because of this feature.I now use it as a bluetooth receiver on an old audio system to link my phone and listen to songs on spotify.  Works well for this purpose.

I must have been the unluckiest person to trial this Bluetooth transmitter. No matter how many times I've tried to get this transmitter to pair with my AKG headphones and friends expensive and or cheaper headphones, it just didn't happen. I had to return the item to Amazon in the end.I'm still waiting for a refund.

I've owned this for several months now - Bluetooth on Tx drops out continuously, I get 90% of the words if I angle it just right and don't move my headphones. I've tried several pairs of headphones (Have a Elite 65e, Airpods, etc) and all have the same issue with this transmitter. I am only 2.5 meters away from it and there us nothing in the way.

Very useful little gadget. Haven't tested transmitter yet but receiver reception is very good even when moving around away from source to different rooms in an apartment.The background hiss is a bit of a concern. Though it seems not to effect the quality of the audio when something is playing.

Taotronics Bluetooth transmitter and receiver is excellent. Sound quality is fantastic and there is minimal lag. I have used in both settings. Receiving it worked flawlessly. Only when I went out of range with my phone did I need to reconnect. The only issue I have found is that in low noise situations in transmission mode the sound will drop away to nothing then come back when the sound picks up again. Can be a little annoying at first but you soon get used to it.
Product could use a lapel clip so it is wearable like Sony's bluetooth receiver.21/05/19 Update:

Edit- Tao tronics kindly sent a replacement. However with 2 headsets paired the new one was also crackly. This new one seems better with just one headset paired.Original review- I bought this so my boyfriend and I can both watch tv after his kids have gone to bed. It arrived promptly and was nicely packaged. We installed it. But on trying to pair 2 pairs of headphones we had a lot of difficulty. Then when listening with 2, it was very crackly (and we turned off our phones etc). Then when my bf gave up and it was just me listening, it continued to be intermittently crackly.

This is a terrific little Bluetooth transmitter. I'm using it with a pair of Bose Revolve speakers. It allows them to both connect and there is next to no lag in the sound and the quality is excellent.I read in some of the reviews that it was difficult to set up but I had no trouble whatsoever. Happy to recommend

I gave a review earlier on this problem but in the meantime I contacted Taotronics directly with my problem.Surprisingly (these days) I got a very quick response from them, advising that the unit must be faulty and they have sent me a replacement.

After failing to get the transmitter mode to connect for a long time, I resorted to looking up a manual online to find that a simple press and hold the power button for several seconds is what puts it into connect mode - alternate blue and red flashes.  The rest of the process was then simple.  Frustrating that this isn't spelt out boldly for dummies when setting it up.
I bought the TT-BA07 to transmit to 2 pairs of headphones at the same time from my RODECaster Pro.The first unit I received didn't pair.

I use this product as a Bluetooth transmitter for my older TVs (that don't have Bluetooth) to pair with various Bluetooth headphones. After struggling with the 4.1 Bluetooth version that was sent when I purchased it May 2019, I contacted TaoTronics Customer Care who tried to trouble shoot why it wasn't pairing well with with my Apple AirPods Pro...they were great to deal with and sent a new 5.0 Bluetooth version (it shipped fast in 1 day from Amazon Melbourne Warehouse)....Have just tried it and so far so good - my AirPods Pro paired fast.Note: extend your warranty on their website...it can come in handy like it did for this.
UPDATED @10 AUG 2020Seller sent me a new product after few email conversations.

Going overseas, I did not have much opportunities to tryi this one out.I have used it a few times so far since I am back but it is a rather dissapointing. It works well so far but  the problem I have is the volum sound it transmitted I think . I wonder if I use a different model with Optical input will impove it.

Am using Shure 535 (triple driver) in ears with this Taotronics. Unfortunately there is a low constant buzz whenever the bluetooth is on. It nearly goes away once music is playing, but is very present in speaking only videos. Will test it with other devices and update if the buzz goes away. NB: this low buzz is almost imperceivable when using the standard iphone headphones (before airpods)Otherwise, good build, easy connection to Macbook, love the size, have yet to fully test limits of battery life. One caveat is the lack of volume control on the device - the beeps it makes after successful pairing is blaring / louder than my music volume, and thus i don't recommending putting in ears on until you've paired.

If there is one thing I really appreciate when bying online is when a supplier actually listens and takes the time to contact you and sort any issues out so you leave like your actually an important part of their business...This supplier excelled in their customer service and I really appreciated their efforts and I would Highly recommend buying their products with confidence. If your having trouble take the time to put your issues in the reviews and they will get back to you to help. well done Tao.
Bought this for 2 use cases:1. Convert old car stereo with AUX to have Bluetooth capability (receiver mode)

Fairly easy to setup bluetooth although not always automatic connection when turning on headphones and pairing. The instructions are good  and explain to press main button to provide pairing on demand. This always works.Quality build and good looks. Audio 3.5mm plug lead could be longer to allow placement of unit further away from connected equipment. Very fast delivery and good notification of expected delivery time.

Purchased for private listening of an older TV using wireless headphones since I tend to get up anytime from 4am and don't want to disturb my partner or the neighbors.Setup was simple as was pairing with the headset.

I purchased this in the hope that I could use them to connect up a pair of blue tooth Apple ear pods to my Yamaha P125 digital piano. I had read om piano forums, that the latency would be a problem, but had also read that this was a new version with low latency chip set. It pairs well with the apple air pods. but true to the piano brain, blue tooth latency is not viable. The unit works fine with general audio equipment , TV etc. One issue , it locks onto the device and will not release the connection/session to allow you to connect to another device , unless you power off the transmitter.

I mainly bought this item to make my wired audio devices wireless. I've so far tested it with two head/earphones, Bose quietcomfort 35 and Shure 215. Although it works perfectly with my Bose headphones, it channels in a lot of noise when plugged in to Shure 215 earphones. As far as the lag, it's perfectly synced with no latency whatsoever. The range of transmission/reception also looks pretty decent. So overall, it's worth the price.

I haven't used it extensively. I've only used it as an audio transmitter. As far as that part of it goes, it's perfect for what I wanted to use it for. Out of the box, I charged it and connected it to the audio jack of an older tv I own. I paired it with some bluetooth headphones and it worked perfect. The sound is clear and I haven't noticed a problem with the audio. No drops in the signal, even when walking far from the transmitter. Great little device.

Nicely packaged. Good build quality. Very easy to use.I am using it in my car. My headunit has no bluetooth. I am using this adapter so I can play music from my phone and then transmit it to my car's headunit via its 3.5 mm aux input. Would have been great if it had an auto switch on/off function when it gets power and when power is cut off. This way it would have switched on and off by itself everytime I turned my ignition on and off. It doesn't have that feature, so I have to do turn it on and off manually. Not an issue though. I like it. It's good value for money.
This thing is so small and easy to pack away! It's easy to pair with and it's battery life is great!I was blown away by how small and light it is!

amazing little device which has so many uses. i used it for splitting the ipad so my kids can listen simultaneously on BT headsets. used it for making an old radio into a bluetooth receiver. used it for watching tv with my BT headset.it is a pain to use though for the first 5 times, so dont buy if you're not tech savvy. but once you get the hang of it it works well without dropping out
Supper good to use!I always carry a speaker in the car before I bought.Really convenient  to connect with telephone ~Love it ~

Somehow in the pictures from the Amazon product page, it looks much bigger than the actual device. It works great for transmission; and it just works, without any fuss. Haven't tried receiver functionality, though. But I think it should also be good.Now I can use my Switch with my Bluetooth headphones. Yay!

I used this product for connecting two sets of wireless earphones to an iPad. Connecting them is fine once you follow the instructions. Output quality was great, no lag at all. The only problem was that my partner, who was use airpods, found the volume a little low but we were on a plane which can be noisy. My earphones have independent volume control so I didn't find this at all. Overall, great product for a good price. Would definitely recommend.

I thought this would work well but having a 1 second lag time in the audio is unforgivable and makes it useless. Trying to watch a movie like that is frustrating. Its now gone to the back of a drawer. More money wasted!

I bought the unit to enable bluetooth on my Hires portable digital music player which doesn't have bluetooth amd connect this to our family cars bluetooth system.  The unit would not pair with either of my vehicles.  As recommended by the supplier I returned the unit for a full refund and am just waiting on the credit to come through.

Worked great for just longer than the 3 month return period.this device worked essentially perfectly for just over 3 months then it stopped working all together. It does not pair nor can it be seen by any mobile device anymore. It has basically stopped transmitting. Sad because it was great but less than 4 months is not an acceptable time frame for a device to work.

This product makes my life easier!It will transfer the sound from your video game console (Xbox one) to your bluetooth headphones smoothly. It requires sometime to learn how connect it to your bluetooth headphones. Also, you won't be able to use it for Samsung TV online applications as the sound won't transmit probably and you will only hear some clicking noise! Other than that it's an excellent product!
Purchased on  just before it went on sale, seller refunded the difference.It arrived super quick and was better quality then I expected.

This really is a great little gadget. I have only one negative, and it is not really a negative given the excellent after-sales service I received from this company, and this is that the first one they sent me stopped working after a month. It was replaced, no questions asked, free postage, everything wonderfully done, and the replacement arrived priority mail within a week. Now I have had this second device for two weeks and it is working excellently. So fingers crossed, I hope it keeps going because it really has improved my life being able to listen to the music i want to listen to instead of the modern stuff my family wants me to listen to. I recommend this device and the company gets my five star recommendation as well.

This can be used to connect any Bluetooth headsets and your Tv. There is both Tx And Rx mode which is Transmitter mode and Receiver Mode. Switch it to Tx for enjoying movies.How to pair guide and everything needed like usb cable, wires and all are included.

[Updated review]I previously experienced a pretty bad static hum on my unit but after further testing and playing around with the included cables this appears to have gone away and the situation has vastly improved. I've updated my star rating to reflect this.

A couple of things have let this product down somewhat. First, the audio cable is very short and this seemed to cause some issues with audio lag. I replaced the short cable with a longer one and lag reduced but not enough to have audio properly synched with video. I am using Soundpeats True Wireless earbuds and have never had lag issues with them in any other bluetooth connections.Volume control is terrible. I use a sound level of 16 (on a scale of 0-100) in normal circumstances so a hearing impaired person can hear the sound properly. WIth this device I have to increase that to a level greater than 75 to hear the sound clearly. This is not acceptable.
Summary: Awesome Product! Should have bought it years ago.Connectivity:

Better quality than expected, and worked with what I originally bought it for (to transmit Bluetooth audio from my TV to my Bose qc35). Pairing/connection is surprisingly easy considering it has one button and no interface. However, the audio lag to my QC35's when watching something like Netflix etc was just a bit too much to not be distracting, sometimes what seems like half-full second. That's not the fault of the unit however as it supports aptX, it's an issue with the Bose QC35 headphones not supporting it for some unknown stupid reason. It should be fine with other headphones that support aptX like the Sony's etc. I fixed that issue by buying an aux cord extension so now I can watch TV through the headphones, and I've got the TaoTronic's plugged into the aux-input of a clock-radio for bluetooth music through my phone. Good stuff :)

Was super easy to set up, using it with my Logitech G633 headphones to make them wireless. Range is really good, the audio is super clear and the battery life is solid. The lack of volume controls is disappointing but not the end of the world.Also have tried it with my switch (so in transmitter mode) which also worked well, although it was a little difficult to get my headphones to pair. The instructions included do work, it just took a few tries. The latency is short enough that it's totally acceptable for casual gaming.

the TaoTronics Bluetooth 4.1 Transmitter / Receiver, 2-in-1 Wireless 3.5mm Adapter turned up on time,,, it was so easy to setup and used,,,the sound coming out of my JBL Live 650BTNC Noise Cancelling Wireless Over-Ear Headphones are so perfect,,, this is the only  Bluetooth Transmitter / Receiver you need
Connected to my iPhone easily. Long battery life. Use it with my wired DT880 headphones 32 ohm. Perfect..
I converted my old car stereo into an old-school 'boombox' for the pool area.Sadly the old stereo didn't have bluetooth connectivity, but this TaoTronics unit solved that.
I'm a non technical user but was able to use these blue tooth devices.  Veryhappy with my buying experience starting with researching on Amazon through

My perfect car bluetooth receiver for my s20. This product is 100% genuine. So easy to use and quality is seamless. Don't ever buy any FM bluetooth Transmitter for your car. You can connect this to any audio speakers that has aux 3.5mm jack.

I can't fully comment on battery life because I only used the transmitting function for four hours on a recent flight but it didn't die in that period.  When I first used it the little bit of latency was noticeable but after five minutes I got used to it and the second time I used it I didn't notice it at all.  All in all, very pleased.
I use this on the aeroplane so I can use my wireless headphones. The sound is good and it connects super easy. It's very light and the battery seems good, lasted my 5.5hrs flight easily.

The auxiliary cable was painfully small which means that the device dangles behind the TV screen and the TV screen becomes a hinderance - but despite that, the quality is fabulous and no lag for audio from my TV to my New Bose speaker

This device pairs easily with my Sony WH-1000XMS but cannot get it to pair with my Airpods or Aftershokz Treks Titanium headphones.  I really want to use with my Airpods and have tried disconnecting from other devices and turning off all other bluetooth.

I use this device with my home projector in Tx mode. It works really well. Pairing prices was easy and quick and no problem with reconnecting again. Sound quality is also excellent in combination with my don't headset with aptx.

Delivery was super fast. Packaging premium!! the product it self seems very premium and easy to use. I purchased it for my car as it does not have built in bluetooth and cant use AUX as i need to charge my phone. Even though it has been just a day since i received, i am optimistic it will last quite a long because of the premium feel. lets hope for the best
Awesome, works as both transmitter and receiver..., quality of product is very good.., very light weight and easily adaptable to any device..., now my 13 yrs old Apple Ipod is bluetooth enabled.

Works fine but sometimes hard to pair with your device.  I use this with two sets of Bluetooth earbuds, and sometimes it drops the connection to one of the devices.  I have found that sometimes that you need to put the earbuds into search mode several times to connect.  When connected it works ok with a small lag in the audio.

I like the two TAOTRONICS products Wireless Headphones and Bluetooth transmitter I bought, good value for money, easy to operate when you know how, but headphones did not come with adequate instructions so I went on-line to get tips and figure out how to proceed with setting up and getting the two products working.

Great.  Does everything that it's supposed to do and sounds pretty decent.NOTE: My use case was very particular.  I bought two - one to transmit and the other to receive.  In order to pair them with each other you really need to get them away from other bluetooth devices and put both in pairing mode.  Takes a short while but it worked fine.

I was hesitant to buy another "low latency" Bluetooth adapter for my tv as the last one I bought (different brand) was not good. This one works great! Sound and picture perfectly in sync. Just make sure your connecting device is aptX compatible - Echo Dot is not but my $30 Bluetooth speaker from China is.

I wasn't able to get this working, as I couldn't see the connections behind my wall-mounted TV, and it turned out the RCA connections are 'in' when they should have been 'out'. The only 'out' is an optical cable, and that's already connected to my sound bar. Customer Support was helpful, and the return went smoothly.

As the headline says, it's quite disappointing. You can charge this (2 hours to full), and then pair with some bluetooth headphones for about 6-7 hours. If you want to charge it at the same time as listening, you'll get screeching horrible static, which totally sucks.

After constantly being annoyed by my wired headphones getting tangled, I purchased some bluetooth headphones (Powerbeats Pro). To get the most out of them, I also grabbed the TaoTronics bluetooth transmitter. I have only tried this with my pocket radio so far, but so far so good. I also plan to connect to my TV when I don't want to wake the rest of the house.
Great little unit, does everything it says it and is super compact. This is very handy for retro fitting a non Bluetooth stereo system and streaming audio to it from your smart phone.
Bought this nifty gadget to listen to headphones from our non Bluetooth tv. This works perfectly and was an easy solution when we'd been told there was none
Does exactly what i need it to, no issues with connection or sound quality. very small and unobtrusive, would recommend to anyone without built-in bluetooth in their car audio.
Sound quality no good.  Could barely hear it, known issue apparently being worked on

Main reason was to use during travel. Tested at home as if in plane and so far it does what it meant to be and sound is great. Connect quickly with my in-ear wireless headphones. Now I am ready waiting my first travel soon. I will update after that.
I am sure this is a good product.Sadly, my expensive Bose Headset does not support aptx low latency feature.

After trying many other Bluetooth receivers and experiencing background hum, I purchased the TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 after reading some reviews and was pleasantly surprised at the fantastic sound quality. No more hum!

The TV volume has to be turned up louder than we usually have it, but this is not a big deal. No issues with latency. No issues with charge as it just stays plugged into a usb port on the back of the TV. Reasonably easy to set up.

Easy to pair. Lasted a full 9 hour flight. Took about an hour to charge up to full.Audio volume was just a tad lower than normal, but no delays and range was great. My seat was upstairs and I could still hear the movie fine while using the downstairs toilet.

I had some issues with the first one, however without me even requesting it, they went way give and beyond replacing it with a unit that works perfectly, thank you for such great service on a product that works wonderfully

Easy to set up.  Good quality sound.  Enables me to listen to tv on Bluetooth headphones, by plugging this device into AV receiver’s headphone jack input.  Only issue is that battery seems to deplete quickly so I keep it plugged into power when not in use.

The device keeps turning itself off after I try to use it. It pairs to my speaker then after less than 20 seconds it disconnects because the transmitter has turned itself off. Can I can get a refund or exchange for another item please?

Tried to pair it with air pods but no success. It doesn’t pair with iPhone or any other device. Actually, iPhone doesn’t even find it as a bluetooth device. I’m wondering if it’s a real bluetooth transmitter or just a piece of plastic. Waste of money.Ps. Shipping timing and delivery all good, I must say.

An excellent low cost Bluetooth TV audio transmitter. No notable loss in audio quality and no audio latency issues with my wireless headphones. Does the job well when hooked into my old pre "smart TV".

I used this product on my tv to use BlueTooth speakers with it. It's plugged in the rear of the tc and to save charging the battery I used an iphone charger to keep it continuously charged. It's quite effective.

Use this at work and always take it with me when I travel makes it so much easier to use Bluetooth headphones on an airplane and love the fact that I compare two sets of headphones together so my partner and I can watch the same movie on an iPad
the sound is clear and solid, contains bass and treble. and it has a built-in battery which makes it more easier to use.the product is small and light, which provides good portability.

I use this for listening to TV, radio, computer - and it even works as a monitor on my Zoom H2n microphone - useful when making videos. Bluetooth hearing aids are marvellous and this is the most useful dongle to go with them.

Excellent fix for converting your manual sound receiver into bluetooth beauty. Highly recommended for someone who is looking for a quick fix without investing too much into expensive bluetooth receivers.

Great sound quality for the price, easy to set up and use, and excellent after sales customer service.My only issue was when trying to use with my TV as there was a noticeable delay between the audio and video, so is not recommended for this situation.
Outstanding device.Super easy to setup which was a huge win for everyone to be able to use it. We now watch movies and TV with 2 bluetooth devices connected without waking the kids!

Quite happy with this product. The sound is very good and I can walk into another room without losing reception frim my TV to my Apple AirPods.A small gripe is that the Bluetooth signal drops out after about 20 minutes and I have to re-connect my headphones.

I wanted this to play electronic drums and broadcast to a bluetooth speaker.  The latency is a killer - I can't imagine watching TV or anything else that requires a quick response - this is typically delayed by the time it hits a speaker.  Waste of money for me.

I mainly use this product as a transmitter for tv, and it does not disappoint at that. The pairing is really easy and quick and the receiver part is as good as the transmitter. Happy to recommend this product.
Tried connecting my Bluetooth headphones to play electric guitar silently.. easy to do but lag made the experience very poor and do not use it at all. Supposedly for gaming etc. Cant see how!!
works 80-90% of the time smoothly. the other 10-20% you need to try and try again, it will finally connect.
Worked only for a short while before it wouldn't connect to any of my Bluetooth devices. Sound quality was crackly over only a two metre distance from the transmitter.
Great product. Used to add much needed Bluetooth audio to my Switch. Easy to pair with my AirPods.
Works perfectly...easy to setup....easy to connect everyday....automatically turns off after inactivity..... brought back my old Bose sound dock to life!!

The transmitter coiuldn't be connected to my Sennheiser MM 550-X bluetooth headphone automatically at the beginning. The seller is quite nice and send me another one for free immediately. Appreciate the customer service you provide. It works now and really good sound quality.
Great device. Very minimal latency. Depends on the device and your surroundings. I connected my AirPods Pro to the In Flight Entertainment via this transmitter and had little to no latency.
